overview_CV:
With 3 years of experience in the banking industry as a Debt Collection Specialist at Công ty Tài chính FE-Credit, I have honed my skills in customer relations, negotiation, and problem-solving. My achievements include reducing overdue accounts by 20% within a 6-month period. In my role, I successfully managed a portfolio of delinquent accounts in Hanoi, tracing new addresses and workplaces of customers and engaging with third parties to facilitate collections. Additionally, I have experience as a Manager at Nhà Hàng Chao Quán, overseeing staff and building relationships with local authorities. 

I have also demonstrated my commitment to innovation by developing a Debt Recovery Automation Tool to streamline the debt recovery process and a Personal Finance Tracker App to help users manage their finances effectively. My education at Đại học Kinh Doanh Và Công Nghệ Hà Nội in Finance and Banking has provided me with a solid foundation in financial analysis, debt recovery, and banking regulations.

With strong communication, problem-solving, teamwork, time management, and adaptability skills, I am well-equipped to excel in a challenging role as a Debt Collection Specialist. Fluent in Vietnamese and proficient in Microsoft Excel, I am dedicated to enhancing my expertise and contributing to the success of any organization I join.

overview_CV: With 4 years of experience in the banking industry specializing in debt management, I am Phạm Quốc Chiến, a dedicated professional seeking a challenging role as a Debt Collection Specialist at VPBank. My expertise lies in customer service, financial analysis, and risk assessment, with a proven track record of reducing delinquent accounts and enhancing overall portfolio performance. I possess strong soft skills such as being friendly, helpful, and cooperative, making me a valuable team player. Additionally, my proficiency in IT, banking knowledge, and ability to work collaboratively further highlight my qualifications for the role. I am fluent in Vietnamese and proficient in English, ready to contribute to the growth and success of VPBank. Contact me at quocngo9999@gmail.com.vn or 912099999 to discuss how I can add value to your team.

overview_CV: With a diverse background spanning over a decade in industries such as banking, sales, and public service, I bring a unique set of skills to the table. Throughout my career, I have excelled in roles ranging from increasing sales revenue by 20% to implementing security measures for community well-being. My experience includes working at prominent organizations such as Ngân hàng Quốc tế VIB and Ngân hàng Liên Việt, where I honed my abilities in customer service and debt management. Additionally, I have a solid educational foundation with a degree in Electronics from Cao Đẳng Nghề Hải Dương and a degree in Law from Đại học Luật Hà Nội. I possess a blend of soft skills like consulting, trust-building, and product knowledge, along with hard skills in areas such as customer relations, legal expertise, and computer proficiency. I am now seeking a challenging opportunity in a dynamic organization where I can leverage my skills and experiences to drive success and propel my career forward.

overview_CV:
I am a highly motivated individual with a strong desire to work in a friendly environment with great benefits at VPBank. Despite having no prior experience at VPBank, I am willing to travel for work and believe in the values and reputation of the organization. My past experience as a Senior Accountant at ABC Company involved managing financial transactions, preparing financial statements, and ensuring compliance with regulations. As a Financial Analyst at XYZ Corporation, I analyzed financial data, generated reports for management, and provided financial recommendations. Additionally, as an Accounts Payable Clerk at LMN Inc., I processed invoices, reconciled accounts, and communicated with vendors for payment issues. 

My career objective is to secure a position at VPBank where I can contribute positively to the team and benefit from the supportive work culture and strong client base. I am dedicated to growing professionally within the banking industry and am excited about the opportunity to work for VPBank. 

My soft skills include strong communication, teamwork, problem-solving, adaptability, and time management skills. I possess hard skills in banking knowledge, customer service, financial analysis, risk management, and sales skills. While my educational background and academic achievements are not explicitly mentioned, I am committed to transparency in the recruitment process and am eager to demonstrate my capabilities in a new role. I am also open to further developing my skills through certifications or training programs. 

Overall, I bring a combination of experience, skills, and a strong work ethic to contribute effectively to the team at VPBank. I am confident that I can make a positive impact and thrive in the supportive work culture that VPBank offers.

overview_CV: Hello, my name is Nguyễn Văn Hà, a dedicated professional specializing in handling legal disputes and debt collection with 3 years of experience. My expertise lies in communication, negotiation, and problem-solving, which have allowed me to effectively resolve complex legal issues and surpass collection targets. I am currently seeking a challenging role as a Specialist in handling intellectual property disputes at KHCN Company, where I can apply my skills and experience to drive the team towards success. My strong communication and negotiation skills, coupled with a certification in debt litigation from VPBank, equip me to manage legal matters efficiently and contribute significantly to the company's growth. My soft skills include excellent communication, problem-solving, time management, teamwork, and adaptability, while my hard skills encompass data analysis, legal knowledge, customer service, financial analysis, and proficiency in the Microsoft Office Suite. With fluency in Vietnamese and English, I am well-equipped to excel in a dynamic and fast-paced legal environment.

overview_CV:
I am a dynamic and enthusiastic individual with a strong passion for sports and traveling, along with a background in Law and experience working in government offices. Despite limited work experience, I am a quick learner and efficient time manager, allowing me to adapt easily to new environments. My educational background includes a Bachelor's degree in Law, and I have excelled in tasks such as document management and program coordination during my time at the Phòng Tư pháp huyện Đan Phượng and Văn phòng HĐND và UBND huyện Đan Phượng in Hanoi.

In my previous roles, I have been responsible for tasks such as document archiving, legal document verification, systematizing legal documents, certification, and managing citizen registration. Currently working as a Nhân viên tổng hợp, I am involved in advising, planning, and organizing the implementation of programs and work plans for the local government. My salary has been 4,500,000 đ in both positions, and I am known for my strong communication skills, proactive attitude, and ability to complete tasks on time.

I have received a Bachelor's degree from Viện Thanh Thiếu Niên Việt Nam and Đại học Luật Hà Nội, with solid academic achievements and soft skills such as adaptability, eagerness to learn, effective time management, and a strong commitment to meeting deadlines. I also hold a Certificate in Office Informatics and have English language proficiency at an Intermediate level.

In summary, my strengths lie in my ability to quickly adapt to new challenges, stay updated on industry trends, effectively manage my time, and proactively complete tasks on time. I am a team player with a strong organizational skill set and attention to detail. I am now seeking a challenging position in a dynamic work environment where I can utilize my skills and continue to grow professionally.

Qua tìm hiểu em được biết VPBank là 1 trong những ngân hàng có Môi trường làm việc hiện đại và năng động, tuy có tính cạnh tranh cao
nhưng kèm theo nó là có nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến. Ngoài ra em muốn cống hiến và tạo nguồn thu nhập ổn định cùng VPBank để nâng cao chất
lượng cuộc sống.14. Anh/chị từng được khen thưởng hoặc bị kỷ luật chưa? Anh/chị vui lòng chia sẻ chi tiết về thông tin khen thưởng/kỷ luật(nếu có)

overview_CV:
With over 2 years of experience in legal document preparation and case file management, I have developed strong skills in drafting legal paperwork, assisting clients with administrative procedures, and representing clients in court proceedings. During my time as a Legal Assistant at Luật TNHH Việt Kim, I provided consultations to clients on business, civil, and land matters, drafted legal documents, conducted research on case files, and represented clients in court hearings. My role also involved representing clients in various administrative procedures such as business registration, land tax registration, social insurance registration, and notarization of documents. One of my key achievements includes successfully advising clients on legal matters and ensuring positive outcomes in their cases. 

I am now seeking a challenging legal position where I can utilize my expertise in document preparation, administrative procedures, and court representation to provide exceptional legal services to clients. With a Bachelor of Law degree from ABC University, I have a strong academic background to support my practical experience. My soft skills in communication, problem-solving, and time management, combined with hard skills in legal document drafting, filing, administrative procedure handling, legal research, and court representation, make me a well-rounded legal professional. 

I am dedicated to providing high-quality legal services and am eager to further develop my skills while contributing to the success of a reputable law firm. My goal is to continue growing as a legal professional and delivering the best possible outcomes for my clients.

overview_CV:
With over 5 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in customer service, financial analysis, and risk management. During my career, I successfully increased customer satisfaction rates by 10% and led a team to exceed sales targets by 15%. Now, I am seeking a challenging role in a dynamic organization where I can continue to grow and contribute to the team's success. My objective is to leverage my expertise in customer service, financial analysis, and risk management to drive business growth and success in a leading financial institution.

I possess strong communication, teamwork, problem-solving, and time management skills that have been instrumental in my professional success. Additionally, I am proficient in Microsoft Office, data analysis, financial reporting, and risk management. I am driven by a passion for delivering exceptional customer service and finding strategic solutions to complex financial challenges.

While my educational background and certifications are not specifically detailed here, my hands-on experience and proven track record in the banking industry demonstrate my ability to excel in a fast-paced and competitive environment. I am dedicated to continuous learning and professional development to stay at the forefront of industry trends and best practices.

Overall, my comprehensive skill set, proven achievements, and commitment to excellence make me a valuable asset to any team looking to drive business growth and deliver outstanding customer service in the banking sector. I am excited about the opportunity to bring my expertise to a new role where I can make a meaningful impact and contribute to the success of the organization.

I am eager to take on new challenges and continue growing professionally in the banking industry. My certification as a Chuyên viên thu hồi nợ sớm nhóm SME further solidifies my expertise in this field. I am excited about the opportunity to bring my skill set to VPBank and contribute to the success of your dynamic team.

overview_CV:
As a Software Engineer based in New York, NY, I bring over 5 years of experience in marketing and communications to the table. Skilled in content creation, social media management, and campaign planning, I have led successful marketing initiatives that resulted in increased brand awareness and engagement. With strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to drive decision-making, I am looking for an opportunity to utilize my expertise in a dynamic and collaborative team environment.

With a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with Honors from Stanford University, I have a solid foundation in programming languages such as Python and Java, data analysis, project management, graphic design, and financial modeling. Additionally, I hold certifications in Project Management Professional (PMP) from the Project Management Institute (PMI), Certified Scrum Master (CSM) from Scrum Alliance, First Aid Certification from the Red Cross, and an Occupational Health and Safety Certificate from OSHA. My soft skills in communication, teamwork, problem-solving, time management, and leadership further enhance my capabilities. 

Throughout my work experiences as a Marketing Coordinator at XYZ Marketing Agency and a Sales Associate at ABC Retail Store, I have honed my abilities in developing marketing strategies, managing social media accounts, conducting market research, providing excellent customer service, handling cash transactions, and setting up promotional displays. My internship at XYZ Corporation provided me with valuable exposure to various projects in the marketing department, research, report preparation, and meeting participation. 

Fluent in English, with advanced proficiency in Spanish, intermediate in French, and beginner in German, I have a diverse language skill set that can facilitate effective communication in multicultural environments. My certifications in project management, scrum mastering, first aid, and occupational health and safety reflect my commitment to professional development and maintaining high standards of performance. With a solid educational background, practical work experience, technical skills, language proficiency, and certifications, I am well-equipped to contribute to the success of any marketing department seeking innovative and results-driven talent.

overview_CV:
I am a highly skilled legal professional with 8 years of experience in the banking and legal industry. My expertise lies in legal research, contract drafting, and compliance, and I have a proven track record of successfully handling legal cases and providing valuable legal advice to clients. In my most recent role as a Chuyên viên Pháp Chế at Công ty Cổ phần Tập đoàn Vàng Bạc Đá Quý DOJIDOJI, I demonstrated my ability to adapt to new career directions and specific responsibilities. Prior to this, I served as a Chuyên viên pháp lý at Văn Phòng Luật Sư Nhiệt Tâm Và Cộng Sự, where I further honed my skills and contributed to the success of the firm. Additionally, my experience as a Chuyên viên xử lý nợ pháp lý tín chấp at Công ty TNHH quản lý tài sản ngân hàng Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng (AMC) provided me with a solid foundation in legal debt processing.

I am a graduate of Đại học Luật Hà Nội with a degree in Law and have also completed a specialized training program in legal practice at Học viện Tư Pháp. My education has equipped me with a strong understanding of legal principles and methodologies. In addition to my formal education, I have developed soft skills such as self-assessment, personality traits analysis, and identifying strengths and weaknesses. My hard skills include in-depth legal knowledge, training in the legal field, and proficiency in computer skills.

I am fluent in Vietnamese and have a working knowledge of French and English, enabling me to effectively communicate and work with a diverse range of clients and colleagues. I am seeking a challenging position as a legal counsel in a dynamic legal firm where I can leverage my skills and experiences to contribute to the success and growth of the organization.

overview_CV:
With over 5 years of experience in legal debt collection, I am a Chuyên viên xử lý nợ pháp lý tín chấp (Debt Legal Processing Specialist) looking to leverage my skills in a challenging and rewarding environment. Throughout my time at VPBank, I successfully managed a portfolio of non-performing loans and resolved complex legal issues, resulting in a 20% reduction in non-performing loans within a year. I am adept at handling legal debt collection for mortgage loans and have a strong background in financial analysis and loan processing expertise. My soft skills include excellent communication, problem-solving abilities, and effective time management.

My resume reflects a strong foundation in legal debt collection, highlighted by my role at VPBank where I excelled in managing non-performing loans and resolving legal matters. The Evaluation Only project further showcases my expertise as a Debt Legal Processing Specialist. I am fluent in both English and Vietnamese, and hold a certification in an unknown field, demonstrating a commitment to continuous professional development. Overall, my extensive experience, strong skill set, and dedication to growth make me a valuable asset in efficiently managing non-performing loans and legal matters.

overview_CV: With a Bachelor's degree in Finance and Banking from the University of Finance and Banking in Hanoi, along with a TOEIC Language Certificate scoring 590, I bring a strong educational background to my 2 years of experience in the banking industry. During my time at Military Commercial Joint Stock Bank (MBBANK) as a Technology and Science Specialist, I excelled in tasks such as lending, selling insurance, issuing credit cards, and handling international payments and transfers. I consistently met and exceeded sales targets, built lasting customer relationships, and demonstrated a deep understanding of banking procedures. Following this role, I transitioned to International Joint Stock Bank VIB as a customer relationship assistant manager, where I further honed my skills in customer service and relationship management. My soft skills include honesty, integrity, patience, and a focus on family, colleagues, and friends. I am proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and possess strong listening skills in English. I am now seeking a challenging position in a reputable financial institution where I can leverage my skills and continue to grow professionally in the industry.

overview_CV: With over 1 year of experience in the banking industry, I am an experienced customer relationship assistant with a strong skill set in providing personalized financial services, promoting insurance products, and issuing credit cards. I have a proven track record of meeting sales targets and maintaining strong client relationships. Currently seeking a new opportunity with MBBANK to further develop my skills and contribute to the growth of the company. In my previous role at Ngân hàng TMCP Quốc Tế VIB, I was responsible for customer relationship management, including loan processing, insurance sales, credit card issuance, and account opening. I also possess soft skills such as customer relationship management, logical thinking, teamwork, and effective communication, along with hard skills in lending, insurance sales, credit card issuance, and account opening. Additionally, I hold a certification as a Trợ lý quan hệ khách hàng from the Ngân hàng TMCP Quốc Tế VIB, with plans to transfer to MBBANK branch in Đông Anh for a higher salary offer and proximity to home. My educational background includes a degree in Trợ lý quan hệ khách hàng and Chuyên Viên KHCN from Ngân hàng TMCP Quốc Tế VIB and MBBANK respectively. I am eager to leverage my experience and skills to excel in a challenging role at MBBANK, driving sales, enhancing customer satisfaction, and contributing to the overall success of the organization.

overview_CV:
Nguyễn Lưu Trung Vũ is an experienced professional with over 10 years of experience in social work and community development. With a strong background in program management, advocacy, and building partnerships with local NGOs and government agencies, Nguyễn has led successful projects that have significantly improved the livelihoods of marginalized communities and promoted social justice. Currently working at Cục CS QLHC về TTXH in Hanoi, Nguyễn is seeking a challenging role where he can utilize his expertise to make a meaningful impact in the lives of others. With a passion for empowering individuals and communities to overcome challenges and achieve their full potential, Nguyễn is dedicated to contributing to the development of sustainable community programs and advocating for social change.

Nguyễn's key strengths lie in his excellent communication skills, ability to work effectively in a team, strong time management, problem-solving abilities, and adaptability to different situations. In terms of hard skills, Nguyễn is proficient in computer skills, data analysis, project management, customer service, and marketing. He is also fluent in Vietnamese, further enhancing his ability to connect with and support the communities he works with.

In his role at Cục CS QLHC về TTXH, Nguyễn has focused on evaluation, demonstrating his attention to detail and analytical mindset. He is driven by a desire to drive positive social impact and is committed to making a difference in the lives of those he serves. With a track record of successful projects and a dedication to advocating for social change, Nguyễn Lưu Trung Vũ is a valuable asset to any organization looking to create sustainable community programs and drive positive change.

overview_CV:
With 3 years of experience in banking and financial services, I have honed my skills in customer service, loan processing, insurance sales, and credit card issuance. My track record includes surpassing monthly sales targets by 20% and consistently earning positive feedback from clients for my professionalism and efficiency. I am currently seeking a challenging role in a well-established financial institution where I can continue to leverage my expertise and make valuable contributions to the company's success.

At ACB Bank, I served as a Sales Executive, where I excelled in providing loans, selling insurance, issuing credit cards, and facilitating various financial transactions such as opening personal and business accounts, as well as international payments and transfers. My dedication to customer satisfaction led to my successful transition to a similar role at Vietcombank, where I continued to deliver exceptional service and support to clients.

My decision to transfer to MBBank's Dong Anh branch was influenced by the opportunity for career growth and a higher salary package. Throughout my career, I have developed strong soft skills such as active listening and effective communication, which have enabled me to build lasting relationships with clients and colleagues.

In terms of hard skills, I am proficient in loan processing, insurance sales, credit card issuance, account management, and international money transfers. While my language proficiency in English and Vietnamese is not specified, I am confident in my ability to communicate effectively in both languages.

Although specific academic achievements and side projects are not outlined in this summary, my hands-on experience and proven track record in the banking industry speak volumes about my capabilities and commitment to excellence. I am excited about the prospect of joining a dynamic team where I can continue to grow and contribute towards achieving organizational goals.

overview_CV:
With over 10 years of experience in the marketing industry, I have honed my skills in digital marketing, social media management, and campaign strategy. One of my proudest achievements includes successfully launching multiple social media campaigns that resulted in a 20% increase in brand awareness and engagement. I am a results-driven professional with a keen eye for creativity and innovation, seeking to leverage my expertise to drive business growth and success in a dynamic marketing team. My goal is to utilize my strategic thinking and creative skills to exceed company goals and marketing objectives, ultimately driving brand visibility and engagement.

In addition to my extensive experience, I hold several certifications that showcase my commitment to professional development and expertise in project management and agile methodologies. I am a certified Project Management Professional (PMP) from the Project Management Institute (PMI) since 2018, bringing a wealth of knowledge in effective project execution and delivery. I am also a Certified Scrum Master (CSM) from the Scrum Alliance, demonstrating my proficiency in agile practices and collaboration within a team. Furthermore, my AWS Certified Solutions Architect certification from Amazon Web Services (AWS) highlights my technical skills in cloud architecture and solutions design. Lastly, my Six Sigma Green Belt certification from the International Association for Six Sigma Certification (IASSC) underscores my expertise in process improvement and efficiency optimization.

In addition to my technical skills, I possess excellent soft skills including communication, teamwork, leadership, time management, and problem-solving abilities. I am a strong communicator who excels in collaborating with cross-functional teams to achieve common goals. My leadership skills have been demonstrated through successful project management and team coordination, resulting in streamlined processes and increased productivity. I am adept at managing time effectively to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality results. Furthermore, my problem-solving skills have enabled me to identify and resolve issues efficiently, ensuring project success and stakeholder satisfaction.

Overall, my combination of technical expertise, certifications, and soft skills make me a valuable asset to any marketing team. I am excited about the opportunity to bring my strategic thinking, creativity, and passion for innovation to drive brand growth and success.

overview_CV:
I am a customer-focused professional with experience in customer credit and sales roles, excelling in customer service, sales, and promoting financial products. With a proven track record of meeting sales targets and ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction, I am seeking a challenging position in a dynamic organization where I can leverage my skills to drive sales and contribute to the company's success. My work experience includes an internship at Ngân hàng TMCP Á Châu - Chi nhánh Hà Thành, where I was responsible for finding potential customers, providing direct sales consultation, and telesales for various financial products. Currently, as a Sales Specialist at Công ty TNHH MTV HOME CREDIT Việt Nam, I focus on finding and developing potential customers, selling credit products, supporting existing clients, and collaborating with specialized departments for credit assessment and disbursement.

In terms of education, I have completed internships at both Ngân hàng TMCP Á Châu - Chi nhánh Hà Thành and Công ty TNHH MTV HOME CREDIT Việt Nam, where I gained valuable hands-on experience in customer credit and sales roles. My soft skills include sales consulting, telesales, customer care, customer support, understanding customer needs, and effective collaboration with specialized departments. On the technical side, I have skills in identifying potential customers, soliciting customer deposits, selling credit products, preparing loan applications, credit assessment, loan disbursement, and managing unsecured contracts. Additionally, I am fluent in Vietnamese, proficient in English, and hold certifications in customer credit and sales roles from reputable institutions.

Overall, my CV reflects my dedication to customer satisfaction, sales excellence, and financial product promotion, making me a valuable asset to any organization looking to boost sales and enhance customer relationships.

My top skills include client retention, problem-solving, and strategic planning. I am seeking a challenging role in a dynamic organization where I can utilize my expertise to drive business growth and enhance customer relationships.

I have a proven track record of leading teams to achieve a 20% increase in client satisfaction and surpassing monthly sales targets by 30%. My top soft skills include communication, problem-solving, teamwork, and time management. I am proficient in Excel, customer relationship management, data analysis, and financial forecasting. I am now seeking a challenging role in a dynamic organization where I can leverage my skills to drive business growth and enhance customer relationships. With a strong commitment to delivering exceptional service, I am well-equipped to contribute effectively to any team.

overview_CV: With 17 years of experience in the banking industry and 12 years in legal practice, I have honed my skills in litigation, legal advisory, and team management. Throughout my career, I have successfully handled complex legal cases, earned commendations from superiors, and maintained high levels of client satisfaction. My academic background includes a Bachelor of Law from Hanoi Law University and a Bachelor of Economics from National Economics University. Additionally, I have completed a certification in the Lawyer Profession from the Judicial Academy. In my role as the Head of Litigation Department at Viet Vision Law Company and National Bank, I was responsible for handling civil and criminal cases, showcasing my expertise in legal practice. My soft skills include being a good listener, team player, adaptable to new environments, highly responsible, honest, and able to work independently and in a team. On the technical side, my skills include proficiency in computers, quick problem-solving abilities, debt collection, trial skills, and working alongside lawyers in criminal cases. I am fluent in Vietnamese and have an intermediate level of English proficiency. My goal is to leverage my extensive experience and skills to contribute to a dynamic organization where I can continue to grow and make a positive impact. I am seeking a challenging position that will allow me to utilize my expertise in a new and rewarding environment.

CV__summary:
Summary:
With over 15 years of experience in the banking industry, I have developed strong skills in handling overdue accounts, debt recovery, and legal proceedings. Some of my biggest achievements include successfully resolving complex cases involving large debts and disputed assets. I am seeking a new work environment where I can continue to utilize my expertise in debt collection and contribute to the success of the organization.

Objective:
To leverage my extensive experience in debt recovery and legal proceedings to effectively manage and resolve overdue accounts in a challenging and dynamic work environment. I aim to contribute to the success of the organization by utilizing my skills and knowledge in the banking industry.
Work__experience:
1. Job Title: Trưởng bộ phận tố tụng Miền Bắc
   Company: Ngân hàng TMCP Quốc Dân
   Start Date: 2016/10
   End Date: 2023/06
   Roles and Jobs: 
   - Receive overdue loan applications from businesses in the North, process and allocate files for 6 to 8 credit officers by region. 
   - Monitor, urge, approve plans before submitting to department head, and coordinate with credit officers to implement measures such as urging, seizure, litigation, enforcement, and accusation. 
   - Weekly report to department head; monthly attendance at meetings with bank leadership and credit institutions on the progress of handling overdue files.

overview_CV:
With over 15 years of experience in the banking industry, I am currently serving as the Trưởng bộ phận tố tụng Miền Bắc at Ngân hàng TMCP Quốc Dân, where I excel in handling overdue accounts, debt recovery, and legal proceedings. Throughout my career, I have successfully resolved complex cases involving large debts and disputed assets, showcasing my expertise in debt collection. In my previous roles as a Chuyên viên and Chuyên viên cao cấp at various branches of renowned banks like Ngân hàng TMCP Bảo Việt and Ngân hàng TMCP Sài Gòn - Hà Nội, I have managed and resolved around 50 overdue loan files, implementing strategies for debt collection, litigation, enforcement, and asset handling nationwide in different regions.

My exceptional skills include communication, problem-solving, teamwork, time management, conflict resolution, and critical thinking, enabling me to effectively navigate challenging situations in the banking industry. With a strong foundation in legal knowledge, debt collection, asset management, and litigation, I have consistently contributed to the success of the organizations I have worked for. I hold degrees from prestigious banking institutions such as Ngân hàng TMCP Quốc Dân, Ngân hàng TMCP Bảo Việt, Ngân hàng TMCP Sài Gòn - Hà Nội, and Ngân hàng TMCP Nhà Hà Nội, further solidifying my expertise in the field.

In my current role at Ngân hàng TMCP Quốc Dân, I oversee the processing of overdue loan applications, allocate files to credit officers, and implement strategies for urging, seizure, litigation, and enforcement. I have successfully handled complex cases involving property disputes and collaborated with credit officers to ensure effective debt recovery. Regularly reporting progress to department heads and attending meetings with bank leadership and credit institutions, I showcase my dedication to achieving optimal results in debt collection.

Overall, my comprehensive experience, strong skill set, and proven track record of successfully resolving challenging cases make me a valuable asset in debt recovery and legal proceedings within the banking industry. I am eager to bring my expertise to a new work environment where I can continue to contribute to the success of the organization.

I am now seeking a challenging position in a financial institution where I can contribute to the organization's success.

My soft skills in communication, teamwork, and time management, along with hard skills in Microsoft Office, data analysis, and customer service, further enhance my qualifications. Fluent in Vietnamese, I bring a multicultural perspective to the table, enriching team collaboration and project outcomes. As a proactive learner, I aim to continually enhance my knowledge and skills to stay abreast of industry trends and best practices.

overview_CV:
As a recent graduate with a Bachelor's degree in Law & Economics from Hanoi Law University, I bring a strong academic background with a GPA of 3.32 and have completed various legal training courses. My standout achievement includes efficiently managing legal procedures for business registration, licensing, and property disputes during my tenure at J&T Express. Proficient in both English and Vietnamese, I possess exceptional legal research and contract drafting skills. Seeking a challenging legal position to leverage my legal knowledge and skills to contribute to the success of a dynamic organization, I am eager to continue learning and growing in my legal career while making a positive impact in the legal field.

During my time at CÔNG TY TNHH MTV CPN THUẬN PHONG (J&T EXPRESS), I honed my skills as a legal staff member, focusing on tasks such as completing legal procedures related to business operations, handling property disputes, drafting various business contracts, and ensuring compliance with legal regulations. 

My education at Hanoi Law University, specializing in Economic Law, equipped me with a comprehensive understanding of legal principles and the ability to apply them effectively in practical settings. Additionally, my soft skills such as communication, problem-solving, teamwork, adaptability, and time management further enhance my professional profile.

As I continue to evolve in my legal career, I am committed to upholding ethical standards, staying updated on legal developments, and delivering high-quality legal solutions to support organizational goals. My blend of academic excellence, practical experience, and strong work ethic positions me as a valuable asset to any legal team looking for a dedicated and skilled legal professional.

overview_CV:
With over 2 years of solid experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in customer service, debt collection, and financial analysis, consistently meeting targets and enhancing customer satisfaction. One of my significant accomplishments includes successfully recovering $10,000,000 in early debt collection. I am now seeking new challenges and opportunities for personal growth in a dynamic work environment where I can continue to excel and contribute effectively.

My objective is to secure a challenging position in the banking sector where I can apply my expertise in debt collection, customer service, and financial analysis to drive company objectives and further enhance my professional capabilities. In my recent role as a Debt Collection Officer at a Financial Joint Stock Company, I managed assigned customer portfolios, conducted debt collection calls, ensured customer commitments were met, and consistently met KPI targets. Additionally, I possess a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from ABC University and have completed training in Project Management and Data Analysis. My language skills include a TOEFL certification with a score of 110 and proficiency in English.

Furthermore, my soft skills encompass strong communication, problem-solving, time management, teamwork, and adaptability. On the technical side, I excel in computer skills, financial analysis, debt collection, customer relationship management, and compliance with KPIs. I am highly motivated to leverage my expertise and experiences in a new role that challenges me to grow professionally and make a meaningful contribution to the organization. My references are available upon request.

overview_CV: Hello, my name is LÊ TRUNG HIẾU and I am a Chuyên viên thu hồi nợ sớm (nhóm SME- Hà Nội) professional based in Hà Nội, Việt Nam. With 2 years of experience in debt recovery and customer service, I possess strong communication abilities, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills. I have a proven track record of consistently meeting or exceeding monthly recovery targets and maintaining high customer satisfaction ratings. I am seeking a challenging role as an Early Debt Recovery Specialist where I can leverage my skills to help the company achieve its financial goals while delivering excellent customer service. My hard skills include debt collection, financial analysis, risk assessment, negotiation, and data analysis, while my soft skills encompass communication, problem-solving, teamwork, time management, and adaptability. I am fluent in Vietnamese and English, holding a certification as a Chuyên viên thu hồi nợ sớm (nhóm SME- Hà Nội) from VPBank.

CV__summary:
Summary:
With nearly 2 years of experience in customer business and international payment roles at SHB Bank, I possess strong knowledge of import-export operations and sales skills. I have successfully managed a loan portfolio of over 400 billion VND with zero non-performing loans. My top skills include financial planning, customer relationship management, and fluency in English. I am seeking a challenging position where I can leverage my skills and experience to bring value to VP Bank.

Career Objective:
To secure a challenging position in the banking sector where I can utilize my expertise in customer business and international payment, as well as my strong communication and organizational skills. I am eager to contribute to the growth and success of VP Bank by leveraging my experience and knowledge in financial services.

overview_CV: With nearly 2 years of experience in customer business and international payment roles at SHB Bank, I have honed my expertise in import-export operations and sales, managing a loan portfolio of over 400 billion VND with an impeccable record of zero non-performing loans. My strong financial planning skills, adept customer relationship management, and fluency in English set me apart as a candidate ready to excel in the banking sector. Currently working at Prudential Vietnam, expanding my knowledge in insurance and achieving rapid promotion to Deputy Sales Manager, I am eager to bring my diverse skill set to VP Bank. Holding a Bachelor's degree in International Economics from the Academy of Policy and Development, with a solid GPA of 3.16, I also hold a TOEFL certification in English and MOS certification in office computing. Adept at adapting quickly, collaborating effectively, and demonstrating a passion for business, I bring a blend of hard skills like export-import knowledge, sales expertise in insurance, and proficiency in office computing, alongside a suite of soft skills from friendliness and adaptability to perseverance and community engagement. My strong communication and organizational abilities, paired with my proven track record of success in the finance industry, make me a valuable asset to any team.

overview_CV: Hello, I am Hoàng Tuấn Việt Anh, a detail-oriented professional with 2 years of experience in debt recovery. My top skills include strong communication, negotiation, and problem-solving abilities. Some of my biggest achievements include successfully recovering overdue debts and maintaining positive relationships with clients. I specialize in early debt recovery and optimization of debt collection processes to minimize risks for the bank. I hold a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from ABC University and was the Valedictorian at XYZ High School. My soft skills include communication, problem-solving, time management, teamwork, and adaptability, while my hard skills range from debt recovery and financial analysis to customer service and data analysis using tools like Microsoft Excel. I am fluent in Vietnamese and English, and I am certified as an Early Debt Recovery Specialist by VPBank. I am now seeking a challenging role in debt recovery to further develop my skills and contribute to the success of the team. Thank you.

My objective is to secure a challenging position in a company where I can continue to grow professionally and contribute to the organization's success.

I am eager to contribute to a dynamic team and grow professionally within a stable and supportive work environment.

overview_CV:
With over 2 years of experience in investment consulting and business development, I have sharpened my skills in evaluating and analyzing businesses to provide effective investment strategies for clients. I excel in customer acquisition and retention, showcasing a successful track record in challenging market conditions. Noteworthy achievements include securing export opportunities through online platforms and supporting the operation of online stores. My past roles at Công ty Chứng Khoán VPS and Công ty CP Thương mại và Dịch vụ HBS Việt Nam have equipped me with the expertise in investment analysis, customer relationship management, export market research, and operations on Alibaba.com platform. Moreover, my soft skills in communication, problem-solving, customer service, time management, teamwork, and analytical skills have been honed through practical experience.

In my role as an Investment Consultant at Công ty Chứng Khoán VPS, I was responsible for evaluating and analyzing businesses to provide effective investment plans for clients, as well as customer acquisition and retention. Similarly, as a Sales Representative at Công ty CP Thương mại và Dịch vụ HBS Việt Nam, I focused on finding customers interested in exporting goods overseas through Alibaba.com and assisted in store operations and export documentation handling. These experiences have shaped me into a well-rounded professional with a strong foundation in investment consulting and business development.

My educational background includes studying at Công ty Chứng Khoán VPS and Công ty CP Thương mại và Dịch vụ HBS Việt Nam, where I acquired practical knowledge and skills essential for my career. Additionally, I hold certifications from both organizations in specific responsibilities related to investment analysis and customer acquisition for export purposes.

Currently seeking a challenging role in investment consulting or business development, I am eager to contribute to a dynamic team and further develop my expertise in evaluating and analyzing businesses to drive strategic investment decisions. I am looking for opportunities for career advancement and personal growth within a stable and supportive work environment. Thank you for considering my application, and I look forward to the possibility of contributing to your team.

overview_CV:
With over 5 years of extensive experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in customer service, financial analysis, and risk management. I have a proven track record of success, including increasing client retention rates by 20% and implementing cost-effective strategies that led to a 15% reduction in operational expenses. I am a highly motivated and results-driven professional seeking a challenging role in a dynamic organization where I can apply my expertise to drive growth and success. My objective is to secure a position in VPBank where I can contribute effectively to the company's objectives and continue to enhance my professional skills.

I possess strong soft skills such as communication, teamwork, problem-solving, time management, and adaptability. In terms of hard skills, I excel in data analysis, financial management, project management, and have expertise in customer service. My ability to understand and analyze complex financial data, coupled with my proficiency in various software applications, sets me apart as a skilled professional in the banking industry. I am dedicated to delivering exceptional service to clients and have a proven ability to work effectively within a team to achieve organizational goals. 

In seeking new challenges and opportunities for growth, I am confident in my ability to make valuable contributions to VPBank and excel in a dynamic and fast-paced environment. I am committed to continuous learning and development to stay current with industry trends and best practices. My strong work ethic, attention to detail, and commitment to excellence make me a valuable asset to any organization. I am excited about the possibility of joining VPBank and contributing to its success. Thank you for considering my application.

Qua tìm hiểu mình được biết VPBank là 1 trong những ngân hàng có Môi trường làm việc hiện đại và năng động, tuy có tính cạnh tranh cao
nhưng kèm theo nó là có nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến. Ngoài ra mình nghĩ có được một mức thu nhập ổn định để nâng cao chất lượng cuộc sống nên
tôi đã chọn VPBank. Tôi tin, VPBank sẽ phát triển và tôi rất tự hào khi là một nhân viên của VPBank.14. Anh/chị từng được khen thưởng hoặc bị kỷ luật chưa? Anh/chị vui lòng chia sẻ chi tiết về thông tin khen thưởng/kỷ luật(nếu có)

tôi đã khai. Tôi xin hoàn toàn chịu trách nhiệm nếu những thông tin trên sai lệch. Tôi tự nguyện và cam kết công khai minh bạch khi tham gia
các bước trong quy trình tuyển dụng của VPBank.

I am eager to bring my expertise to VPBank and continue advancing in my career while contributing to the success of the company.

overview_CV: Hello, I am Đỗ Hoàng Nam Tiến, a highly motivated individual with 2 years of experience in the banking industry. My key strengths lie in customer service, financial analysis, and risk management. I have successfully increased customer satisfaction scores by 20% and reduced risk exposure by 15% through effective risk assessment strategies. My goal is to leverage my skills and experience to contribute to the success of a dynamic and forward-thinking organization in the banking sector. I possess strong communication, teamwork, problem-solving, and time management skills, along with proficiency in Microsoft Office, data analysis, project management, and financial modeling. I am excited to bring my expertise and dedication to a new opportunity in the banking industry. Feel free to contact me at dohoang9999@gmail.com or 0916899999. Thank you.

overview_CV:
Hello, my name is [Candidate Name], and I am an experienced professional in the banking industry with a strong background in customer service and financial products. With 5 years of experience, I have honed my skills in communication, problem-solving, and attention to detail, which have led me to exceed sales targets and earn positive feedback from clients. I am currently seeking a position at VPBank where I can contribute to the company's growth and success, while further enhancing my skills in a dynamic environment.

My objective is to leverage my experience and skills in the banking industry to make a valuable contribution to VPBank. I bring a strong work ethic and a passion for customer service, and I am eager to be part of a team-oriented environment where I can continue to learn and grow professionally.

In my previous role as a Customer Service Representative at ABC Company, I provided excellent customer support, handled inquiries, and resolved issues efficiently. Additionally, as a Sales Associate at XYZ Corporation, I assisted customers with product information, processed transactions, and ensured store cleanliness.

In terms of skills, I possess strong soft skills such as communication, teamwork, problem-solving, and time management. My hard skills include financial analysis, customer service, data analysis, and banking operations.

While my language proficiency is not specified, I am confident in my ability to adapt and learn new languages as needed. I am excited about the opportunity to bring my expertise and dedication to VPBank and contribute to the company's continued success. Thank you for considering my application.

overview_CV: With a strong background in communication and a passion for learning new experiences, I am a dynamic and outgoing individual seeking a challenging role in a dynamic organization. With 3 years of experience in the banking sector and 5 years in other fields, I excel at managing time effectively and completing tasks proactively. My biggest achievements include successfully developing business plans and marketing strategies, as well as building strong relationships with clients. While my language skills may be limited, I am eager to further develop them and continue growing in my career. In my previous role as a Trưởng Phòng Kinh Doanh at CÔNG TY TNHH PCCC VIÊT SING, I developed business plans, wrote advertising content, and built strong relationships with clients through effective communication and support. I also proactively sought out new clients for PCCC systems and handled economic contracts. Additionally, my time at CONG TY TNHH THỊNH KIÊN HÀ NỘI as a Nhân viên allowed me to further hone my communication and teamwork skills. With a degree in Lập trình from Trường Cao Đẳng Bách Nghệ Hải Phòng, I possess strong hard skills in programming and computer literacy, as well as soft skills in effective time management, adaptability, and a proactive approach to work. I am eager to contribute to the success of a team and continue to develop professionally in a rewarding work environment.

overview_CV: With 4 years of experience in the legal field, I, Nguyễn Tâm Anh, have honed strong negotiation and communication skills. My notable achievement includes effectively recovering debts through a combination of communication prowess and legal knowledge. Currently seeking a challenging Sales Executive position to leverage these skills for driving business growth and hitting targets. In my previous role at Srisawad as a Legal Officer, I excelled in tasks such as gathering documents, meeting with clients to discuss debts, negotiating payment terms, and enforcing debt collection procedures. I also verified local government information and provided guidance to clients on loan repayments. My ability to apply pressure on clients to fulfill their financial obligations was instrumental in my role. Furthermore, I possess soft skills such as advisory support, negotiation, and assuming responsibility, along with hard skills like information gathering, debt recovery, and government information verification. Eager to contribute my expertise and propel organizational success as a Sales Executive. Contact me at ankh999@gmail.com or 0865799999.

I am a dedicated and experienced professional with a strong background in debt collection and legal proceedings. With 3 years of experience in the field, I have developed strong communication and negotiation skills that have helped me successfully recover debts for clients. I have a proven track record of achieving targets and exceeding expectations in a fast-paced environment. My top skills include attention to detail, problem-solving, and time management.

Objective:
Seeking a challenging position as a Specialist in Debt Recovery and Legal Proceedings for a dynamic organization in Hanoi. I aim to utilize my skills and expertise to effectively recover debts for clients while contributing to the success of the company. With a goal-oriented mindset and a passion for achieving results, I am eager to make a positive impact and further develop my career in this field.

overview_CV: My name is BÙI TUẤN ANH, and I am a skilled Specialist in Debt Recovery and Legal Proceedings located in Hanoi. With 3 years of experience in the field, I have honed my abilities in communication and negotiation, allowing me to effectively recover debts for clients. I excel in fast-paced environments, consistently achieving targets and exceeding expectations. My key strengths lie in attention to detail, problem-solving, and time management. I am currently seeking a challenging position where I can utilize my expertise to contribute to the success of a dynamic organization. My goal-oriented mindset and passion for achieving results drive me to make a positive impact and further develop my career in debt recovery and legal proceedings. My professional skills include debt recovery, legal procedures, customer service, data analysis, and financial knowledge. Additionally, I possess soft skills such as communication, problem-solving, time management, teamwork, and adaptability. Furthermore, I am fluent in both Vietnamese and English, allowing me to effectively communicate and negotiate in both languages.

overview_CV: With over 3 years of experience in the banking industry, specializing in fraud investigation and risk management, I am a seasoned professional seeking a new opportunity in the legal field to further develop my skills and contribute to a dynamic team. During my time at VPBank, I honed my skills in using T24, LOS, and WAY4 systems, conducting client interviews, and preparing thorough investigation reports. I have a proven track record of participating in skills training courses, researching files for fraud investigations, working directly with customers, and supporting the preparation of investigation reports. In addition, my educational background includes a degree in Legal Studies from the University of Law Hanoi with a GPA of 3.13, showcasing my dedication to continuous learning and professional growth. My soft skills include being strong, decisive, dynamic, enthusiastic, eager to learn, disciplined, and able to handle high-pressure situations effectively. Furthermore, my hard skills encompass proficiency in computer skills, utilizing various systems, conducting fraud investigations, and assisting in report writing. I am fluent in Vietnamese and have a basic understanding of English. I am eager to bring my unique blend of experience, skills, and passion for the legal field to a new role where I can continue to grow and make a positive impact.

overview_CV: With over three years of experience in the retail industry, I have honed my skills in customer service, sales, and inventory management. My significant accomplishments include driving nearly 20 billion in revenue for a company within a year and spearheading the opening of 20 new stores in the same timeframe. I am currently seeking a challenging role in the fashion industry to apply my expertise and contribute to the growth of a renowned company. During my time at Công ty TNHH Routine Việt Nam, I excelled in roles such as customer consultation, resolving inquiries, and managing inventory, ensuring smooth daily operations and meeting revenue targets. At Công ty TNHH Savor Việt Nam, I further enhanced my sales and customer service skills by directly engaging with customers, managing inventory, and addressing customer queries through various online platforms. My tenure at Công ty TNHH Guardian Việt Nam allowed me to expand my customer service repertoire by providing personalized product advice, maintaining and developing customer relations, and evaluating market demands aligned with the company's objectives. My educational background includes completing courses at Routine Việt Nam, Savor Việt Nam, and Guardian Việt Nam, where I acquired hands-on experience and knowledge relevant to the retail industry. Additionally, I possess a robust set of soft skills such as consulting, customer care, and feedback management, alongside hard skills like inventory auditing, data processing, and revenue reporting. I am proficient in the Vietnamese language and have obtained certifications from reputable organizations like Công ty TNHH Routine Việt Nam, Công ty TNHH Savor Việt Nam, and Công ty TNHH Guardian Việt Nam, showcasing my commitment to continuous professional development. I am excited to contribute my talents to a dynamic team in the fashion industry and enhance my career further in the retail sector.

I am fluent in Vietnamese and English. Though I have applied to VPBank in the past, I have not previously worked at the organization. I am excited about the opportunity to bring my skills and experience to VPBank and contribute to its growth and prosperity.

overview_CV:
I am a proactive and results-oriented individual with 3 years of experience in business development and sales across various industries. My expertise lies in sales strategy development, customer relationship management, and market analysis. Notable accomplishments include driving a 20% increase in sales revenue in my previous role. I am currently seeking a challenging position in a forward-thinking company where I can apply my skills to propel business growth and success. 

In my previous roles at Au Viet Industrial Joint Stock Company, INECSO Joint Stock Company, and GFDI Investment Consulting Co., Ltd., I honed my abilities in managing sales operations, developing business strategies, and fostering client relationships. From conducting market research to implementing effective sales tactics, I have acquired a diverse skill set that enables me to deliver outstanding results.

My educational background at the Banking Academy in Vietnam, majoring in Business Administration, has equipped me with a solid foundation in business principles. Additionally, my proficiency in computer skills, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Canva, and Photoshop, enhances my ability to create impactful strategies and presentations.

I possess a blend of soft skills such as being sociable, cheerful, and highly adaptable, which allow me to collaborate effectively with colleagues and clients. Furthermore, my hard skills in business management and computer proficiency give me a competitive edge in executing tasks efficiently.

With a strong work ethic, excellent communication skills, and the ability to thrive under pressure, I am well-equipped to take on new challenges and drive sustainable growth for your company. I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your team and help achieve your business objectives. Thank you for considering my application.

My proficiency in communication, teamwork, time management, problem-solving, interpersonal skills, Microsoft Office, data analysis, project management, financial analysis, and risk management make me a valuable asset to any team. Additionally, my fluency in Vietnamese and advanced level of English language proficiency enhance my ability to collaborate effectively on a global scale. I am ready to take on new challenges and contribute to the success of your organization.

overview_CV:
With over 3 years of experience in banking and finance, I, Nguyễn Thị Hồng, have honed my skills in transaction management, customer service, and financial analysis. Having worked at SCB and ABBANK, I have handled various banking operations such as cash transactions, deposits, withdrawals, and foreign exchange with precision. My role involved efficiently managing customer accounts while ensuring strict adherence to banking regulations. Currently, as a Chuyên viên chính Thanh toán, I seek a challenging opportunity where I can leverage my expertise to contribute to the growth of a dynamic and professional organization.

My career started as a Giao dịch viên at SCB, where I executed transactional tasks with customers and managed client relationships effectively. I also took charge of the cash flow and asset management responsibilities. Moving on, at ABBANK as a Giao dịch viên, I handled cash transactions within designated limits, managed deposits, service fee collections, and facilitated domestic and international transfers for clients. Currently, I'm serving as a Giao dịch viên at SCB, where I continue to excel in transaction operations, client interaction, and asset management.

Education wise, I graduated with a degree in Tài chính ngân hàng from Đại học Thương Mại with a commendable performance. Additionally, I hold certifications in English proficiency with TOEFL ITP, office computer skills, and accounting expertise. My soft skills encompass communication, customer service, time management, problem-solving, teamwork, adaptability, and attention to detail. On the hard skills front, I am proficient in financial transactions, customer relationship management, cash handling, foreign exchange transactions, accounting, Microsoft Office, and bank procedures and policies.

In summary, I bring a robust combination of experience, skills, and education to any organization in need of a Payment Specialist. My track record of success in the banking sector, coupled with my educational background and certifications, positions me as a valuable asset for any team. I am confident in my ability to make a positive impact and drive growth within a professional setting. Feel free to contact me at nguyenha99999@gmail.com or 0346999999 to discuss how I can contribute to your organization's success.

Lý tưởng sống của tôi là: “ Sống để được làm việc và làm việc để sống”. Có thể nói, tôi là một người yêu và thích được làm việc. Được làm công việc mình yêu thích là niềm vui và hạnh phúc của tôi bởi nó đem lại cho tôi niềm tin trong cuộc sống và sự tự tin đối với chính bản thân mình. Chuyên viên Hỗ trợ Tác nghiệp và Giải Ngân tại Công ty Tài chính TNHH MTV Cộng Đồng (FCCOM) thuộc Ngân Hàng TMCP Hàng Hải (MSB)

10/2020 - 12/2021

Giao dịch viên tại Ngân Hàng TMCP Hàng Hải (MSB)

5/2017 - 9/2019

Giao dịch viên tại Ngân Hàng TMCP Đông Nam Á (SeABank)

05/2016 - 4/2017

Nhân viên kinh doanh tại Công ty Phần mềm Kế toán MISA

8/2015 - 11/2015

Thực tập kế toán tại công ty TNHH MTV Sách và thương mại Hà Nội



THÀNH TÍCH HOẠT ĐỘNG

Thủ khoa đầu vào khóa 2.1 hệ sau đại học - ngành Quản trị kinh doanh -  trường đại học Công Nghệ Giao Thông Vận Tải năm 2016.

Thành viên đội văn nghệ Ngân Hàng TMCP Đông Nam Á (SeABank).

Trưởng đội Tình nguyện viên đội Hiến Máu Tình Nguyện trường ĐH Công nghệ Giao thông Vận tải từ năm 2012-2015.

Thí sinh Hoa khôi Sinh viên Việt Nam năm 2015.

Thành viên đội Sinh viên tình nguyện Mùa Hè Xanh tại trường ĐH Công nghệ Giao thông Vận tải từ năm 2012-2016.

Thành viên đội nam thanh nữ tú tham gia Rước kiệu Lễ hội 5 làng Mọc (Thanh Xuân - Hà Nội).

Thành viên chính của các giải thể thao phong trào teambuilding, như kéo co, chạy, bơi, nhảy bao bố… 



KỸ NĂNG 

Sử dụng thành thạo các chương trình tin học văn phòng (Winword, Excel, Power Point), sử dụng được phần mềm kế toán EXCEL, MISA và có khả năng đánh máy tốt.

Chứng chỉ tiếng Anh B1

Khả năng giao tiếp tốt và thích nghi nhanh với hoàn cảnh mới.

Nhiệt tình, có trách nhiệm với công việc được giao và các khả năng làm việc dưới áp lực và cường độ cao.

Một số kỹ năng khác như kỹ năng thuyết trình, kỹ năng tổ chức hội thảo, kỹ năng tiếp khách …

Kỹ năng biểu diễn tiết mục văn nghệ của cơ quan, đoàn thể.

Sức bền, chiều cao nổi trội và năng khiếu thể thao trong các giải phong trào (kéo co, nhảy bao bố, chạy, bơi)

Kỹ năng chỉnh ảnh, dựng video trên các ứng dụng điện thoại thông minh và máy tính.

overview_CV:
Nguyễn Thị Huyền is a dedicated finance professional with over 5 years of experience in transaction support and disbursement. Holding a Master's degree in Business Administration and a Bachelor's degree in Accounting, she has excelled in various roles at prestigious financial institutions such as MSB Bank and SeABank, where she received recognition for her academic achievements. Huyền's strong communication skills, proficiency in Microsoft Office and accounting software, and ability to thrive in high-pressure environments make her a valuable asset to any team. Currently working as a Specialist in Operations Support and Disbursement at FCCOM, a subsidiary of Maritime Commercial Joint Stock Bank, she is seeking new challenges to further utilize her expertise and continue her professional growth in the finance sector.

Throughout her career, Huyền has gained valuable experience in roles such as Transaction Officer at MSB Bank and SeABank, as well as Sales Staff at MISA Accounting Software Company. Her educational background includes a Bachelor's degree in Accounting from the University of Transport Technology, where she graduated with distinction, showcasing her academic excellence. Additionally, she has demonstrated soft skills such as strong communication, adaptability to new environments, a proactive attitude towards work, and the ability to work effectively under pressure.

Huyền's hard skills include proficiency in Microsoft Office applications, accounting software like EXCEL and MISA, excellent typing skills, and a B1 certification in English. She also possesses skills in photo editing, video editing on smartphones and computers, and has a strong background in organizing seminars and cultural performances for organizations. With fluency in both English and Vietnamese, she is well-equipped to communicate effectively in multicultural environments.

Overall, Nguyễn Thị Huyền's combination of academic achievements, professional experience, and diverse skill set make her a standout candidate for opportunities in the finance industry. Her commitment to excellence, strong work ethic, and passion for continuous learning set her apart and position her as a valuable contributor to any organization she joins.

overview_CV: Hello, I am a proactive and friendly individual with a strong attention to detail and excellent learning abilities. With a background in customer service and sales at Amazon, as well as experience in risk management and operations at Techcombank, I possess top skills in communication, problem-solving, and data analysis. My achievements include winning the Encouragement Award for Student Scientific Research at the National Economics University and maintaining a high GPA of 3.58 in my major. I am proficient in Microsoft Office and Power BI and have a B2 certification in English from the British Council. Seeking a role that offers personal and professional growth opportunities, I aim to contribute positively to the success of the organization in the long term. My hard skills in risk management, operations, customer care, sales, and report writing, along with my soft skills in friendliness, positivity, and punctuality, make me a valuable asset to any team. Thank you for considering my profile.

CV__summary:
Summary: 

Experienced Risk Supervision Specialist with a background in monitoring transaction risks in the banking industry. Skilled in risk management, fraud detection, and customer complaint resolution. Proven track record of identifying fraudulent activities and implementing strategies to mitigate risks. Seeking a challenging role in a dynamic environment where I can contribute my expertise and continue to grow professionally.

Career Objective: 

To leverage my expertise in risk supervision and fraud detection to contribute to a reputable organization that values employee development and long-term commitment. My goal is to enhance risk management practices and provide innovative solutions to ensure the security of the organization's financial transactions.

overview_CV: With a solid background in risk supervision and fraud detection in the banking sector, I am an experienced Risk Supervision Specialist skilled in identifying fraudulent activities and implementing effective risk management strategies. During my tenure at Ngân hàng TMCP Kỹ Thương Việt Nam (Techcombank), I excelled in monitoring and supervising card transactions, investigating fraud activities, handling customer inquiries and complaints, and staying updated on fraud trends. I am proficient in risk management, electronic banking, fraud detection, financial analysis, and compliance monitoring. My strong communication skills, problem-solving abilities, attention to detail, teamwork, and customer service orientation have been instrumental in my success. I hold a certification in risk supervision and fraud detection from Techcombank and am seeking a challenging role in a dynamic environment where I can contribute my expertise and continue to grow professionally. My goal is to enhance risk management practices and provide innovative solutions to ensure the security of financial transactions while contributing to the long-term success of the organization.

12.5. Nếu không trúng tuyển tại Đơn vị dự tuyển, Anh/Chị có thể làm việc tại đâu trong hệ thống VPBank
Nếu không trúng tuyển tại vị trí ứng tuyển, mình hi vọng có thể có cơ hội tiếp tục ứng tuyển vào vị trí Chuyên viên quản lý rủi ro thẻ của
VPBank. Nhưng hơn hết với kiến thức, kinh nghiệm cũng như mong muốn hiện tại, rất mong có cơ hội được phỏng vấn và làm việc ở vị trí này.13. Tại sao Anh/Chị muốn làm việc tại VPBank
VPBank là một trong những ngân hàng TMCP đứng đầu Việt Nam và được vinh danh là nơi làm việc tốt nhất trong những năm qua, môi trường
làm việc chuyên nghiệp với khả năng đào tạo chuyên môn nghiệp vụ tốt cùng những chính sách phát triển nhân tài và chế độ đãi ngộ tốt cho
CBCNV. Nhưng hơn hết, với kiến thức, kĩ năng và kinh nghiệm đã tích lũy bản thân em hi vọng có thể làm tiếp tục được làm công việc mình
yêu thích và phát huy tối đa khả năng của mình đóng góp cho sự phát triển của ngân hàng.14. Anh/chị từng được khen thưởng hoặc bị kỷ luật chưa? Anh/chị vui lòng chia sẻ chi tiết về thông tin khen thưởng/kỷ luật(nếu có)
Trong quá trình làm việc hơn 1 năm ở vị trí công việc cũ, mình đã từng được khen thưởng là top 3 nhân viên đạt chỉ tiêu phòng tháng 1/2023
và tuyên dương nhân viên có nhiều Kaizen tháng 7/2023.Tôi xin cam đoan những thông tin cung cấp trên đây là hoàn toàn đúng sự thật và đầy đủ. Tôi đồng ý để Ngân hàng thẩm tra những điều mà
tôi đã khai. Tôi xin hoàn toàn chịu trách nhiệm nếu những thông tin trên sai lệch. Tôi tự nguyện và cam kết công khai minh bạch khi tham gia
các bước trong quy trình tuyển dụng của VPBank.
Anh/chị vui lòng ghi đúng ngày anh/chị khai thông tin, ký và ghi rõ họ tên đầy đủ

overview_CV: With over 5 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in customer service, financial analysis, and risk management. My track record includes a 15% increase in customer satisfaction rates and implementing cost-saving measures that led to a 10% revenue growth. I am currently seeking a challenging position at VPBank where I can leverage my expertise to drive business growth and exceed customer expectations. My educational background includes a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from the University of California, Berkeley, where I honed my analytical and problem-solving skills. Additionally, as a valedictorian at Cypress High School, I have demonstrated my ability to excel academically and thrive in competitive environments. My hard skills range from financial analysis and marketing strategy to project management and data analysis, supported by my proficiency in customer service. I am also fluent in Vietnamese, adding a valuable asset to any organization aiming to expand its reach in the Vietnamese market. My strong communication, teamwork, adaptability, and time management skills further enhance my ability to excel in a fast-paced banking environment. My dedication to continuous learning is evident in my certification from VPBank, showcasing my commitment to professional development and growth. VP Bank là một thương hiệu tuyển dụng mạnh với chế độ lương thưởng hấp dẫn, môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp và có nhiều cơ hội thăng

overview_CV: Hello, my name is Nguyễn Thị Thu Thủy and I am an experienced International Payment Specialist based in Hà Nội. With a strong background in handling international transactions and ensuring compliance with regulations, I have honed my analytical and problem-solving skills over 3 years in the banking industry. My key accomplishments include optimizing payment processes and reducing errors by 15%. I am currently seeking a challenging role in a dynamic organization where I can leverage my expertise to drive success and continue advancing my career. My proficiency in international payment processing, financial knowledge, data analysis, risk management, and compliance regulations, combined with my soft skills in communication, problem-solving, teamwork, adaptability, and time management, make me a valuable asset to any team. I hold a certification as a Chuyên viên thanh toán quốc tế from VPBank, further solidifying my qualifications in this field. Thank you for considering my application for the International Payment Specialist position at your esteemed institution.

Summary:
With over 2 years of experience in the banking industry, I have developed strong skills in financial transactions, customer service, and client relationship management. I have achieved success in delivering top-notch services and meeting client needs while adhering to bank policies and procedures. My biggest achievements include managing cash funds efficiently and providing personalized financial advice to clients. I am seeking a challenging role in the banking sector where I can continue to utilize my skills and contribute to the growth of the organization.

Career Objective:
To secure a position in a reputable financial institution where I can utilize my expertise in financial transactions, customer service, and client relationship management to provide exceptional services to clients. I am eager to further expand my skills and contribute to the success of the organization while striving for personal and professional growth.

   - Conduct financial transactions for customers, such as cash deposits/withdrawals, check transactions, loan disbursement/closure, foreign exchange buying/selling, following bank procedures and policies.
   - Provide services to customers quickly and efficiently as requested.
   - Care for customers and ensure service standards and quality for customers according to bank regulations.
   - Manage customer information files, credit card profiles.
   - Check the accuracy, completeness, and validity of documents for each transaction including both cash and non-cash transactions.

   - Ensure the accuracy and clarity of all advice, transactions.

overview_CV: With over 2 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in financial transactions, customer service, and client relationship management. My tenure at Techcombank has allowed me to excel in delivering top-notch services, meeting client needs, and adhering to bank policies and procedures. As a Senior Transaction Officer, I efficiently managed cash funds and provided personalized financial advice to clients. In my role as a Personal Financial Service Advisor, I excelled in performing non-cash transactions, reconciling customer accounts, and cross-selling additional products. Beyond my professional experience, I have also developed a personal finance tracker application to manage my own finances and volunteered as a teacher to provide English classes for underprivileged children. With a Bachelor's Degree from Banking Academy, I am now seeking a challenging role in the banking sector where I can continue to utilize my expertise and contribute to organizational growth. My strong hard skills in financial transactions, personal financial service advisory, and customer information management, coupled with my soft skills in self-assessment, personality, and strengths, make me a valuable asset to any financial institution. My proficiency in Vietnamese and English further enhances my ability to engage with a diverse client base. I am eager to further expand my skills, contribute to organizational success, and strive for personal and professional growth in a dynamic banking environment.

I am now seeking a new opportunity in a dynamic and innovative organization where I can further utilize my sales and customer service skills to drive business growth and success.

I am now seeking a challenging position at VPBank where I can utilize my skills to contribute to the success of the team and the organization.

Career Objective:
Seeking a rewarding position at VPBank where I can apply my expertise in customer service and financial analysis to drive growth and success for the organization. My goal is to continuously learn and grow within the company while delivering top-notch service to clients.

overview_CV: With over 5 years of extensive experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in customer service, financial analysis, and risk management. My notable achievements include boosting customer satisfaction scores by 15% and reducing financial risk by 20%. I am now actively seeking a challenging role at VPBank where I can leverage my expertise to drive organizational success. My career objective is to contribute to VPBank's growth by utilizing my strong customer service and financial analysis skills while continuously learning and delivering exceptional service to clients. My skill set includes interpersonal communication, problem-solving, teamwork, time management, leadership, technical proficiency, analytical prowess, customer service expertise, adaptability, and attention to detail. I am also fluent in Vietnamese, making me an asset in a diverse workplace. My strengths lie in my ability to effectively communicate, solve problems, and lead teams to success. With a keen eye for detail and a proactive approach to challenges, I am confident in my ability to make valuable contributions to VPBank.

LÝ LỊCH ỨNG VIÊN

CHI TIẾT CÁ NHÂN



Họ và tên: TRẦN VĨNH XUYÊN
