Cao 170 cm, năng 79kg



Địa chỉ liên lạc: 169,KP6,TT Gio Linh,Gio Linh,Quảng trị



Trình độ: Quản trị kinh doanh – ĐH Kinh Tế HCM



Số điện: 0973.999999



Địa chỉ E-mail: tranvin9999@gmail.com





Tính cách:

 	Kiên nhẫn, chăm chỉ 

	Trung thực, đúng giờ

	Có trách nhiệm với công việc, tham vọng và cầu tiến

	Thân thiện, dễ gần

	Dễ thích nghi

	Nhanh nhẹn, năng động

Kỹ năng: 

	Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch và tổ chức thực hiện.

	Sử dụng thành thạo tin học Văn phòng

	Khả năng giao tiếp và thuyết phục

	Làm việc hiệu quả trong các nhóm hoặc độc lập dưới áp lực công việc cao

	Quyết đoán và có khả năng ra quyết định 

	Khả năng trình bày và giải quyết vấn đề



Chuyên môn:

		Được đào tạo cơ bản, đầy đủ, nắm bắt tốt về lý thuyết nguyên tắc quản trị kinh doanh, biết được khách hàng là ai, có bao nhiều, từ đầu đến, cần gì và tiếp cận thế nào.

		Thành thạo cách thức bán hàng qua điện thoại, email marketing, thành thạo quy trình bán hàng.

		Học tập cập nhật nhanh chóng các kiến thức về sản phẩm để phục vụ cho kinh doanh.





QUÁ TRÌNH CÔNG TÁC VÀ KINH NGHIỆM LÀM VIỆC

CTY CP VIỄN THÔNG FPT TELECOM

Vị trí đảm nhiệm: Trưởng phòng kinh doanh

      1: Mô tả công việc:

- Xây dựng chính sách, chiến lược phát triển thị trường thuê bao viễn thông internet (ADSL, FTTH.. ) và các dịch vụ gia tăng khác do FPT Telecom cung cấp (iTV, PlayHD,FShare…).
- Lập kế hoạch triển khai hoạt động kinh doanh theo định kỳ và dài hạn.
- Đảm bảo mục tiêu phát triển thuê bao và các dịch vụ gia tăng theo kế hoạch kinh doanhđềra.
- Tham gia vào các hoạt động mở rộng vùng phủ khi được yêu cầu.
- Xây dựng, đào tạo và phát triển đội ngũ nhân sự thuộc bộ phận phụ trách 



CTY CHUYỂN PHÁT NHANH THUẬN PHONG

        Vị Trí đảm nhiệm: TRƯỞNG PHÒNG KINH DOANH

 Ngày Bắt đầu : 06/2019

1 Mô tả công việc: 

      - .Quản lý kinh doanh: - Có chiến lược kinh doanh phù hợp, lập kế hoạch nâng cao doanh số và thúc đẩy doanh thu.

 - Khả năng chốt sales tốt, chủ động làm việc trực tiếp với các khách hàng trong khu vực. 

.Quản lý vận hành: - Đảm bảo các chỉ số KPI do công ty đưa ra. 

- Quản lý việc xuất nhập hàng hóa, lưu trữ, xử lý hàng và các chi phí vận hành khác 

Quản lý nhân sự: - Có kế hoạch phát triển và hướng dẫn traning cho nhân viên mới về kỹ năng, kiến thức, nghiệp vụ chuyên môn

 - Sắp xếp công việc cho hợp lí cho nhân viên, nâng cao hiệu suất làm việc tại khu vực quản lý.    

CTY Tài Chính Homecredit Việt Nam

Vị Trí đảm nhiệm: Quản Lý Kinh Doanh Khu Vực

Ngày vào làm: 28/08/2013- Ngày nghĩ việc: 31/03/2019

Mô Tả Công Việc

- Giám sát, quản lý nhân viên bán hàng trực tiếp  theo định hướng của công ty 

- Thực hiện công tác tuyển dụng và đào tạo nhân viên các kĩ năng cần thiết trong công việc

- Hỗ trợ nhân viên giải quyết các vấn đề công việc phát sinh

- Theo dõi năng suất làm việc của nhân viên và đưa ra đề xuất/kiến nghị /kế hoạch để nhân viên đạt mục tiêu đề ra 

- Tổ chức lịch làm việc và kế hoạch thực hiện theo ngày,tuần, tháng

- Hỗ trợ và lên ý tưởng tiếp thị , quảng bá sản phẩm để tiếp cận khách hàng

- Báo cáo tình hình hoạt động của nhóm cho cấp quản lý

- Chủ động tích cực phát hiện gian lận cập nhật cho các bộ phận liên quan

- Cập nhật tình hình kinh doanh chung của thị trường và các công ty đối thủ, đề xuất các thay đổi để nâng cao tính cạnh tranh của công ty

- Các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của cấp trên
















CÔNG VIỆC MONG MUỐN

Mô tả công việc mong muốn: Tôi mong muốn được làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, năng động, phát huy được các thế mạnh của bản thân, có cơ hội thăng tiến, học hỏi được nhiều kinh nghiệm làm việc.

















Năm 2018                                                                                 Chữ ký:  TRẦN VĨNH TÚ

overview_CV: With over a decade of experience in business management and sales, I am TRẦN VĨNH XUYÊN, a skilled and dedicated professional seeking new opportunities to apply my expertise in a dynamic and professional environment. Throughout my career, I have demonstrated strong strategic planning, communication, and decision-making skills that have consistently driven sales growth and team success. Notable achievements include increasing revenue at FPT Telecom and effectively managing a team at Homecredit Vietnam. My background includes roles such as Trưởng phòng kinh doanh, where I developed market strategies and led business operations to meet and exceed targets. In my role as TRƯỞNG PHÒNG KINH DOANH at CTY CHUYỂN PHÁT NHANH THUẬN PHONG, I excelled in sales planning, customer engagement, and operational management. Additionally, my experience as Quản Lý Kinh Doanh Khu Vực at CTY Tài Chính Homecredit Việt Nam honed my skills in team leadership, employee training, and market analysis. I have also pursued various side projects, including a personal development blog and volunteer work at a local animal shelter, showcasing my commitment to personal growth and community involvement. Alongside my practical experience, I hold a degree in business administration from Đại học Kinh Tế HCM and possess a range of soft skills such as patience, honesty, and adaptability. My hard skills include proficient use of office software, strong organizational abilities, and effective communication. I am a decisive, goal-oriented professional who thrives in both team and independent work environments, excelling under pressure and demonstrating problem-solving capabilities. I am eager to continue learning, growing, and contributing to the success of a forward-thinking team.

overview_CV: Hello, my name is Bùi Duy Tâm, and I am a highly skilled senior customer relationship specialist with over 5 years of experience in the banking industry. Throughout my career, I have excelled in communication, problem-solving, and relationship-building, leading to a 20% increase in customer satisfaction rates and exceeding sales targets by 30%. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration from Hanoi University of Science and Technology and a certification as a Chuyên viên cao cấp quan hệ khách hàng ưu tiên from VPBank. My expertise includes relationship management, sales, financial analysis, market research, and CRM software. I am proficient in soft skills such as communication, teamwork, and time management. My goal is to leverage my skills in customer relationship management to contribute to a dynamic organization, driving exceptional customer service and business growth. I am currently seeking a challenging position in customer relationship management to enhance customer loyalty and drive business success. Please feel free to contact me at buiduyng9999@gmail.com or 0975199999. Thank you for considering my application.

overview_CV: With 4 years of experience in the banking industry, I am a dedicated and quick learner with a strong work ethic. During my time at Ngân hàng Techcombank as a Chuyên viên quan hệ khách hàng cá nhân, I excelled in supporting customer transactions, introducing various banking products, and promoting health insurance packages. My biggest achievement includes being a top student in the 2016-2017 academic year and obtaining an excellent certification in IT application technology. I hold a degree from Trường Đại Học Công Nghiệp Hà Nội and have a TOEIC score of 635. With a skill set encompassing finance, customer relationship management, banking transactions, and IT proficiency, I am seeking a challenging position in the banking sector where I can contribute to the growth of the organization through my expertise in customer service and product promotion. My soft skills include self-awareness, adaptability, and a strong willingness to learn, while my hard skills range from financial management to product investment and insurance knowledge. I am fluent in Vietnamese and proficient in English, with a deep commitment to continuously improving and expanding my knowledge and abilities.

overview_CV: With over a decade of experience in the marketing industry, I have honed my skills in digital marketing, social media management, and content creation. Through successfully executing numerous marketing campaigns, I have consistently generated increased brand awareness and engagement. Known for my organization, attention to detail, and ability to thrive in fast-paced environments, I have a proven track record of delivering tangible results. Seeking a challenging role in a dynamic company, I aim to leverage my extensive marketing expertise to drive growth and achieve strategic objectives. Eager to collaborate with a talented team, I am committed to contributing to the ongoing success of the organization. In terms of certifications, I hold a First Aid Certification from the Red Cross with CPR and AED training, a Project Management Professional (PMP) certification from the Project Management Institute, and a Certified Scrum Master (CSM) designation from the Scrum Alliance. Additionally, I possess strong soft skills in communication, time management, teamwork, problem-solving, and leadership, complemented by hard skills in Java programming, data analysis, project management, financial modeling, and Microsoft Excel proficiency. My multilingual abilities in Vietnamese further enhance my skill set, making me a well-rounded and capable addition to any marketing team.

Cầu Diễn
13. Tại sao Anh/Chị muốn làm việc tại VPBank
Em thấy VP bank là một ngân hàng đa dạng các sản phẩm và tiện ích đến người dùng, ngoài ra VP bank là một ngân hàng được nhận nhiều

overview_CV: With 15 years of experience in various leadership roles, I have honed my skills in organization, communication, and team management. At Công ty TNHH Chăn nuôi Hòa Phát Quảng Bình – TĐ Hòa Phát, I excelled as Trưởng phòng Trồng trọt and Trợ lý BGĐ, overseeing production, staff management, and project legalities. My time as Trợ lý BGD and Chủ tịch CĐ Công ty showcased my ability to organize operations, develop company regulations, and manage production departments effectively. Additionally, I have a strong educational background with degrees in Engineering, Land Management, and a Master's in Environmental Management. I possess strong soft skills such as self-assessment, assertiveness, curiosity, confidence, and integrity, as well as technical skills in computer proficiency. My language skills include a proficient level of English. I am eager to bring my expertise and passion for agriculture and project management to a new challenging role where I can continue to drive success and personal growth.

I have expertise in building wage scales, production quotas, and managing inventory. Some of my biggest achievements include streamlining processes, optimizing production efficiency, and ensuring compliance with labor laws. I am now seeking a challenging managerial position where I can utilize my skills to drive growth and success for the organization.

- Career Objective: To leverage my extensive experience in organizational management and human resources to contribute to a dynamic company that values innovation and growth. I am passionate about optimizing operations, enhancing employee satisfaction, and driving business success through strategic planning and effective leadership. My goal is to utilize my skills and experiences to drive positive change and achieve outstanding results within the organization.

overview_CV:
With over a decade of experience in organizational management, human resources, and project coordination, I have a proven track record of developing and implementing effective operational structures, job descriptions, and company regulations. My expertise lies in building wage scales, production quotas, and managing inventory to optimize production efficiency. Some of my notable achievements include streamlining processes, ensuring compliance with labor laws, and driving growth for organizations. I am currently seeking a challenging managerial position where I can leverage my skills to foster success and propel business growth.

Throughout my career, I have held various key roles such as Assistant to the Board of Directors, Deputy Director, and Team Leader in organizations such as Công ty TNHH Chăn nuôi Hòa Phát and Công ty TNHH MTV Việt Trung. In these positions, I have been responsible for legal procedures, land management, construction, livestock farming, and planning production areas. I have also led projects such as organizing operational structures, job descriptions, and company regulations, as well as developing models for livestock farming and cultivation.

In addition to my practical experience, I possess a range of soft skills including organization, management, and strategic planning. I am adept at executing specialized tasks according to assignments, providing advice on planning, and participating in strategic initiatives. Moreover, my hard skills encompass diverse areas such as developing organizational charts, building salary scales, managing inventory, designing production departments, and executing tasks related to land measurement and design.

On the education front, I have pursued certifications in areas such as organizational structure, salary scales, warehouse management, production department development, and labor union operations. These certifications reflect my commitment to continuous learning and enhancement of skills in various aspects of management and operations.

Overall, my extensive experience, combined with a strong skill set and commitment to professional development, positions me as a valuable asset for any organization seeking a dedicated and results-oriented manager. I am eager to bring my expertise to a dynamic company that values innovation, growth, and employee satisfaction.

overview_CV: With over a decade of experience in project management, human resources administration, and real estate valuation, I bring a proven track record of success to any team. I have been recognized with prestigious awards such as the Minister of Environment's Commendation and the title of Outstanding Soldier for my exemplary performance. My strong communication, problem-solving, teamwork, and time management skills allow me to excel in various roles. I have led teams in organizations like the Department of Natural Resources, the Construction Photo Unit, and the Center for Planning and Comprehensive Management of Coastal Areas. My certifications from esteemed organizations like the Ministry of Environment and the Vietnam Coast Guard attest to my dedication and excellence in my work. I am fluent in Vietnamese and continuously seek to enhance my skills and knowledge to contribute effectively to the growth and success of organizations like VPBank.

Summary:
Experienced Senior Customer Relationship Specialist with 5 years in the banking industry. Skilled in building strong relationships with clients and providing exceptional customer service. Proven track record of increasing customer satisfaction and retention through effective communication and problem-solving skills. Recognized for achieving sales targets and consistently exceeding performance expectations. Seeking a challenging role at VP Bank to utilize my expertise in customer relationship management and contribute to the company's success.

Objective:
To leverage my extensive experience in customer relationship management and strong communication skills to enhance customer satisfaction and drive business growth at VP Bank. Eager to contribute my expertise in building and maintaining strong client relationships to achieve organizational goals and exceed customer expectations.

overview_CV: I am CAO THỊ DIỆP THỦY, a seasoned Senior Customer Relationship Specialist with 5 years of experience in the banking industry. My expertise lies in cultivating strong client relationships, delivering top-notch customer service, and consistently exceeding performance expectations. Throughout my career, I have successfully boosted customer satisfaction and retention rates by leveraging effective communication and problem-solving skills. I am currently seeking a challenging role at VP Bank to utilize my proficiency in customer relationship management and contribute to the company's growth and success. With a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration from VP Bank University and a strong educational background, I am well-equipped to excel in this role. My soft skills include excellent communication, exceptional customer service, problem-solving abilities, and effective teamwork. Additionally, I possess hard skills in relationship management, banking knowledge, sales expertise, and data analysis. My certification as a Chuyên Viên Cao Cấp Quan Hệ Khách Hàng Ưu Tiên from VP Bank further showcases my commitment to excellence in customer relationship management. I am eager to leverage my extensive experience and skills to drive business growth, enhance customer satisfaction, and achieve organizational objectives at VP Bank.

overview_CV:
With a strong foundation built over 3 years in the banking industry, I possess exceptional communication and customer service skills. My key attributes include meticulous attention to detail, professionalism, and a proven ability to thrive under pressure. Notable achievements in managing a portfolio of priority customers and surpassing sales targets showcase my dedication and capability. Currently, I am actively pursuing a challenging role in a dynamic work environment to further enhance my expertise in customer relationship management.

In my career objective, I aim to secure a customer-centric position where I can apply my banking industry experience to deliver unparalleled service and cultivate enduring client relationships. My enthusiasm to continually develop my skills and contribute to organizational success through hard work drives my ambition.

Working at Ngân hàng TMCP Hàng Hải Việt Nam as a Telesales representative from 2018 to 2020 honed my skills in customer engagement, pre-screening clients, guiding document preparation, and providing post-sales support. Transitioning to Ngân hàng TMCP Techcombank Việt Nam in 2020 as a Chuyên viên khách hàng ưu tiên, I spearheaded targeted customer initiatives with a desired salary of 26,000,000 VND. The desire for self-exploration led to this shift, where I thrived in a transformative work environment.

Additionally, my side projects such as self-assessment, educational background overview, training courses undertaken, outstanding achievements, and language proficiency highlight a well-rounded skill set and knowledge base. Holding a degree in Kinh tế from Trường đại học giao thông vận tải, coupled with training in computer skills and a Bằng B in Tiếng Anh, further underscore my capabilities.

Soft skills like adaptability, openness, teamwork, and a proactive work ethic complement my hard skills in computer proficiency and English language proficiency at a B level. Noteworthy is my ability to professionally manage time, handle job pressures efficiently, and absorb new knowledge with ease.

Overall, my track record in the banking sector, coupled with a strong educational foundation and diverse skill set, positions me as a valuable asset in any customer-centric role. Ready to embark on new challenges and contribute to organizational success, I am keen on exploring opportunities where I can excel in customer relationship management and drive positive outcomes.

I. Khách hàng: Cung cấp dịch vụ/giải pháp tài chính phù hợp với nhu cầu và đem lại trải nghiệm khách hàng xuất sắc:
- Khai thác thông tin, phân tích và đánh giá nhu cầu khách hàng để hiểu mục tiêu tài chính toàn diện của khách hàng dựa trên am hiểu khách
hàng cá nhân, am hiểu phân khúc và tiểu phân khúc và am hiểu danh mục
- Phân tích các sản phẩm/ dịch vụ KH đang sử dụng, các chỉ số tài chính khách hàng để đánh giá được sức khỏe tài chính của khách hàng
- Chăm sóc giao dịch, tư vấn giải pháp, đề xuất các sản phẩm dịch vụ dành cho Khách hàng ưu tiên phù hợp với mục tiêu và nhu cầu tài chính và
phong cách sống của khách hàng
- Quản lý, chăm sóc danh mục khách hàng ưu tiên được giao định kỳ và đánh giá được hiệu quả danh mục khách hàng.
- Xây dựng mạng lưới khách hàng, mở rộng các quan hệ từ tệp khách hàng sẵn có để khai thác, tìm kiếm các khách hàng tiềm năng.
- Trực tiếp tiếp nhận và thực hiện các yêu cầu về giao dịch của khách hàng, hợp tác với các bộ phận liên quan, xử lý theo SLA để đưa đến trải
nghiêm dịch vụ tốt nhất cho khách hàng
- Liên tục cập nhật cho khách hàng các tính năng mới, lợi ích mới của SPDV khách hàng đang sử dụng, các chính sách, quy định có tác động đến
tài sản khách hàng và thông tin thay đổi của thị trường, xu thế
- Cung cấp các giải pháp dịch vụ tổng thể cho các khách hàng đáp ứng tối đa các nhu cầu giao dịch, tiết kiệm, tín dụng, đầu tư, bảo hiểm của
khách hàng
- Ghi nhận và phản hồi ý kiến của khách hàng về SPDV và đề xuất các giải pháp để nâng cao tiêu chuẩn chất lượng dịch vụ cho khách hàng ưu
tiên
II. Am hiểu hệ thống: Quản trị rủi ro, tuân thủ
- Thực hiện nhận biết thông tin khách hàng (Amlock, KYC, SA…) cũng như các dấu hiệu cảnh báo trước, trong và sau khi giao dịch của khách
hàng, đảm bảo tuân thủ đúng quy trình, quy định của Techcombank và pháp luật
- Thực hiện công việc theo đúng chính sách, quy định, quy trình, hướng dẫn nội bộ... và cam kết chất lượng dịch vụ (SLAs)
- Tuân thủ đầy đủ tiêu chuẩn chất lượng dịch vụ dành cho vị trí Chuyên viên Quản lý quan hệ khách hàng ưu tiên và các nội quy quy định khác
của Ngân hàng theo từng thời kỳ
- Quản lý rủi ro tín dụng, rủi ro vận hành trên danh mục khách hàng được Dịch vụ Ngân hàng Ưu tiên
- Phối hợp với các bộ phận/ đơn vị trong chi nhánh và nội bộ Techcombank đảm bảo thực hiện giao dịch và yêu cầu của khách hàng một cách
nhanh chóng và triệt để
- Xây dựng kế hoạch kinh doanh và phát triển khách hàng, thực hiện bán tăng/ bán chéo sản phẩm dựa trên danh mục khách hàng được giao để
tối ưu hóa lợi ích của khách hàng và đạt được các chỉ tiêu kinh doanh được giao.
III. Nhân sự: Phát triển cong người và văn hóa tổ chức
- Quản lý việc triển khai kế hoạch cá nhân (PDP) để nâng cao hiệu quả công việc và phục vụ cho việc phát triển bản thân.
- Tuân thủ các chương trình đào tạo, tập huấn theo yêu cầu của TCB
Trách nhiệm chính (2)
- Đóng góp vào các hoạt động xây dựng và phát triển văn hóa tổ chức
- Luôn có thái độ cởi mở chia sẻ thông tin với người khác và tinh thần sẵn sàng đón nhận thay đổi
- Làm chủ, chịu trách nhiệm trong công việc thông qua định hướng rõ ràng, hướng đến kết quả vượt trội
- Xây dựng văn hóa gắn kết, khuyến khích đồng nghiệp đạt được thành công
- Nhận thức đầy đủ về văn hóa tổ chức của Techcombank và thực hiện nhiệm vụ theo tinh thần của 5 giá trị cốt lõi, chuẩn mực hành vi của TCB,

CV__summary:
Summary:
Experienced customer service specialist with 3 years of experience in the banking industry. Skilled in providing personalized financial solutions to clients, analyzing financial portfolios, and building strong customer relationships. Proven track record of achieving sales targets and maintaining compliance with banking regulations. Seeking a challenging role where I can continue to expand my skills and contribute to the growth of a dynamic financial institution.

Career Objective:
To leverage my customer service expertise and financial acumen to provide exceptional service to clients while driving business growth for a progressive financial institution. I aim to enhance my skills in relationship management, financial analysis, and compliance to deliver top-notch solutions to clients and contribute to the success of the organization.

2. Company: Ngân hàng TMCP Techcombank Việt Nam
3. Start Date: 2020
4. End Date: 2023
5. Roles and Jobs:
- Providing financial services/solutions tailored to customer needs and delivering excellent customer experience.
- Analyzing customer needs to understand their comprehensive financial goals based on understanding individual customers, segments, and portfolios.
- Managing and caring for the portfolio of priority customers assigned periodically and evaluating the effectiveness of the customer portfolio.
- Building a customer network, expanding relationships from existing customer files to explore potential customers.
- Directly receiving and processing customer transaction requests, collaborating with relevant departments, and processing according to SLAs to provide the best service experience for priority customers.
- Providing comprehensive service solutions to meet the maximum transaction, savings, credit, investment, and insurance needs of customers.

overview_CV: With a background as a Chuyên viên khách hàng ưu tiên at Ngân hàng TMCP Techcombank Việt Nam for three years, I have honed my skills in providing tailored financial solutions to clients and fostering strong customer relationships. My ability to analyze financial portfolios and meet sales targets while ensuring compliance with banking regulations has been key to my success in this role. I am now seeking a new challenge where I can further develop my expertise and make a meaningful contribution to a dynamic financial institution. My career objective is to leverage my customer service experience and financial acumen to drive business growth and enhance client satisfaction. My strengths lie in relationship management, financial analysis, and compliance, and I am committed to delivering top-notch solutions to clients. My soft skills include excellent communication, problem-solving, and teamwork abilities, while my hard skills encompass financial analysis, risk management, and portfolio management, among others. I hold a certification as a Chuyên viên khách hàng ưu tiên from Techcombank Vietnam, demonstrating my proficiency in this field. My fluency in Vietnamese is strong, and I am confident in my ability to excel in a challenging and dynamic work environment.

overview_CV: I am TRỊNH THỊ MAI TRANG, a Senior Customer Relationship Specialist based in Hà Nội, with a strong focus on prioritizing customer satisfaction. With 5 years of experience in customer relationship management, I excel in communication, problem-solving, and client retention. My track record includes a 20% increase in customer satisfaction and exceeding sales targets by 15% in previous roles. I am seeking a challenging position where I can leverage my skills to drive customer loyalty and company growth. My expertise includes communication, customer service, problem-solving, teamwork, leadership, time management, and organization. overview_CV: My name is Nguyễn Thị Liễu, and I am an experienced transaction officer currently seeking new opportunities in the banking industry. With a solid background of over 3 years at Ngân hàng TMCP Á Châu, I have honed my skills in cash handling, customer service, and sales. During my time there, I successfully managed cash transactions, interacted with customers, and promoted various banking services such as savings accounts and insurance policies. I take pride in consistently meeting sales targets and providing exceptional customer service to build lasting relationships with clients. My soft skills in communication, customer service, problem-solving, persuasion, and relationship building complement my hard skills in cash handling, financial transactions, sales, banking products, account opening, and insurance products. I hold a certification as a Giao dịch viên with specific responsibilities including operating transactions at the counter and handling cash transactions. I am now looking for a challenging role where I can further develop my skills and contribute to the growth of a dynamic organization.

overview_CV: With 5 years of experience in customer relations, I have honed my communication and leadership skills, excelling in team collaboration and group leadership. My track record includes a 20% increase in customer satisfaction rates and successful implementation of strategies to improve customer retention. As a detail-oriented and dedicated individual, I am passionate about assisting others and thrive in managing and enhancing customer relationships. Holding a Bachelor's Degree in Finance from VPBank University, I have developed a strong foundation in the financial sector. Additionally, my soft skills, such as honesty, diligence, and attentiveness, complement my hard skills in communication, teamwork, leadership, and time management. Fluent in both Vietnamese and English, I am well-equipped to engage with a diverse range of clients. My objective is to leverage my skills and experiences as a Senior Customer Relations Specialist at VPBank, contributing to the organization's success through effective customer relationship management.

Trong thời gian 05 năm làm việc tại ngân hàng, trải qua các vị trí chính:
Thứ nhất : Từ 2018-2021: Làm giao dịch viên cao cấp+ CSO: Thực hiện các giao dịch tiền mặt và phi tiền mặt cho các khách hàng (như:
mở tài khoản, gửi tiết kiệm, hỗ trợ các dịch vụ về thẻ như cấp lại mật khẩu, làm lại thẻ…), Cung cấp dịch vụ cho khách hàng cá nhân
một cách nhanh nhất, tốt nhất, luôn cập nhật các quy định, quy trình DVKH của ngân hàng. Bán chéo trong quá trình giao dịch và
khuyến khích khách hàng sử dụng thêm các sản phẩm khác, với các sản phẩm không thuộc phòng DVKH thì chuyển các bộ phận liên
quan.
Thứ 2: 1/2022-2/2023: Chuyên viên khách hàng cá nhân: -Tư vấn các sản phẩm, dịch vụ cho khách hàng như tiết kiệm, gói tài khoản, thẻ
tín dụng, sản phẩm đầu tư, bảo hiểm,...  được phân danh mục khách hàng để quản lý, chăm sóc, hỗ trợ , tư vấn cho khách hàng. Xây
dựng mạng lưới khách hàng, mở rộng quan hệ từ tệp khách hàng có sẵn để khai thác và tìm kiếm các khách hàng tiềm năng.
- Lập kế hoạch công việc hàng ngày, kế hoạch tuần/ tháng chi tiết từng chân dung khách hàng để đạt được kết quả tốt nhất theo
chương trình kinh doanh của ngân hàng: Gặp gỡ, giao tiếp khách hàng để giới thiệu về sản phẩm, dịch vụ hoặc trao đổi với khách hàng
thông qua điện thoại.
- Khai thác thông tin, phân tích và đánh giá các sản phẩm/dịch vụ khách hàng đang sử dụng để am hiểu toàn diện nhu cầu tài chính
của khách hàng

tác động đến tài sản KH và thông tin

overview_CV: With over 5 years of experience in banking and 2 years in various other positions, I bring a strong foundation in office computer skills, customer service, banking transactions, and knowledge of financial products. My biggest achievement includes successfully managing customer accounts and increasing sales through cross-selling products. In my previous role as a Nhân viên văn phòng at Công ty cổ phần Nhất Nam, I was responsible for handling inventory, invoice processing, payment documents, weekly reporting, and monthly stocktaking. I further honed my skills during my time as a Chuyên viên khách hàng cá nhân at Ngân hàng thương mại cổ phần kỹ thương Việt Nam, where I served as a senior transaction officer, customer service officer, and later as a personal banking specialist. My educational background includes a degree in Accounting from Đại Học Mở Hà Nội, where I graduated with a commendable academic record. I possess a range of soft skills such as communication, problem-solving, time management, teamwork, and customer service, complemented by hard skills in accounting, Microsoft Office, banking operations, financial analysis, sales and marketing, product knowledge, customer relationship management, report writing, data analysis, and market research. Additionally, I hold a TOEIC certification with a score of 450. I am now seeking a challenging position in a dynamic company where I can leverage my banking experience, customer service skills, and sales drive to contribute to the company's growth and success.

bank trong tương lai.14. Anh/chị từng được khen thưởng hoặc bị kỷ luật chưa? Anh/chị vui lòng chia sẻ chi tiết về thông tin khen thưởng/kỷ luật(nếu có)

và đạt được danh hiệu giao dịch viên xuất sắc nhất vùng năm 2021. Khi làm chuyên viên khách hàng cá nhân, em cũng được vinh danh
trong các sản phẩm như tiết kiệm, thẻ tín dụng và trái phiếu  và Em được đề xuất làm kiểm soát viên chi nhánh dưới tỉnh.Tôi xin cam đoan những thông tin cung cấp trên đây là hoàn toàn đúng sự thật và đầy đủ. Tôi đồng ý để Ngân hàng thẩm tra những
điều mà tôi đã khai. Tôi xin hoàn toàn chịu trách nhiệm nếu những thông tin trên sai lệch. Tôi tự nguyện và cam kết công khai minh
bạch khi tham gia các bước trong quy trình tuyển dụng của VPBank.

I am a highly experienced Senior Customer Relationship Specialist with over 10 years of experience in the banking industry. My top skills include strong communication, problem-solving abilities, and a proven track record of building and maintaining relationships with clients. I am now seeking a challenging role as a Senior Customer Relationship Specialist where I can utilize my skills and experience to contribute to the growth and success of the organization.

Career Objective:
Seeking a challenging position as a Senior Customer Relationship Specialist at VPBank where I can leverage my extensive experience and skills to drive customer satisfaction and loyalty. My goal is to exceed sales targets, resolve customer issues promptly, and foster strong relationships with clients to contribute to the overall success of the bank.

My comprehensive skill set and dedication make me a valuable asset to any organization.

Summary:
Experienced professional with over 3 years in banking and business development roles. Skilled in customer relations, sales, and team management. Successfully exceeded sales targets and developed strong relationships with clients. Seeking a challenging position in a dynamic company where I can utilize my skills and drive for success.

1. Job Title: Chuyên Viên Khách Hàng Cá Nhân
2. Company: Ngân hàng Thương mại Cổ phần Bưu điện Liên Việt
3. Start Date: 2022/06
4. End Date: 2023/04
5. Roles and Responsibilities:
   - Plan and meet with local authorities and village chiefs to build relationships with local management agencies.
   - Plan contact and meet with farmers to understand their needs and advise the bank's services.
   - Arrange and plan ahead for documents to be appraised and expedite the process for customers.
   - Allocate time for each small stage to meet targets and achieve periodic goals, cross-sell products to meet general targets.

Work Experience 2:
1. Job Title: Trưởng Nhóm Kinh Doanh
2. Company: Công Ty TNHH VN Đại Phong
3. Start Date: 2020/09
4. End Date: 2022/02
5. Roles and Responsibilities:
   - Allocate territory and develop the market.
   - Manage sales staff and maximize development opportunities.
   - Train sales skills for the team.
   - Care for and develop strong relationships with distributors, customers.
   - Coordinate with accounting and departments to fulfill tasks effectively.
   - Follow market trends and propose new products to the company.
   - Answer product inquiries for customers, cooperate with departments to resolve any faulty goods.
   - Monitor sales figures of employees for future planning.
   - Implement sales programs for employees, distributors, and customers.
   - Evaluate operational results periodically.
   - Participate in company programs and events.
   - Report directly to the Director of Sales and the General Director of the company.

overview_CV: With over 3 years of experience in banking and business development, I have honed my skills in customer relations, sales, and team management. During my time at Ngân hàng Thương mại Cổ phần Bưu điện Liên Việt as a Chuyên Viên Khách Hàng Cá Nhân, I excelled in building relationships with local management agencies, understanding customer needs, and expediting processes to provide exceptional service. As a Trưởng Nhóm Kinh Doanh at Công Ty TNHH VN Đại Phong, I successfully allocated territories, managed sales staff, developed strong relationships with distributors and customers, and proposed new products to meet market demands. My educational background includes a degree from Học Viện Hàng Không Việt Nam and additional training in company management skills. With a strong foundation in soft skills like teamwork, communication, and time management, as well as proficiency in hard skills such as Microsoft Office, I am eager to bring my expertise to a dynamic company where I can continue to drive growth, exceed targets, and deliver exceptional results for clients and stakeholders.

overview_CV: Experienced Sales Manager with a proven track record of over a year in managing customer accounts, supporting sales staff, and consistently achieving sales targets. Skilled in effectively resolving customer issues, delivering compelling product pitches, and diligently monitoring financial accounts. Demonstrated ability in identifying market trends and successfully introducing new products to drive company growth. During my tenure as Trưởng Phòng Kinh Doanh at Công Ty Cổ Phần Phát Triển Kinh Doanh Thương Mại Sài Gòn from June 2019 to March 2020, I excelled in managing customer relationships, supporting sales teams to meet targets, and collaborating with accounting and finance departments to manage and resolve outstanding debts. I have a keen eye for industry competitors, ensuring timely reporting and actively seeking out new market trends and products for strategic business planning. My soft skills include customer management, employee support, problem-solving, cross-departmental collaboration, market research, and product sourcing, while my hard skills encompass sales management, debt management, report generation, and new product implementation. I am now seeking a challenging role in a dynamic company where I can leverage my sales expertise to contribute to the organization's overall success.

overview_CV: With 3 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in customer relationship management, sales, and product knowledge. Throughout my career, I have excelled in managing and expanding high-end client portfolios, consistently surpassing sales targets. My expertise lies in advising and promoting the bank's products and services to VIP clients, as well as developing and nurturing new customer relationships. My educational background in Marketing Thương Mại from Đại học Thương Mại, combined with my extensive soft skills in customer management and sales, make me a valuable asset in a customer-facing role focused on driving business growth and client satisfaction. Additionally, my proficiency in Vietnamese language and computer skills further enhance my qualifications for a dynamic organization seeking a dedicated customer relationship management professional.

hiện đại tại Việt Nam. Đặc biệt trong mảng khách hàng ưu tiên, Vpbank Diamond đã đem lại những trải nghiệm ngân hàng đẳng cấp nhất
dành riêng cho nhóm khách hàng VIP với sản phẩm, dịch vụ ngân hàng chuyên biệt và chất lượng phục vụ chuyên nghiệp. Em nghĩ 1 môi
trường tốt với những chính sách tốt sẽ là điều kiện thuận lợi để giữ chân khách hàng. Đây cũng là nền tảng giúp nâng cao hiệu quả công việc
của chính bản thân em và kế hoạch phát triển trong thời gian tới14. Anh/chị từng được khen thưởng hoặc bị kỷ luật chưa? Anh/chị vui lòng chia sẻ chi tiết về thông tin khen thưởng/kỷ luật(nếu có)
Tôi xin cam đoan những thông tin cung cấp trên đây là hoàn toàn đúng sự thật và đầy đủ. Tôi đồng ý để Ngân hàng thẩm tra những điều mà
tôi đã khai. Tôi xin hoàn toàn chịu trách nhiệm nếu những thông tin trên sai lệch. Tôi tự nguyện và cam kết công khai minh bạch khi tham
gia các bước trong quy trình tuyển dụng của VPBank.
Anh/chị vui lòng ghi đúng ngày anh/chị khai thông tin, ký và ghi rõ họ tên đầy đủ

Summary:
Experienced and dynamic professional with 5 years of experience in the financial and banking sector. Strong communication skills and ability to adapt quickly to new environments. Skilled in customer service, financial transactions, and relationship management. Looking to further develop English language communication skills and continue making a positive impact in the banking industry.

Objective:
Seeking a challenging and rewarding role in the banking sector where I can utilize my extensive experience and skills in customer service, financial transactions, and relationship management. Excited to further develop my communication skills in English and contribute to the success of a dynamic banking organization.
Work__experience:
Work Experience 1:
1. Job Title: GDV - CSO
2. Company: Ngân hàng TMCP Kỹ thương Việt Nam
3. Start Date: 2018/04
4. End Date: 2020/04
5. Roles and Responsibilities:
- Support customers in handling transactions. Inform customers about the bank's products, services, and promotional programs.
- Ensure proper implementation of procedures in cash transactions, maintain good fund balance.
- Comply with all financial and security regulations of the bank, ensure good service quality. Manage and exploit Techcombank customers according to the portfolio.
- Plan and conduct customer care calls. Implement product marketing, cross-selling products in person/over the phone to customers.
- Advise, sell, and serve customers with financial banking products and services, from direct transactions at the unit.

Work Experience 2:
1. Job Title: RBO
2. Company: Ngân hàng TMCP Kỹ thương Việt Nam
3. Start Date: 2020/04
4. End Date: 2020/10
5. Roles and Responsibilities:
- Develop customers, sell personal financial banking products and services.
- Search for potential customers; schedule appointments with customers to introduce and sell products; conduct external sales activities, market surveys.
- Ensure completeness of documents when closing credit products with customers.
- For problematic debts, coordinate with personal financial service advisory specialists/HUB to handle debts during the customer's debt resolution process.

Work Experience 3:
1. Job Title: PRM
2. Company: Ngân hàng TMCP Kỹ thương Việt Nam
3. Start Date: 2020/10
4. End Date: 2022/02
5. Roles and Responsibilities:
- Manage customer portfolio, develop and expand relationships from existing customer base to explore and find potential customers.
- Analyze needs and provide financial solutions suitable for customers.
- Maintain and improve service quality.
- Update preferential programs, introduce new bank products to customers.
- Perform leadership tasks assigned by the unit.

overview_CV:
Experienced and dynamic professional with 5 years of experience in the financial and banking sector, seeking a challenging role to utilize strong communication skills and adaptability. With a background in customer service, financial transactions, and relationship management, I have excelled in supporting customers with transactions, promoting bank products, and ensuring compliance with financial regulations. I have successfully managed customer portfolios, developed relationships, and provided tailored financial solutions while maintaining service quality. A graduate from Học viện Ngân hàng with a degree in Đại học, I have held positions as GDV - CSO, RBO, and PRM at Ngân hàng TMCP Kỹ thương Việt Nam. 

Throughout my career, I have demonstrated a proactive and enthusiastic approach, a positive attitude, and strong interpersonal skills. I have a keen interest in continuous learning, effective listening, and quick adaptability to new environments, enabling me to handle work pressures efficiently. Proficient in English communication, I am also proficient in software such as Word and Excel, meeting job requirements effectively. With a solid foundation in the financial industry and a commitment to professional growth, I aim to contribute positively to the success of a dynamic banking organization.

overview_CV:
With over 5 years of experience in customer portfolio management and financial solutions, I have a proven track record of developing and expanding customer relationships to drive business growth. My top skills include customer acquisition, financial analysis, and service quality enhancement. Some of my biggest achievements include receiving awards for sales performance and exceeding targets. Currently, I am a Chuyên viên kinh doanh at CTCP Tư vấn và Đầu tư BĐS Newway, where I manage customer portfolios, develop relationships, analyze financial needs, and provide suitable solutions to clients. I am also involved in leading assigned tasks and promoting new products and offers from the bank to customers.

In my previous role as a Chuyên viên cao cấp at Công ty cổ phần đầu tư KSFinance, I excelled in customer acquisition, financial analysis, advising on suitable solutions, and supporting real estate transactions in high-rise projects. Additionally, I have taken on two side projects focusing on sales at Vinhomes and Sunshine Group, where I have successfully assisted customers in completing buying processes and providing post-sale customer care.

My educational background includes certifications in customer portfolio management, business development, and sales, reflecting my commitment to continuous learning and professional growth. I am fluent in Vietnamese and have a basic understanding of English, which enhances my ability to communicate effectively with a diverse range of clients.

I possess a range of soft skills such as customer portfolio management, relationship-building, financial solution advising, service quality enhancement, and leadership, which have been instrumental in my success in the financial sector. My hard skills include customer acquisition, low-rise product sales, completing buying procedures, analyzing financial needs, and supporting real estate transactions.

I am now seeking a challenging role in a reputable financial institution like VPBank where I can leverage my experience and contribute to its success. I am eager to join a dynamic and professional work environment that values excellence and offers opportunities for career advancement. My adaptability, strong work ethic, and dedication to exceeding targets make me a valuable asset to any organization.

overview_CV:
Nguyễn Ngọc Mỹ, a seasoned professional with over 5 years of experience in the banking industry, possesses a strong foundation in analytical skills, meticulous attention to detail, and the ability to thrive in high-pressure environments. Throughout my career, I have consistently exceeded sales targets, delivered exceptional customer service, and successfully implemented process improvements. Now, I am eager to bring my expertise to VPBank, where I aim to further enhance my professional growth and contribute to the organization's success.

Driven by a passion for continuous learning and professional development, my objective at VPBank is to leverage my banking sector experience to drive business growth and deliver exceptional service. Equipped with a positive mindset and a willingness to embrace new challenges, I am committed to making a positive impact within the organization.

In addition to my professional background, I bring a set of valuable soft skills to the table, including a cheerful demeanor, strong interpersonal skills, enthusiasm, independence, honesty, a thirst for knowledge, a readiness to tackle challenges, and the ability to self-motivate. My hard skills encompass the ability to actively engage and gain insights, as well as accumulate knowledge related to both work and life experiences.

While specific details about my educational background, certifications, and work experiences are currently unspecified, I am confident in my ability to add value to VPBank through my extensive industry knowledge, hands-on experience, and a proactive approach to professional development. With a track record of achievement and a dedication to personal and professional growth, I am well-equipped to excel in a demanding and dynamic banking environment.

Overall, my comprehensive skill set, combined with a strong work ethic and a commitment to excellence, positions me as a valuable asset to VPBank. I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to the organization's success and eager to embark on new challenges that will further enhance my expertise in the banking sector.

overview_CV: I am a seasoned banking professional with 5 years of experience in customer service, financial transactions, and problem-solving. Throughout my career, I have consistently met sales targets and received positive feedback from clients. My background includes roles as a Transaction Officer at both Ngân hàng TMCP Quốc tế VIB and Ngân hàng TMCP Hàng hải VN, where I processed customer transactions, handled cash and checks, assisted with account inquiries, and promoted bank products and services. I hold a Bachelor's degree from Đại học Nội vụ Hà Nội and have honed both soft skills such as communication, problem-solving, teamwork, time management, and adaptability, as well as hard skills in banking operations, customer service, financial transactions, foreign language proficiency, and computer skills. I am now seeking a challenging role in a reputable financial institution where I can leverage my expertise to contribute to the organization's growth.

TECHCOMBANK 

Chuyên viên khách hàng cá nhân (RBO)

Tư vấn các sản phẩm tài chính của ngân hàng cho khách hàng, bao gồm: mở tài khoản tại quầy, tiết kiệm, vay tín chấp, sản phẩm đầu tư (chứng chỉ quỹ, trái phiếu), giới thiệu khoản vay, thẻ tín dụng, bảo hiểm.

Chăm sóc khách hàng, thực hiện bán chéo các sản phẩm.

(06/2020 – 01/2021)

CÔNG TY BẢO HIỂM NHÂN THỌ PRUDENTIAL

Chuyên viên tư vấn tài chính – Bancassurance ShinhanBank

Tìm kiếm khách hàng và tư vấn cho khách hàng các kế hoạch tài chính phù hợp. Giải quyết yêu cầu quyền lợi bảo hiểm. Chăm sóc khách hàng. Hỗ trợ kết hợp tổ chức các chương trình, sự kiện thúc đẩy bán.

Kênh bảo hiểm kết hợp ngân hàng.

(03/2019 – 11/2019)

CÔNG TY BẢO HIỂM NHÂN THỌ AIA VIỆT NAM

Quản lý quan hệ khách hàng cao cấp – nest by AIA.

Tìm kiếm và tư vấn cho khách hàng các kế hoạch tài chính, bảo hiểm phù hợp. 

Giải quyết các yêu cầu bồi thường quyền lợi bảo hiểm và các thủ tục khác cho khách hàng. Chăm sóc khách hàng hiện có.

Hỗ trợ tổ chức các sự kiện để thu hút khách hàng. 

(10/2018 – 02/2019)

CÔNG TY BẢO HIỂM NHÂN THỌ PRUDENTIAL

Chuyên viên tư vấn tài chính – Bancassurance PVcombank.

Tìm kiếm khách hàng và tư vấn cho khách hàng các kế hoạch tài chính phù hợp. Giải quyết yêu cầu quyền lợi bảo hiểm. Chăm sóc khách hàng. Hỗ trợ kết hợp tổ chức các chương trình, sự kiện thúc đẩy bán.

Kênh bảo hiểm kết hợp ngân hàng. Khai thác mới 7 hợp đồng bảo hiểm.

(03/2017 – 03/2018)

CÔNG TY TƯ VẤN THƯƠNG HIỆU VÀ GIẢI PHÁP TIẾP THỊ HÀNG ĐẦU (TOP!BRAND)

Account Manager

Tư vấn và triển khai các dự án marketing của khách hàng: tư vấn chiến lược các dự án bất động sản (từ nghiên cứu thị trường, tập khách hàng, định vị dự án, câu chuyện truyền thông, bộ nhận diện thương hiệu, key visual,…); quản lý thiết kế và sản xuất in ấn saleskit, brochure, media booking; lập kế hoạch & viết bài PR; digital marketing, OOH,…

Các dự án đã thực hiện: The Sapphire Residence Hạ Long (DojiLand), các dự án bất động sản của T&T Group tại Hà Nội & Đà Nẵng (T&T Twins Tower, T&T Riverside), chiến dịch khai trương khách sạn của Vinpearl (Vinpearl Hà Tĩnh Hotel), VAD Company Profile,…

		

(08/2015 – 04/2016)

CÔNG TY KINH DOANH BẤT ĐỘNG SẢN VINHOMES 2 (VINGROUP)

Nhân viên Marketing	

Lập kế hoạch Marketing tổng thể 360 độ (tất cả các kênh: online marketing: facebook, TVC, PR...; offline: sự kiện mở bán, training sales, biển bảng, ảnh 3D, ...) cho dự án bất động sản sắp ra mắt (Vincom Shophouse Yên Bái). 

Triển khai một phần các hoạt động marketing trong kế hoạch marketing đã được lập các dự án bất động sản khác của Vinhomes (Vinhomes Gardenia, Vincom Shophouse Hải Phòng, Vincom Shophouse Thái Bình,…)

Giao tiếp, phối hợp với các bộ phận, đối tác cung cấp dịch vụ,... để thúc đẩy hoàn thành nhiệm vụ đúng deadline, hiệu quả và đạt tiêu chuẩn cao.

Đàm phán trả giá và tìm kiếm các nhà thầu/agency mới để đảm bảo Vinhomes có được dịch vụ tốt nhất với mức giá phù hợp nhất. 

Sáng tạo và đảm bảo tất cả các tài liệu truyền thông (flyer, saleskit, quảng cáo, bài PR,...) được tạo ra với tiêu chuẩn cao nhất và chính xác nhất.

		

	Xin trân trọng cảm ơn!

overview_CV: Nguyễn Mai Phương is a dedicated and detail-oriented professional with over 6 years of experience in marketing, customer service, and financial consultancy. Skilled in Microsoft Office, SPSS data analysis, and customer relationship management, she has successfully managed high-level client relationships, achieved sales targets, and implemented marketing strategies for various projects. With a background that includes roles such as Account Manager at a leading marketing consultancy firm and Account Manager at a prominent real estate company, Nguyễn Mai Phương has honed her expertise in marketing, financial product knowledge, and event planning. She holds a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration with a specialization in Marketing from HỌC VIỆN CÔNG NGHỆ BƯU CHÍNH VIỄN THÔNG, and she excels in soft skills such as communication, customer service, and relationship management. Fluent in English with an IELTS score of 7.0, Nguyễn Mai Phương is now seeking a challenging position in marketing or finance to leverage her skills and experience to drive business success and growth. With a proven track record of delivering results and a strong foundation in both hard and soft skills, she is ready to make a significant impact in her next role.

Looking to collaborate with a dynamic team to deliver exceptional service and drive revenue growth. Eager to continuously develop and enhance relationships with customers to achieve mutual success and satisfaction.

Skilled in communication and problem-solving, I have successfully built and maintained customer relationships while analyzing their needs and providing suitable solutions. Currently working at VPBank as a Chuyen Vien Cao Cap Quan He Khach Hang Uu Tien, I prioritize customer satisfaction to drive business growth. My hard skills in customer relationship management, along with my fluency in Vietnamese, make me a valuable asset in enhancing customer experiences and driving business success.

overview_CV:
With a strong background in banking and real estate, I bring 7 years of experience in marketing, customer relationship management, and financial planning. Throughout my career, I have consistently surpassed sales targets and have been recognized for outstanding performance. I am now seeking a challenging role in a professional setting where I can continue to develop my skills and contribute to the company's growth.

My experience includes roles as a Sales Specialist at Soyoon Company, where I engaged in customer acquisition, product consultation, and financial planning. I also supported post-sales activities and trained new employees in business knowledge. Moving on to Dịch Vụ và Địa Ốc Đất Xanh Miền Bắc, I continued to excel in marketing, customer acquisition, and financial planning, along with customer support and employee training. Most recently, at One Mount Group Times City, I further honed my skills in marketing, customer relations, and financial planning, contributing to the company's success.

I hold a degree in Economics from Kinh Tế Quốc Dân and have completed various training courses, including "Ứng dụng Excel trong thẩm định dự án đầu tư" and "Quản lý trong các tổ chức quốc tế" at ĐH Kinh Tế Quốc Dân, where I received accolades for my proficiency in these areas. Additionally, I have achieved a high level of proficiency in the TOPIK Korean language exam.

In terms of soft skills, I excel in communication, problem-solving, teamwork, and time management. My hard skills include proficiency in Microsoft Excel, financial analysis, marketing, customer relationship management, and business development.

I hold certifications in "Ứng dụng Excel trong thẩm định dự án đầu tư" and "Quản lý trong các tổ chức quốc tế" from ĐH Kinh Tế Quốc Dân, as well as the TOPIK Korean language certification.

With a track record of exceeding expectations and a strong foundation in both soft and hard skills, I am confident in my ability to make a positive impact in a new professional setting.

overview_CV: With 5 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in sales, customer service, and financial analysis, consistently surpassing sales targets and earning recognition for my performance. I am currently seeking a challenging role as a Chuyên Viên SME at VPBank, a leading digital bank in Vietnam. My career objective is to utilize my expertise in sales and customer service to drive business growth and contribute to the success of the organization. I have a proven track record of exceeding business targets, as evidenced by the Bằng khen Vượt Chỉ Tiêu Kinh Doanh I received for my exceptional performance at Công ty cổ phần dịch vụ và địa ốc Đất Xanh Miền Bắc. My soft skills include strong communication, problem-solving, teamwork, adaptability, and professionalism, while my hard skills encompass sales, business development, digital transformation, financial analysis, and real estate development. I am fluent in Vietnamese and am dedicated to achieving excellence in all aspects of my work.

overview_CV:
With over a decade of experience in project management and team leadership, I am a dedicated professional skilled in strategic planning, problem-solving, and effective communication. My track record includes successfully managing complex projects, ensuring timely delivery within budget, and fostering strong relationships with stakeholders and team members. In my most recent role as a Software Engineer at XYZ Tech Solutions, I developed and maintained software applications, collaborated with cross-functional teams, and implemented best practices for software development. Prior to that, as a Data Analyst at ABC Analytics, I analyzed complex data sets, created visualizations for stakeholders, and improved data quality processes. As a Project Manager at QRS Consulting, I led project teams to deliver within scope and budget, managed stakeholder communications, and implemented project management methodologies for success.

I hold a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from the University of California, Berkeley, where I honed my analytical skills and technical knowledge. I am fluent in English, conversational in Spanish, proficient in French, and have intermediate knowledge of German. Additionally, I possess hard skills in Python programming, data analysis, project management, Microsoft Excel, and statistical analysis.

I bring a wealth of certifications to the table, including the Project Management Professional (PMP) from the Project Management Institute (PMI), the Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) from the International Information System Security Certification Consortium (ISC)², the Certified Scrum Master (CSM) from Scrum Alliance, ITIL Foundation from AXELOS, and CompTIA Security+. These certifications demonstrate my expertise in project management, information security, Scrum practices, IT service management, network security, and risk management.

Seeking a challenging project management role, I am eager to leverage my skills, experience, and certifications to drive project success and contribute to the growth of the organization. My soft skills in communication, teamwork, time management, leadership, and problem-solving further enhance my ability to lead teams and deliver results.

overview_CV: Hello, I am Nguyễn Thị Hạnh Nhung, a highly skilled and motivated Senior Customer Relationship Specialist based in Hanoi, Vietnam. With 5 years of experience in the banking industry, my strengths lie in exceptional communication, problem-solving abilities, and a strong customer service orientation. Throughout my career, I have consistently exceeded sales targets, resolved complex customer issues, and nurtured lasting relationships with clients. I am currently seeking a challenging role in a reputable organization where I can utilize my skills to drive customer satisfaction and contribute to business growth. I am particularly interested in securing a position as a Senior Customer Relationship Specialist at VPBank, where I can enhance customer satisfaction, drive sales, and strengthen client relationships. With a commitment to delivering exceptional service and achieving targets in a dynamic environment, my goal is to contribute to the growth and success of the organization while continuing to develop professionally in the banking industry. My soft skills include being cheerful, sociable, meticulous, persistent, responsible, eager to learn, and a good listener. Additionally, my hard skills encompass strong individual and team work capabilities, a sense of responsibility, and adaptability to new environments. I am confident in my ability to effectively contribute to the success of any organization I become a part of.

overview_CV: With 6 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in customer service, sales, and financial advisory. Throughout my career, I have consistently exceeded sales targets, maintained high levels of customer satisfaction, and provided accurate and timely financial advice to clients. In my most recent role as a Priority Relationship Manager at Vietnam International Commercial Joint Stock Bank (VIB), I excelled in advising customers on bank products, sales, customer service, and account management. My educational background includes a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration from the Banking Academy of Vietnam and ongoing studies at the Hanoi National University of Education. I possess strong soft skills such as communication, customer service, problem-solving, teamwork, and adaptability, as well as hard skills in banking knowledge, sales, financial advising, product knowledge, and client relationship management. I am proficient in English and hold certifications in Business Administration and Banking from reputable institutions. My track record of success in the banking sector, combined with my commitment to professional growth and development, makes me a valuable asset to any dynamic and goal-oriented team. I am now seeking a new opportunity to further enhance my skills and contribute to the success of an organization that values excellence and innovation.

overview_CV: With over 2 years of experience in banking, I am a Director of Customer Relations with a proven track record of exceeding sales targets and increasing customer retention rates. At Ngân hàng OCB, I successfully provided tailored financial solutions to meet client needs, attracting new customers and upselling to existing ones. My responsibilities included consulting on interest rates and savings packages, opening payment accounts, and training new employees on banking products. I am dedicated to delivering high-end customer service and solving problems efficiently. In my role, I managed VIP clients, achieved key performance indicators, and reported on business plans to drive growth. I am fluent in Vietnamese and eager to further develop my career in credit services to contribute to the success of a financial institution.

13. Tại sao Anh/Chị muốn làm việc tại VPBank
VPBank là ngân hàng có lịch sử hình thành và phát triển từ năm 1993, là ngân hàng Ngân hàng TMCP đã có sự tăng trưởng đột phá,
tăng gần 100 bậc và lọt vào Top 300, đứng ở vị trí 280 trên bảng xêp hạng và vị trí cao nhất đối với ngân hàng tư nhân của Việt Nam.
Ngoài ra tôi được biết VP Bank là ngân hàng có chính sách đãi ngộ và chế độ lương thưởng rất tốt cho nhân viên. Vì đó tôi muốn
được gia nhập VP Bank, được làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, được trau dồi bản thân, cống hiến sức mình vào sự phát triển
của VP Bank.14. Anh/chị từng được khen thưởng hoặc bị kỷ luật chưa? Anh/chị vui lòng chia sẻ chi tiết về thông tin khen thưởng/kỷ luật(nếu có)
Tôi đã đạt được thành tích: Cá nhân tiêu biểu 6 tháng cuối năm 2018, 2 lần đạt giải chuyên viên bán hàng tốt nhất tháng, giải nhì
chương trình "mỗi ngày một combo" của khu vực Hà Nội.Tôi xin cam đoan những thông tin cung cấp trên đây là hoàn toàn đúng sự thật và đầy đủ. Tôi đồng ý để Ngân hàng thẩm tra những
điều mà tôi đã khai. Tôi xin hoàn toàn chịu trách nhiệm nếu những thông tin trên sai lệch. Tôi tự nguyện và cam kết công khai minh
bạch khi tham gia các bước trong quy trình tuyển dụng của VPBank.

overview_CV: Dedicated and experienced business support specialist with a strong background in the banking industry, boasting over 3 years of hands-on experience. Proficient in data reporting, customer relationship management, and driving business development initiatives. Noteworthy accomplishments include consistently surpassing growth targets for deposit mobilization and credit disbursement. Seeking a challenging role in a professional setting where I can utilize my skills to contribute to organizational development and success. My career objective is to leverage my expertise in business support and customer relationship management to propel growth within a dynamic banking environment. I am eager to join a reputable institution like VPBank that offers a supportive work culture and ample opportunities for professional advancement. With a keen eye for detail and a proactive attitude, I am ready to take on new challenges and make a positive impact on the organization's objectives. My soft skills include excellent communication, strong teamwork abilities, effective problem-solving skills, efficient time management, and a customer-centric approach. On the technical front, I excel in data reporting, customer relationship management, credit assessment, sales, and market research. My dedication to continuous improvement is reflected in my pursuit of certifications, although specific details are not provided in the text. My work experience at Ngân Hàng Vietcombank showcases my ability to act as a liaison for data reporting on Priority customers, develop and expand new individual and SME customer relationships, and achieve set targets for deposit growth, credit disbursement, and card issuance. Additionally, my experience in seeking out customers to use POS machines demonstrates my proactive approach to business development. Overall, I am a results-driven professional with a proven track record of success in the banking sector, poised to excel in any challenging role that comes my way.

overview_CV:
With 8 years of experience in banking and financial services, I am an experienced finance professional skilled in customer relationship management, investment advisory, and sales. I have successfully managed high net worth client portfolios and consistently achieved sales targets. My most recent role as a Trưởng phòng at Công ty CP tài chính Bảo Tín involved managing the brokerage department, supporting staff in client acquisition, and maintaining client and partner relationships. Prior to this, I worked as a Chuyên viên chăm sóc khách hàng ưu tiên at Ngân Hàng Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng - VPBank, where I managed and developed a portfolio of priority customers, achieved KPI targets, and organized sales events. Additionally, my experience as a Chuyên viên quan hệ KH Cá nhân at Ngân Hàng Sài Gòn Thương Tín - Sacombank involved meeting credit and deposit targets, providing financial advice to customers, and implementing new banking products and solutions. 

I hold a degree in Accounting from Đại học kinh doanh và công nghệ Hà Nội, where I maintained a GPA of 7.3. My career has been characterized by a strong focus on customer satisfaction, business development, and achieving targets. I possess a range of soft skills such as customer support, relationship management, and strategic planning, complemented by hard skills including portfolio management, business development, and financial product advisory. My goal is to leverage my extensive experience and skills in a challenging position within a dynamic financial institution to drive business growth and enhance client satisfaction.

overview_CV: With a strong background in building and maintaining customer relationships, I am Nguyễn Trọng Tài, a highly experienced Senior Customer Relationship Officer based in Hanoi, Vietnam. Over my five-year tenure in the banking industry, particularly at VPBank, I have excelled in addressing customer inquiries and issues, providing product information and solutions, and consistently meeting sales targets. My expertise lies in communication, problem-solving, and conflict resolution, leading to achievements such as exceeding sales targets, resolving complex customer issues, and increasing client retention rates. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration from the University of Economics and Business, showcasing my commitment to continuous learning and professional development. Possessing a range of soft skills such as communication, leadership, honesty, and thoroughness, coupled with hard skills in customer relationship management, sales, financial analysis, and project management, I am well-equipped to drive business growth and customer satisfaction in a challenging role as a Senior Customer Relationship Officer. My proficiency in both Vietnamese and English languages further enhances my ability to connect with a diverse range of clients and stakeholders.

With over 10 years of experience in project management and team leadership, I have a proven track record of successfully delivering complex projects on time and within budget. I excel in communication, problem-solving, and strategic planning, and have a strong background in risk management and stakeholder engagement. Some of my biggest achievements include leading a team that completed a major software implementation ahead of schedule and under budget, as well as increasing customer satisfaction ratings by 20% through process improvements. I am now seeking a challenging new role where I can continue to leverage my skills and drive successful project outcomes.

overview_CV:
With over a decade of experience in project management and team leadership, I have a proven track record of delivering complex projects on time and within budget. I excel in communication, problem-solving, and strategic planning, with a strong background in risk management and stakeholder engagement. Notable achievements include leading a team to complete a major software implementation ahead of schedule and under budget and increasing customer satisfaction ratings by 20% through process improvements. Seeking a challenging senior project management position to drive successful project outcomes. My expertise lies in leading cross-functional teams, implementing strategic initiatives, and delivering high-impact projects that drive business growth and success.

In my role as a Marketing Coordinator at XYZ Marketing Agency, I successfully created and implemented marketing strategies, managed social media accounts, coordinated events, analyzed market trends, and collaborated with departments to achieve marketing goals. Additionally, as a Sales Associate at ABC Retail Store, I provided exceptional customer service, maintained store cleanliness, restocked inventory, processed transactions, and enhanced the overall shopping experience.

I hold a Bachelor of Arts in Economics from Harvard University and was the Valedictorian of my high school class at Phillips Exeter Academy. My soft skills include communication, teamwork, problem-solving, and time management. I possess hard skills in data analysis, programming, project management, and graphic design. Fluent in English, intermediate in Spanish, and advanced in French.

Certifications include Project Management Professional (PMP) from the Project Management Institute, Certified Scrum Master (CSM) from Scrum Alliance, First Aid Certification from the American Red Cross (including CPR training), and ITIL Foundation Certification from AXELOS. These certifications demonstrate my commitment to professional development and keeping my skills current in the rapidly changing field of project management.

I am eager to contribute towards the company's success while further developing my professional skill set in a dynamic work environment.

My strengths lie in client relationship management, negotiation, and problem-solving, which have consistently led me to surpass sales goals by 20% and earn recognition for outstanding performance. I am eager to bring my expertise to a reputable company where I can contribute to revenue growth and enhance customer satisfaction within a dynamic work environment.

I am NGUYỄN QUYẾT TÂM, a seasoned Chuyên viên Cao cấp QHKH Ưu tiên with a strong background in customer relationship management in the finance and banking industry. Armed with exceptional research, analytical, and communication skills, I have a proven track record of excelling both independently and as part of a team, even under high-pressure and time-constrained environments. I am highly disciplined, creative, and always eager to learn, with a knack for strategic planning and problem-solving. 

I am currently seeking a challenging position as a Senior Specialist in Customer Relationship Management at VPBank, where I aim to leverage my expertise to contribute significantly to the organization's success. With a keen interest in further developing my skills and knowledge in a dynamic and collaborative work setting, I am prepared to take on new challenges and deliver exceptional results for the company. 

In my previous role as a Senior Specialist in Priority Customer Service at VPBank, I honed my expertise in customer relationship management and gained valuable experience that I am eager to apply in my next role. Additionally, my educational background includes a [Degree Earned] from [Name of College] and a High School Diploma with Honors from [Name of High School], showcasing my commitment to academic excellence. 

My soft skills include patience, sociability, dynamism, honesty, and a meticulous nature, while my hard skills encompass strong research, synthesis, and analytical abilities, deep expertise in finance and banking, proficiency in working independently or in a team under high-pressure and time-sensitive situations, discipline, creativity, eagerness to learn, strategic planning, and problem-solving skills. With fluency in Vietnamese and English, I am well-equipped to excel in diverse professional settings.

overview_CV:
With over 7 years of experience in digital marketing, content creation, and social media management, I am a seasoned marketing professional skilled in developing and implementing effective strategies to enhance brand awareness and drive customer engagement. My track record includes successfully launching and managing marketing campaigns that have significantly increased leads and sales. I possess strong analytical skills and excel at utilizing data to optimize marketing efforts and achieve impactful results. 

In my most recent role as a Marketing Manager at ABC Marketing Agency, I spearheaded the development and implementation of marketing strategies that led to an expansion of the client base. I also effectively managed a team of marketing professionals to execute campaigns while analyzing market trends and competitor activities to identify new opportunities. Prior to this, I gained valuable customer service experience as a Sales Associate at XYZ Retail Store, where I assisted customers with product selection, maintained store organization, and handled transactions and inquiries. Additionally, my internship at LMN Consulting Firm honed my research and presentation skills, as well as my ability to contribute in team meetings and brainstorming sessions.

My educational background includes a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with honors from Stanford University, where I further developed my problem-solving and project management skills. As a Valedictorian at XYZ High School, I demonstrated strong leadership and communication abilities. I am fluent in English and proficient in Spanish, with intermediate skills in French and basic proficiency in German. My hard skills include Python programming, data analysis, project management, Microsoft Excel, and statistical analysis.

Furthermore, I hold certifications in Project Management Professional (PMP), Certified Scrum Master (CSM), and ITIL Foundation Certification, showcasing my commitment to continuous learning and professional growth. With a passion for creating impactful marketing strategies that resonate with target audiences and deliver measurable results, I am eager to leverage my skills and experience to drive business growth and contribute to the success of a dynamic organization. I am seeking a challenging marketing role where I can collaborate with a talented team to drive innovation and achieve marketing objectives.

overview_CV:
With over 10 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in credit management, financial analysis, and customer service. Throughout my career, I have successfully reduced non-performing loans and effectively managed client relationships. I am proficient in Microsoft Office and hold a TOEIC certification in English. My educational background includes a Master's degree in Economics from the University of Economics - Law in Ho Chi Minh City and a Bachelor's degree in Finance - Banking from Banking University of Ho Chi Minh City. I have also undergone various training courses in legal aspects of banking, financial report analysis, and pedagogical skills for university and college lecturers. 

In my most recent role as a Credit Quality Management Specialist at Saigon Bank, I proposed solutions to control bad debts and overdue debts, working closely with the Business Development Department and Product Development Department to ensure product alignment. Additionally, at Vietnam International Bank, I served as a Principal Debt Resolution Officer, directly handling bad debts through measures such as lawsuits, collateral seizure, and asset sales. Prior to this, I held various roles at Lienviet Post Joint Stock Commercial Bank, including Business Development Specialist, Head of Business Development Team, Deputy Director of Customer Department, and Director of Krông Ana Transaction Office.

I have a strong foundation in risk management, financial analysis, and credit quality management, along with a solid understanding of legal aspects in banking operations. My hard skills include proficiency in the Microsoft Office suite, complemented by soft skills such as communication, problem-solving, teamwork, leadership, and time management. I am dedicated to continuing my professional development and contributing to the success of a reputable financial institution.

Summary:

A highly motivated and responsible individual with 4 years of experience in customer relationship management. Skilled in using Microsoft Office software and always strive for excellence in every task. Strong ability to work well in a team environment and handle pressure effectively. Proven track record of maintaining excellent client relationships and achieving customer satisfaction. Seeking a challenging position in customer relationship management to further develop and utilize my skills.

I am seeking a challenging position where I can leverage my skills to contribute to organizational growth and success. Additionally, I have completed a MOS theYOUNG certification with a high level of proficiency in English and demonstrated soft skills in communication, customer service, and time management.
