14. Tại sao Anh/Chị muốn làm việc tại VPBank
 VPBank là một trong những ngân hàng TMCP lớn nhất hiện nay, có mức độ uy tín cao
 Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, năng động và thân thiện giúp em có cơ hội được học hỏi kinh nghiệm từ các anh chị đi trước,
trau dồi bản thân và phát triển các kỹ năng cần thiết.
 Ngoài ra, VPBank có chế độ đãi ngộ với nhân viên rất tốt, giúp nhân viên có động lực làm việc và nhận được kết quả xứng đáng so
với những gì họ bỏ ra.Tôi xin cam đoan những thông tin cung cấp trên đây là hoàn toàn đúng sự thật và đầy đủ. Tôi đồng ý để Ngân hàng thẩm tra những
điều mà tôi đã khai. Tôi xin hoàn toàn chịu trách nhiệm nếu những thông tin trên sai lệch.

overview_CV: With over 5 years of experience in the banking industry, I, Mai Thị Ánh, have honed my skills in customer service, financial analysis, and risk management. Throughout my career, I have successfully implemented cost-saving strategies and increased customer satisfaction rates by 15%. I am now seeking a challenging role at VPBank where I can further enhance my expertise and contribute to the organization's success. My objective is to leverage my banking and finance knowledge to drive growth and profitability at VPBank while delivering exceptional service to clients. My strong skills in professionalism, communication, problem-solving, teamwork, adaptability, time management, attention to detail, leadership, customer service, and financial analysis make me a valuable asset to any team. I am dedicated to continuously learning and developing my skills to contribute to the overall success of the bank. My language proficiency includes Vietnamese, and I am also proficient in English. I hold a certificate in an unknown field issued on March 14, 2023. My commitment to excellence and continuous improvement sets me apart as a candidate for a role at VPBank.

overview_CV:
As a dedicated legal professional with a year of experience in various legal fields, including consulting and litigation, I possess strong skills in legal research, drafting legal documents, and providing legal advice to clients. My ability to work well under pressure and in fast-paced environments makes me a valuable team player. I have a proven track record of contributing effectively to legal teams and am committed to furthering my knowledge and skills in a challenging and dynamic work environment. My experience includes working at Kho Tiki as a warehouse employee, where I processed e-commerce orders following a set process. Additionally, I interned at LH Legal, assisting lawyers with legal consultation, research, and drafting legal arguments. I also worked at the Land Registration Office in Trà Bồng, Quảng Ngãi, supporting project tasks and organizing internal documents. Furthermore, I searched for missing land use rights certificates and summarized land use data at the national level at a technology and environmental resources consulting company.

I hold a degree in Civil Law from Ho Chi Minh City University of Law, where I honed my legal knowledge and skills. I possess soft skills such as creativity, logic, adaptability, teamwork, and effective communication with colleagues and clients. My hard skills include proficiency in English, legal consultation, drafting legal documents, research, and data organization. I hold a TOEIC certificate with a score of 555 and an A-level certificate in office computing. With a passion for law and a commitment to continuous learning and improvement, I am eager to contribute to a supportive and collaborative legal team, providing high-quality legal services and making a positive impact in the field of law.

Summary:
Experienced customer care specialist with 5+ years of experience in the banking industry. Skilled in building strong relationships with clients, resolving issues efficiently, and providing exceptional customer service. Demonstrated ability to achieve high levels of customer satisfaction and retention. Proven track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets. Seeking a challenging role as a Customer Care Specialist to leverage my skills and contribute to the growth of the organization.

Career Objective:
To secure a position as a Customer Care Specialist at VPBank, utilizing my extensive experience and skills in customer service to provide exceptional support to clients and contribute to the company's success. I aim to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty through effective communication, problem-solving, and relationship-building. Looking for an opportunity to further develop my professional abilities and make a positive impact within the organization.

overview_CV: Hello, my name is Doãn Giáng Hương, and I am a dedicated Customer Care Specialist with over 5 years of experience in the banking industry. Throughout my career, I have honed my skills in building strong relationships with clients, efficiently resolving issues, and delivering exceptional customer service. I have a proven track record of achieving high levels of customer satisfaction and retention, as well as exceeding sales targets. Currently residing in KĐT Lê Trọng Tấn, An Khánh, Hoài Đức, Hà Nội, I am actively seeking a challenging role in customer care to leverage my expertise and drive organizational growth. I am confident in my ability to contribute effectively to any organization looking for a dynamic and customer-centric professional. My educational background includes a degree from College [Name of College] and [Earned Degree] from High School [Name of High School]. In terms of soft skills, I possess excellent communication, strong personality, decisiveness, and a friendly demeanor. On the other hand, my hard skills include cooking, flower arrangement, caring for plants, raising fish and birds, and pottery. With a positive attitude and a passion for exceeding customer expectations, I am excited about the opportunity to make a meaningful impact in a Customer Care Specialist role, particularly at VPBank.

overview_CV: With 4 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in business development, customer service, and team leadership. My track record includes consistently exceeding sales targets, organizing successful customer-attracting events, and recruiting top talent for my teams. I have worked as a Business Specialist at Tien Phong Commercial Joint Stock Bank, achieving outstanding results in credit card sales, mobilization, insurance, and more. At Shinhan Bank, I specialized in the Smart Credit card distribution channel, achieving monthly sales targets and providing direct product advice to customers. Additionally, my experience as a Project Development Officer at the Vietnam Chamber of Commerce and Industry involved connecting schools and businesses in training and human resource recruitment. With a Bachelor's degree in Banking and Finance and a Master's degree in Human Resource Management, along with specialized training in English for the finance and banking industry, I possess a strong educational background to complement my practical experience. My strong soft skills in event organization, recruitment, consultation, and communication, combined with hard skills in business, sales, project development, and human resource management, make me a well-rounded candidate. I am fluent in English with a B certificate and have a strong proficiency in Vietnamese. I am now seeking a challenging position where I can continue to grow and contribute significantly to the financial sector.

overview_CV: With over a decade of experience in sales and marketing, I am a seasoned professional skilled in developing marketing strategies, building client relationships, and driving revenue growth. I have a proven track record of leading teams to surpass sales targets and expand market reach through innovative campaigns that enhance brand awareness and customer engagement. My objective is to leverage my expertise in sales and marketing to contribute to a forward-thinking company, implementing strategic initiatives that fuel business growth and deliver measurable results. My work experience includes roles as a Marketing Coordinator at XYZ Company, where I spearheaded marketing strategies, managed social media, coordinated events, and analyzed market trends. Additionally, as a Sales Associate at ABC Corporation, I excelled in assisting customers, processing transactions, maintaining store appearance, and achieving sales objectives. During my internship at the DEF Internship Program, I gained valuable hands-on experience across various departments such as marketing, sales, and operations. My educational background includes a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from the University of California, Berkeley, a Master of Business Administration from Stanford University, and I am currently pursuing a Doctor of Philosophy in Computer Science at Harvard University. I possess a comprehensive skill set that includes soft skills such as communication, teamwork, problem-solving, leadership, and time management, as well as hard skills in Python programming, Microsoft Excel, data analysis, project management, and financial modeling. Additionally, I am multilingual with fluency in English, conversational skills in Spanish, professional proficiency in French, advanced level in German, intermediate in Italian, and basic knowledge of Mandarin and Japanese. I hold certifications in Project Management Professional (PMP) from the Project Management Institute, Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) from Scrum Alliance, AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate from Amazon Web Services, and ITIL Foundation Certification from Axelos. My dedication to professional development is evident in my pursuit of certifications and ongoing commitment to enhancing my skills.

overview_CV:
With over 4 years of experience in the banking industry, I am a dedicated professional with a strong background in customer service, sales, and financial consulting. Throughout my career, I have consistently exceeded sales targets, built lasting client relationships, and delivered top-notch service. My experience includes roles as a Giao dịch viên at Ngân hàng TMCP Việt Á and as a Nhân viên tư vấn dịch vụ tài chính cá nhân at Ngân hàng TMCP Sài Gòn, where I provided expert advice, managed client portfolios, and met business development targets. I hold a high school degree from Trung học phổ thông Xuân Đỉnh with a GPA of 8 and currently pursuing a degree in Kế toán at Đại học mỏ địa chất with a GPA of 7.6. In addition to my educational background, I possess a range of soft skills including communication, customer service, problem-solving, teamwork, and time management, as well as hard skills in financial analysis, sales, banking operations, product knowledge, and business development.

My language proficiency includes intermediate English and fluency in Vietnamese. I have also completed a certification in English at Trung tâm giáo dục quốc tế IIC to further enhance my language skills. Furthermore, I have received training in computer skills, specifically in office applications, demonstrating proficiency in this area. My goal is to continue expanding my knowledge and skills in the banking sector, contributing to the growth and success of the organization I work for while advancing my own career development.

điều mà tôi đã khai. Tôi xin hoàn toàn chịu trách nhiệm nếu những thông tin trên sai lệch. Tôi tự nguyện và cam kết công khai minh
bạch khi tham gia các bước trong quy trình tuyển dụng của VPBank.

Giám đốc bán hàng

Bận việc gia đình

Mô tả công việc:

Nhận chỉ tiêu của Giám đốc kinh doanh

Lên kế hoạch bán hàng, giao chỉ tiêu cho NVKD khu vực phụ trách

Hỗ nhận nhân viên bán hàng, gặp gỡ khách hàng để nắm thông tin thị trường, giải quyết các vấn đề mà tồn đọng mà NVKD chưa xử lý được

Hỗ trợ kế toán thu hồi công nợ

Hỗ trợ NS tuyển dụng NVKD cho khu vực mình phụ trách

Đi công tác theo kế hoạch và theo sự phân công của Ban Giám đốc nếu cần thiết

Các công việc khác phát sinh ngoài thị trường…

NGƯỜI THAM KHẢO

Họ và tên

Quan hệ

Công ty

Chức vụ

Điện thoại

CÁC THÔNG TIN KHÁC

Anh/Chị có thể làm việc ngoài giờ 

x□ Có            □ Không           □ Đôi khi

Anh/Chị có thể đi công tác (trong hoặc ngoài nước) theo yêu cầu của Công ty 

x□ Có            □ Không           □ Đôi khi

Anh/Chị có người thân/ người quen làm việc tại Công ty chúng tôi 



□ Không  

 

□ Có

Nếu có ghi rõ Họ tên và Phòng ban:  

                                                  
                     

Nêu điểm mạnh của Anh/Chị 



Là người làm việc có trách nhiệm, nhanh nhẹn nhưng cẩn thận. Khả năng đi công tác, làm việc độc lập, làm việc nhóm và tạo ấn tượng với khách hàng…

Nêu điểm yếu của Anh/Chị 

Điểm yếu về ngoại ngữ,( khả năng tiểu lượng yếu) 

Đôi khi xử lý vấn đề thuyên về tình cảm



Nêu sở thích của Anh/Chị 



Sở thích thể thao, chơi bóng chuyền, bi da, cờ tướng

Mục tiêu nghề nghiệp (nêu định hướng phát triển nghề nghiệp của Anh/chị trong vòng 2-5 năm tới)

Định hướng có một công việc ổn định, để học hỏi trau dồi kiến thức. Trong vòng 5 năm đến làm chủ được thời gian, tài chính của ban thân và gia đình

Có thể mua ít cổ tức mà Công ty mình đang làm, BGĐ tạp điều kiện

Mong muốn của Anh/Chị khi làm việc tại Công ty chúng tôi

Mong muốn được làm ở môi trường chuyên nghiệp, được sự hòa đồng giúp đỡ của đồng nghiệp để hoàn thành công việc mà Công ty giao phó

Bên cạnh đó có mức đãi ngộ tương xứng để đảm bảo được cuộc sống cho bản thân, giúp đỡ được gia đình. Để từ đó gắng bó dài lâu với Công ty



Khi nào Anh/Chị có thể nhận việc 



 Ngay lập tức Công ty có thông báo tiếp nhận



Mức lương mong đợi cho vị trí ứng tuyển

Theo quy định của NH



CAM KẾT

Tôi xin cam kết những thông tin cung cấp trên đây là đúng sư thật và hoàn toàn chính xác. Trong trường hợp Công ty điều tra và xác minh những thông tin trên là không đúng sự thật, tôi hoàn toàn chịu trách nhiệm với các hình thức kỷ luật của Công ty.

        Ký tên

                                                                                              (Ứng viên ký và ghi rõ họ tên)



                                                                                                              Bùi Văn Viện







                                                                                                        

  









			Trang 4/4

overview_CV: I am Bùi Văn Viện, a high-level CV professional from Gia Lai with a proven track record of over 10 years in sales and management roles. My expertise lies in team leadership, customer relationship management, and strategic planning, which have consistently led to exceeding sales targets and effectively managing operations. With experience as a Regional Managing Director at Gas Bình Minh and Sales Director at Thuốc Lá Thanh Bình, I have honed my skills in general branch operations management, sales operations, personnel management, and debt management. My educational background includes a Bachelor's degree in Economics from Quy Nhơn University and a Bachelor's degree in General Law from Đà Nẵng University. Additionally, I hold certifications in computer science, accounting, and notarial practice, showcasing my commitment to continuous learning and professional development. I am now seeking a challenging position where I can leverage my skills to contribute to the growth of the organization while continuing to expand my knowledge and capabilities. My dedication, quick thinking, attention to detail, and ability to work independently or as part of a team make me a valuable asset in any professional environment.

- Tiếp cận khách hàng tiềm năng
- Tìm hiểu nhu cầu, tư vấn và đề xuất giải pháp Tài chính cho khách hàng
- Hỗ trợ khách hàng trong quá trình ký hợp đồng và nộp phí
- Hỗ trợ trong việc xử lý, GQQL bảo hiểm, khiếu nại của khách hàng,…
- Tiếp cận, thiết lập mối quan hệ và chăm sóc khách hàng một cách chu đáo
- Tham gia các buổi tập huấn, đào tạo về kỹ năng tư vấn, đàm phán cũng như các kiến thức Tài chính để thực hiện nghiệp vụ một cách chuyên nghiệp.



Mục Tiêu Nghề Nghiêp: 



Tìm được công việc phù hợp với năng lực và sở thích của bản thân để có thể vận dụng tốt các kiến thức, kinh nghiệm đã được tích lũy trong suốt quá trình học và đi làm thêm.

Cố gắn tích lũy nhiều kinh nghiệm và phấn đấu không ngừng trong việc học hỏi, trao dồi kiến thức và năng lực của bản thân để có thể đáp ứng tốt nhất vị trí công việc được giao

Mong muốn tìm được công việc ổn định và làm việc lâu dài

THÔNG TIN ỨNG VIÊN
* Nhập đầy đủ các thông tin trong các ô text hiển thị trên File thông tin (nếu có)
* Không chỉnh sửa (thêm hàng, cột) File thông tin này, VPBank không ghi nhận những thông tin của File đã bị sửa format
* Những thông tin được bôi màu cam nhạt là bắt buộc ứng viên phải nhập
* Những thông tin được bôi màu xanh nhạt là thông tin ứng viên phải chọn từ list danh sách có sẵn

Summary:

I am a highly skilled and experienced Senior Customer Relationship Specialist with over 5 years of experience in the banking industry. My top skills include excellent communication, problem-solving, and customer service abilities. Some of my biggest achievements include consistently exceeding sales targets, building strong relationships with clients, and resolving complex customer inquiries efficiently. I am seeking a challenging role as a Senior Customer Relationship Specialist where I can utilize my skills to drive customer satisfaction and contribute to the growth of the organization. 

Career Objective:

To secure a Senior Customer Relationship Specialist position in a dynamic banking environment where I can leverage my extensive experience and skills to enhance customer relationships, drive sales, and contribute to the overall success of the organization.

overview_CV:
With over 3 years of experience in the banking industry, I have developed a strong background in customer relations and financial market analysis. My top skills include customer service, sales, and in-depth financial product knowledge. Throughout my career, I have consistently exceeded sales targets and maintained strong relationships with high-value clients. 

In my most recent role as a Senior Specialist Analyst at Ksfinance, I have honed my expertise in analyzing and evaluating financial market trends to facilitate decision-making. I actively engage with clients, providing continuous advice on various investment products while implementing effective sales strategies for the company. 

Prior to that, at the Ngân hàng Thương mại Cổ Phần Sài Gòn (SCB) as a Senior Customer Relationship Officer, I successfully managed business targets related to deposits, international credit cards, investment products, and insurance services. I maintained and developed existing Premier client relationships, planned daily sales activities, and provided guidance on service offerings according to customer care policies. 

Additionally, my experience as a Sales Administrator at Bảo Khánh Import-Export Company has equipped me with valuable administrative skills related to sales activities. Through my education at Trường Kinh Doanh và Công Nghệ Hà Nội, where I obtained a degree in Kế Toán, I have developed a strong foundation in accounting principles.

My soft skills include being proactive, eager to learn, and able to thrive under high-pressure situations. On the other hand, my hard skills encompass proficiency in computer skills, time management, financial market analysis, customer care, sales execution, report generation, and customer information management. 

I hold certifications in Sales Administration from Công ty CP Xuất Nhập Khẩu Bảo Khánh, as well as certificates in Senior Specialist roles from both Ksfinance and SCB. With my diverse skill set, extensive experience, and proven track record of exceeding expectations, I am now seeking a challenging role in a dynamic organization where I can leverage my skills to drive business growth and make a positive impact on the company's bottom line.

phát sinh, báo cáo kịp thời đến các cấp lãnh đạo.
Chuẩn bị, soạn thảo, xử lý các văn bản và giấy tờ, hồ sơ, hợp đổng, thư từ… của khách hàng cũng như bộ phận.
Tiếp nhận các thông tin, cập nhật dữ liệu, tình hình hoạt động của bộ phận một cách chính xác và đầy đủ.

13. Tại sao Anh/Chị muốn làm việc tại VPBank
Qua tìm hiểu em được biết Vpbank là một trong những ngân hàng có môi trường làm việc hiện đại, năng động, tuy có tính cạnh tranh
cao nhưng kèm theo đó là rất nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến. Bên cạnh đó có được mức thu nhập ổn định để nâng cao chất lượng cuộc sống
nên em đã lựa chọn VPbank
14. Anh/chị từng được khen thưởng hoặc bị kỷ luật chưa? Anh/chị vui lòng chia sẻ chi tiết về thông tin khen thưởng/kỷ luật(nếu có)
Khen thưởng: - Chi nhánh chuẩn đạt thành tích 3 năm xuất sắc liên tiếp.
- Top 2 chuyên viên xuất sắc chỉ tiêu thẻ vùng 14 quý III, Quý IV/2020
- Nhân viên đạt thành tích xếp hạng A1 năm 2021.
- Chuyên viên đạt doanh số bảo hiểm cao nhất vùng 14 năm 2021
- Top chuyên viên đạt Chip đi Nhật Bản 2021 ( FYP 6 tháng đầu năm đạt trên 500 tr).Tôi xin cam đoan những thông tin cung cấp trên đây là hoàn toàn đúng sự thật và đầy đủ. Tôi đồng ý để Ngân hàng thẩm tra những
điều mà tôi đã khai. Tôi xin hoàn toàn chịu trách nhiệm nếu những thông tin trên sai lệch. Tôi tự nguyện và cam kết công khai minh
bạch khi tham gia các bước trong quy trình tuyển dụng của VPBank.Anh/chị vui lòng ghi đúng ngày anh/chị khai thông tin, ký và ghi rõ họ tên đầy đủ

overview_CV:
With over 10 years of experience in project management, I have honed my skills in strategic planning, risk management, and stakeholder communication, consistently delivering successful projects on time and within budget. One of my major accomplishments includes leading a team to implement a new CRM system, resulting in a 20% increase in customer satisfaction. Seeking a challenging project management role, I aim to leverage my expertise to drive successful outcomes for organizations. My work experience ranges from marketing coordination to sales associate roles, where I excelled in coordinating marketing campaigns, managing social media accounts, and exceeding sales targets. As a former project manager in the construction industry, I managed projects from initiation to completion, ensuring compliance with safety regulations and quality standards. 

My educational background includes a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from the University of California, Berkeley, and a Master of Business Administration from Stanford University. I possess a diverse set of soft skills, including communication, teamwork, problem-solving, leadership, and time management, complemented by hard skills such as programming, data analysis, project management, graphic design, and proficiency in multiple foreign languages. I am fluent in English, conversational in Spanish, proficient in French, at an intermediate level in German, and have basic proficiency in Chinese.

Furthermore, I hold valuable certifications such as Project Management Professional (PMP) from the Project Management Institute, Certified Scrum Master (CSM) from Scrum Alliance, AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate from Amazon Web Services, and Six Sigma Green Belt from The Council for Six Sigma Certification. These certifications demonstrate my commitment to continuous learning and staying abreast of industry best practices.

With a proven track record of driving successful project outcomes, exceeding stakeholder expectations, and contributing to organizational success, I am well-equipped to take on a senior project management position. My combination of experience, skills, education, and certifications makes me a strong candidate for roles that require a seasoned project manager with a diverse skill set and a passion for delivering excellence.

overview_CV:
With over 7 years of experience in the banking industry, I bring a wealth of expertise in customer relationship management, sales, and communication skills to the table. Throughout my career, I have consistently exceeded sales targets, built a robust network of clients, and effectively resolved customer complaints. I am now eager to take on a challenging role at VPBank where I can leverage my skills to drive business growth and contribute to the organization's success.

In my previous roles at various banks, including Ngân Hàng TMCP Quốc Dân, Ngân hàng TMCP Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng, and Ngân Hàng TMCP Nam Á, I have honed my abilities in establishing and nurturing client relationships, introducing and promoting banking products and services, as well as addressing customer inquiries and complaints. My experience as a Giao Dịch Viên and Chăm sóc Khách Hàng Trực Tiếp has equipped me with strong customer service and sales capabilities, essential for driving business success in the banking sector.

My educational background includes professional training in accounting at the University of Economics and Business, enhancing my financial services knowledge. I am proficient in Microsoft Office applications, internet usage, and various social media platforms, showcasing my adaptability and tech-savvy nature. Additionally, my soft skills in communication, problem-solving, teamwork, and time management complement my hard skills in banking operations, product knowledge, and cross-selling abilities.

As I seek a new opportunity at VPBank, I am excited to bring my diverse experiences and skills to a larger banking institution where I can continue to grow and make a meaningful impact. With a track record of delivering exceptional results and a passion for delivering top-notch customer service, I am confident in my ability to excel in a challenging role at VPBank.

overview_CV: With over 2 years of experience in banking and customer service, I have honed strong communication and problem-solving skills, allowing me to excel in my role at VPBank. Achievements such as surpassing insurance sales targets and receiving recognition as a top performer highlight my dedication and results-driven approach. I am eager to leverage my expertise in a challenging position at VPBank, where I am confident that my ability to handle daily banking transactions, assist customers with inquiries, and promote banking products and services will make a valuable contribution. My educational background in Giao Dịch Viên from VPBank, coupled with my soft skills in communication, teamwork, professionalism, adaptability, and problem-solving, position me as a strong candidate for further growth within the organization. My hard skills in sales performance, trip planning, and execution, as well as data entry accuracy, demonstrate my well-rounded capabilities. I am committed to establishing a long-term career at VPBank, where I can continue to thrive in a dynamic and professional work environment that values professional growth and offers ample opportunities for advancement.

overview_CV: With over 5 years of experience in sales and customer service, I have developed exceptional skills in relationship-building, communication, and negotiation. I have consistently surpassed sales targets and provided top-notch customer service, earning recognition as the top salesperson in the Northern region in 2018 and 2019. I am now seeking a new challenge in a professional environment focused on innovation and advanced technology, such as VPBank, where I can continue to grow and contribute to team success. My background includes working in telephone sales, where I was responsible for advising and persuading customers to purchase company products or services. I handled incoming calls, provided product recommendations, and processed orders efficiently. overview_CV: Nguyễn Thị Hoa Nở is a highly skilled and detail-oriented professional with a strong background in administration and customer service, particularly within the banking industry. With 3 years of experience, she has demonstrated a talent for handling confidential information and providing exceptional support to clients. Her accomplishments include streamlining administrative processes for increased efficiency and receiving praise from customers for her outstanding service. Now seeking a challenging opportunity in a reputable organization where she can continue to expand her skills and make a significant contribution. In addition to her work experience, she has been involved in various projects such as organizing personal documents, tracking recruitment information sources, and updating family information. Hoa Nở possesses a range of soft skills including strong communication, problem-solving, teamwork, adaptability, and time management. Her hard skills encompass data analysis, financial analysis, Microsoft Excel proficiency, research capabilities, and project management expertise. She is fluent in Vietnamese and has a working knowledge of English. With a commitment to ongoing learning and development, Hoa Nở is a dedicated professional ready to excel in her next role.

I am now seeking a new challenge where I can further enhance my skills and contribute to the success of a dynamic organization in the banking sector. My career objective is to leverage my expertise in customer service and sales to drive business growth and exceed targets, showcasing my passion for continuous learning and strong work ethic. My educational background includes a degree from Học viện Ngân hàng, emphasizing my commitment to professional development and excellence. My specific work experience at Ngân hàng TMCP Kỹ thương Việt Nam involved customer support, product advice, coordination with other departments, and cross-selling bank products, showcasing my ability to handle diverse responsibilities effectively.

With over 8 years of experience in the marketing industry, I have honed my skills in digital marketing, social media management, and content creation. I have a proven track record of leading successful marketing campaigns that have significantly increased brand awareness and engagement for various companies. One of my proudest achievements includes launching a social media influencer campaign that resulted in a 30% increase in online sales. I am now seeking a challenging marketing role where I can leverage my expertise to drive innovative marketing strategies and contribute to the growth of a dynamic company.

My educational background includes a Bachelor of Arts in Economics from Harvard University, where I graduated in 2014. During my time at XYZ High School, I was honored as the Valedictorian in 2010. In addition to my academic achievements, I possess a range of soft skills such as teamwork, communication, adaptability, problem-solving, and time management. My hard skills include data analysis, project management, proficiency in Microsoft Excel, Python programming, and market research.

With a strong foundation in marketing strategy and a proven ability to deliver results, I am confident that I would be a valuable asset to any marketing team. My dedication to excellence and passion for driving impactful marketing initiatives make me a standout candidate for any challenging marketing role.

overview_CV: With over 6 years of experience in banking, I am NGUYỄN MAI HOA, a highly motivated and results-driven Relationship Manager specializing in client relationship management, customer retention, and financial product sales. Throughout my career at VPBank, I have successfully managed a large client base, developed new business opportunities, and consistently exceeded sales targets. As an RM Diamond- chuyên viên khách hàng ưu tiên, I have honed my skills in customer priority management and have proven my ability to drive business growth and provide exceptional customer service. My strong interpersonal skills, combined with my expertise in financial services, make me an ideal candidate for challenging positions that require a proactive approach to relationship management and sales. I am fluent in both Vietnamese and English, with a native fluency in Vietnamese and a fluent level in English. My soft skills, such as being sociable, positive, patient, responsible, hardworking, consultative, persuasive, and continuously seeking improvement, have allowed me to collaborate effectively with colleagues and superiors, as well as provide attentive customer care. My hard skills include managing large client bases, developing customer relationships, mobilizing resources, handling bonds, and insurance. I am dedicated to providing the best possible service to clients and reaching mutually beneficial outcomes.

My goal is to contribute positively to the success of the organization while further advancing my career in the financial industry.

overview_CV:
With 6 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in customer service, sales, and financial products. Throughout my career, I have consistently exceeded sales targets, earned recognition as a top performer, and received awards for sales excellence. My passion lies in contributing to the success of a dynamic organization while continuing to grow and develop professionally. I am now seeking a challenging position where I can leverage my proven track record to make a positive impact.

In my most recent role at Ngân hàng TMCP Sài Gòn, I served as a Chuyên viên khách hàng ưu tiên, where I excelled in advising and cross-selling a range of bank products including cards, accounts, deposits, bonds, loans, international payments, and insurance. I actively sought out and supported customers, managed a client base, and consistently met and exceeded sales targets on a monthly, quarterly, and yearly basis. My dedication and outstanding performance led to numerous accolades and awards, including exceeding 300% of KPIs, achieving individual awards, and receiving commendations from the General Director of Manulife.

Prior to this, I worked at ShinhanBank as a Credit Card Consultant, where I focused on consulting and acquiring customers for credit cards for both individuals and businesses. Additionally, during an internship at Ngân hàng Techcombank as an International Payment Officer, I supported colleagues with document verification, scanning, and office procedures, displaying a collaborative and supportive approach to work despite not being a perfect fit for the role.

With a bachelor's degree in Finance and Banking from HV Ngân Hàng, I have a strong educational foundation to complement my practical experience in the industry. I have also participated in various training courses and certifications related to banking, enhancing my expertise and knowledge in the field.

In addition to my hard skills, I possess a range of soft skills such as advising, sales, customer relationship management, meeting sales targets, meeting deadlines, and being a team player. My proficiency in computer skills further enhances my ability to support work and reporting effectively.

I am now looking for a new opportunity to further advance my career in the financial industry, leveraging my experience, skills, and passion for excellence to contribute to the success of a forward-thinking organization.

overview_CV:
With over 12 years of experience in the finance and banking industry, I am Lê Thị Vân, a dedicated professional specializing in customer service and team leadership. Throughout my career, I have excelled in roles such as Relationship Manager, Key Account Manager, and Customer Service Officer, demonstrating exceptional communication skills, strong relationship building capabilities, and a profound knowledge of banking products. My achievements include effectively managing VIP clients, consistently meeting sales targets, and leading teams to achieve departmental goals. Currently seeking a challenging role in customer service or team leadership within the banking sector, I am eager to leverage my skills and experience to contribute to organizational success while continuing to grow professionally.

My work experience includes serving as a Giám Đốc Dịch Vụ Khách Hàng and a Trưởng Nhóm at reputable banks, where I managed customer service operations, cared for VIP clients, and led teams in a professional banking environment. In addition to my extensive industry experience, I possess a range of soft skills such as being outgoing, cheerful, enthusiastic, sociable, responsible, positive, excelling in teamwork, and demonstrating strong leadership qualities. On the hard skills front, I have a deep understanding of financial and banking practices, having held various roles within customer service departments and managed priority clients. I am also fluent in Vietnamese and hold certifications in TOEIC English and PMP project management, showcasing my commitment to continuous professional development.

I am now looking to secure a position as a Customer Service Officer or Team Leader in the banking sector in the Cau Giay, Nam Tu Liem, Bac Tu Liem, or Dan Phuong area. With my proven track record in relationship management, strong customer service skills, and wealth of experience, I am confident that I can make a significant contribution to the success of any organization in which I work. My goal is to continue growing, both personally and professionally, while offering valuable insights and leadership within a dynamic banking environment.

overview_CV:
With over 12 years of experience in the banking industry, I have developed strong skills in customer service, relationship management, and financial advising. Throughout my career at Ngân hàng TMCP Kỹ Thương Việt Nam - Techcombank, I have held various roles such as Transaction Officer, Control Officer, Senior Personal Banking Officer, and Priority Relationship Manager. My achievements include exceeding sales targets, increasing customer retention, and successfully supporting and coaching new employees. Recently, I have transitioned to a Senior Consultant role at Cty CP Đầu Tư Ksfinance, where I provide financial product consultation, bonds, investment cooperation, and real estate business advice. 

In terms of education, I attended the Academy of Finance in Vietnam, earning a Bachelor's degree in Finance and Banking. Additionally, I have obtained certificates in Office Secretary, Office Computer Science, and English Language C from reputable institutions. My hard skills include financial analysis, banking operations, customer relationship management, investment advisory, real estate investment, and proficiency in Microsoft Office.

Throughout my career, I have demonstrated strong soft skills such as communication, problem-solving, teamwork, leadership, time management, and adaptability. I am now seeking a challenging position in a reputable financial institution where I can leverage my expertise to continue driving business growth and achieving personal development. Thank you for considering my application.

overview_CV: With over 5 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in customer service, sales, and financial product knowledge. I have been recognized with the Star Sales Performer award and consistently exceeded sales targets in my previous roles. I am now seeking a challenging position at VPBank, a prestigious retail bank in Vietnam, where I can leverage my expertise and further develop professionally. My work experiences include excelling as an Outstanding Trading Star and PRM in insurance and investment products. In addition to my strong industry experience, I possess a wide range of soft skills such as autonomy, logical thinking, teamwork, communication, personal responsibility, problem-solving, time management, creativity, and the ability to work well under pressure. Furthermore, my hard skills include proficiency in programming languages, MS Office, marketing, project management, accounting, graphic design, risk assessment, data analysis, and strategic marketing management. I am fluent in both Vietnamese and English, and I hold a certification as an Outstanding Trading Star and PRM, although specific details about the issuing organization, date, and expiration are currently unknown. I am eager to contribute my diverse skill set and professional achievements to a dynamic team at VPBank.

overview_CV: With over 5 years of experience in customer care, I am Trần Thị Bích, a highly skilled Senior Customer Care Specialist based in Hữu Bằng, Thạch Thất, Hà Nội. I have honed my communication and problem-solving abilities to effectively address customer needs and ensure high levels of customer satisfaction. My dedication and attention to detail have allowed me to successfully resolve a high volume of customer complaints, leading to a significant increase in customer retention rates. Seeking to further utilize my skills in a Senior Customer Care Specialist role, I am committed to providing exceptional service and contributing to the growth of any organization I join. My strong work ethic, sense of responsibility, drive for continuous improvement, and creativity make me a valuable asset in any customer care team. Outside of work, I enjoy cooking, traveling, and watching movies to relax and unwind. I am eager to bring my expertise and passion for customer service to a new and exciting opportunity.

overview_CV:
With over 5 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in customer service, sales, and financial investments. My track record includes being a top performer in customer care, exceeding sales targets, and successfully growing investment portfolios. During my time at Ngân hàng TMCP Quốc tế Việt Nam as a Chuyên viên cao cấp phòng Kinh doanh Tài chính Đầu Tư, I focused on acquiring new individual and business clients, cross-selling bank products, and maintaining strong relationships with existing customers. I also excelled in networking, generating referrals, and providing financial solutions to corporate clients. My ability to compile data, prepare reports, and strategize for future plans was acknowledged by my superiors.

Prior to this role, I gained experience at Công ty Cổ Phần Mascom Việt Nam as a Nhân viên phòng xuất nhập khẩu, where I managed overseas supplier orders, handled international payments, secured import permits, liaised with logistics companies and shipping lines, and compiled quality reports for incoming products. My educational background includes a degree in Tài chính Quốc Tế from Trường Đại học Ngoại Thương Hà Nội, where I graduated with distinction. Additionally, I have completed training in professional sales consulting skills and obtained a TOEIC certification with a score of 815.

I am proud of my achievements, such as being recognized as a top performer in customer care and sales at VIB, as well as being named the top growth specialist in August 2022 in the Western Hanoi region. My soft skills include professional sales consulting, customer care, growth acceleration, data synthesis, and reporting. On the technical side, I possess skills in computer literacy, order management, international payments, logistics coordination, and quality reporting.

I am currently seeking a challenging role in a progressive company where I can leverage my expertise to drive organizational success while continuing my professional development. My adaptable nature, strong work ethic, and passion for delivering exceptional results make me a valuable addition to any team. Thank you for considering my application.

overview_CV:
With 5 years of experience in marketing and communications, specializing in digital marketing strategies, I bring a track record of success in driving campaign performance. My ability to create compelling content, manage social media platforms, and analyze marketing data has led to a 20% increase in website traffic and a 15% growth in social media followers. I excel in project management and collaboration with cross-functional teams to achieve marketing objectives. Currently seeking a challenging role in a dynamic company where I can leverage my skills to fuel business growth and innovation.

In my previous role as a Software Engineer at XYZ Tech Solutions from 2018 to 2021, I developed software applications, maintained systems, collaborated on projects, participated in code reviews, and provided technical support to clients. As a Data Analyst at ABC Data Analytics from 2016 to 2018, I analyzed large datasets, prepared reports, identified trends, created data visualizations, and presented findings to stakeholders. My educational background includes a Bachelor of Arts in Economics from Harvard University and a Master of Business Administration from Stanford University.

My soft skills include strong communication, teamwork, problem-solving, and time management abilities. I possess hard skills in programming, data analysis, project management, and graphic design. I am fluent in English, conversational in Spanish, intermediate in French, and advanced in Italian. Additionally, I hold certifications in Project Management Professional (PMP), Certified ScrumMaster (CSM), Six Sigma Green Belt, and ITIL Foundation. My dedication to continued learning and professional development is evident with my commitment to renewing certifications as required.

overview_CV:
Experienced Customer Care Specialist with a successful track record of achieving top sales figures year after year. Skilled in acquiring and managing individual and corporate clients, cross-selling bank products, and effectively maintaining customer relationships. Recognized as the top growth specialist in the West Hanoi region in August 2022. I am seeking a new opportunity to further develop and grow in a different work environment.

With a strong background in customer care and sales, I am confident in my ability to contribute to a dynamic organization. My experience includes developing new customers, cross-selling bank products, and encouraging referrals. I have also managed orders from overseas suppliers, handled international payments, and worked closely with logistics and shipping companies. Additionally, I have a proven ability to summarize data, report results to superiors, and plan next steps effectively.

I have received several certifications recognizing my achievements, including being ranked in the top 5 customer care specialists with the highest sales performance in 2020. I have also been in the top 25% of employees with outstanding task completion in the entire VIB system in 2020 and 2021. Furthermore, I was awarded the top position as the specialist with the highest growth mobilization in August 2022 in the West Hanoi region.

In addition to my professional experience and certifications, I am fluent in both Vietnamese and English. My soft skills include customer care, support, data synthesis, experience analysis, and planning. I also have hard skills in opening payment or deposit accounts, cross-selling bank products, managing orders, and international payments.

I am looking for a new opportunity where I can continue to excel in acquiring and managing clients while also exploring opportunities for professional growth and advancement into a managerial role. My dedication to achieving top sales figures, paired with my strong communication skills and ability to build lasting customer relationships, make me a valuable asset to any team.

overview_CV:
Hello, I am John Doe, a Software Engineer based in San Francisco, CA. With over 10 years of experience in finance and accounting, I specialize in financial analysis, reporting, budgeting, forecasting, and financial modeling. My strong analytical skills allow me to utilize various financial software and tools to streamline processes and improve accuracy, leading cross-functional teams to implement cost-saving initiatives and improve overall financial performance. Currently seeking a challenging role in a dynamic organization where I can leverage my skills and experience to drive business growth and financial success.

I hold a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from Stanford University and have worked as a Software Engineer at XYZ Tech Solutions, where I developed new software applications, maintained existing systems, and collaborated with team members on various projects. As a Project Manager at ABC Consulting, I managed client projects, coordinated internal teams, and ensured timely delivery of project milestones. Previously, as a Marketing Coordinator at Marketing Pro Inc., I executed marketing campaigns, monitored social media channels, and analyzed marketing data to optimize strategies.

My hard skills include programming, data analysis, project management, and financial modeling, while my soft skills include communication, time management, teamwork, and adaptability. I am fluent in English, with intermediate proficiency in Spanish and advanced proficiency in French. Additionally, I hold certifications in Project Management Professional (PMP) from the Project Management Institute, Certified Scrum Master (CSM) from Scrum Alliance, and Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) from (ISC)2.

I am a results-driven financial professional dedicated to using my expertise in financial analysis, reporting, and strategic planning to contribute to the success of an organization. I am eager to collaborate with a talented team, take on new challenges, and further enhance my skills and professional development. My experience, skills, and certifications make me a valuable asset for any organization looking to drive business growth and achieve financial success.

overview_CV: With a strong background in finance and banking, coupled with 2 years of experience in customer relationship management, I am a dedicated professional seeking a role as a Customer Relationship Specialist at VPBank. My expertise lies in communication, negotiation, and cultivating lasting client relationships. Proficient in financial products and services, I have a proven track record of exceeding sales targets and delivering exceptional customer service. My soft skills include honesty, professionalism, adaptability, humor, effective communication, diligence, eagerness to learn, and active listening. On the hard skills front, I excel in negotiation, persuading customers, and have experience in both the finance and insurance sectors. While I am proficient in English, I am continuously working on improving my language skills. My goal is to contribute to the growth of VPBank and provide top-notch service to customers, harnessing my skills and experience to drive business success.

overview_CV: With 1 year of experience in the banking industry as a transaction officer and financial consultant, I have honed my communication and customer service skills. During my time at Ngân hàng Thương mại cổ phần Kỹ Thương Việt Nam, I excelled in directly assisting and advising customers, introducing new products, addressing inquiries, and establishing strong relationships. I also consistently met sales targets and increased customer satisfaction scores. In my role at Công ty Bảo Hiểm AIA Việt Nam as a Financial Technology Advisor, I furthered my expertise by prospecting and nurturing potential clients, providing tailored insurance advice, and ensuring customer and insurance company rights. I am proficient in English with a B1 fluency level and possess advanced skills in Microsoft Word and Excel, as evidenced by my MOS Word 2016 and MOS Excel 2016 certifications. My educational background includes a degree in Accounting and Auditing from Học Viện Ngân Hàng. My strong soft skills in communication, logic, problem-solving, teamwork, time management, and analytical thinking make me a valuable asset in any dynamic work environment. With a proven track record of success in banking and finance, I am eager to leverage my expertise to drive business growth and exceed client expectations in a challenging position.

overview_CV:
Hello, my name is Nguyễn Hoàng Việt, currently based in Hà Nội. I am a professional with extensive experience in the [industry/field] sector, possessing a strong skill set in financial analysis, customer service, and more. Throughout my career, I have achieved notable results such as increasing sales by 20% and implementing cost-saving measures. I am now looking for a challenging opportunity at VPBank where I can apply my skills and contribute to the organization's growth.

My career objective is to secure a position at VPBank, utilizing my expertise in [specific skills/industry] to drive success for the company. I am driven to contribute my experience and enthusiasm for the [industry/field] to a collaborative team environment. My aim is to continue learning and evolving within the organization while making a positive impact on its mission and objectives.

In terms of soft skills, I possess a strong sense of responsibility, effective communication skills, logical thinking abilities, teamwork capabilities, and creativity. On the other hand, my hard skills include time management proficiency, expertise in banking knowledge, independent work skills, fluent English communication, and negotiation abilities.

While my certifications and educational background are not specified in this document, my practical experience and skill set make me a valuable asset to any team. I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to VPBank and help drive its success in the future.

overview_CV:
My name is Nguyễn Thị Ngọc Huyền, a highly skilled and experienced marketing professional with over 8 years of proven success in developing and implementing effective marketing strategies. I have a strong track record of boosting brand awareness and driving sales through digital marketing campaigns, social media management, and thorough market research. With a keen eye for analytics, creative thinking, and a passion for staying ahead of industry trends, I am always ready to tackle new challenges and collaborate with cross-functional teams.

In my recent projects, I started a personal blog in 2019 to share insights on travel, food, and personal development, engaging with readers through comments and social media. Additionally, I dedicated my time to a volunteer tutoring program from 2020 to 2021, providing academic support and mentorship to underprivileged students in the local community.

My educational background includes a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from ABC University, where I graduated in 2019. As a valedictorian at XYZ High School, I honed my communication, time management, and decision-making skills. I also have expertise in data analysis, project management, and programming, complemented by my fluency in Vietnamese.

Moving forward, I am seeking a challenging marketing role where I can leverage my skills to drive business growth and contribute to a dynamic marketing team. With a certification in progress and a commitment to continuous learning and development, I am ready to make a valuable contribution to your organization.

overview_CV: With over 8 years of experience in the banking industry, specializing in financial analysis, investment products, and customer relationship management, I bring a wealth of expertise to the table. My core competencies lie in building and overseeing client portfolios, offering tailored financial solutions, and nurturing VIP client relationships. Throughout my career, I have consistently surpassed sales objectives and cultivated a network of high-net-worth clients. Currently serving as a Relationship Manager (Priority) at Ngân hàng TMCP MSB - CN Long Biên, I excel in managing priority clients, analyzing financial needs, caring for VIP clients, and expanding client networks. Prior to this, as a Senior Financial Specialist at Công ty CP Đầu tư KSFINANCE, I advised clients on investment opportunities, analyzed market trends, cross-sold products, acquired external portfolios, and developed an Affiliate system. My soft skills include being dynamic, open-minded, friendly, attentive, empathetic, detail-oriented, and cautious. On the hard skills front, I am well-versed in macroeconomics, securities, investment products, and the financial sector. I am now actively seeking a challenging role in a forward-thinking financial institution where I can leverage my expertise and passion for success.

Successfully managing client portfolios and exceeding sales targets are among my key strengths. I have a proven track record of achievements, such as onboarding new clients, enhancing customer retention rates, and consistently exceeding sales quotas. My proficiency in Vietnamese and English languages further enhances my capabilities. While additional information about my certifications is not included, my comprehensive skill set and proven track record make me a valuable asset to any organization looking for a results-driven professional with a strong background in customer service and relationship management.

overview_CV:
Hello, I am NGÔ THỊ HƯƠNG, a dedicated Customer Relationship Specialist with 5 years of experience in the banking industry. My expertise lies in building and maintaining strong client relationships, resolving issues efficiently, and meeting customer needs effectively. I have a proven track record of achieving sales targets and customer satisfaction goals. Currently residing in Vinhome Smart City, Hanoi, Vietnam, I am seeking a challenging role as a Senior Customer Relationship Specialist at VPBank to leverage my skills and contribute to the organization's growth.

My career objective is to utilize my strong customer relationship skills and industry experience to enhance client satisfaction and drive success for VPBank as a Senior Customer Relationship Specialist. I am known for my positive attitude, teamwork skills, and ability to adapt quickly to changes. I have excellent communication skills and a strong work ethic, ensuring that I can work well both independently and as part of a team.

In terms of hard skills, I excel in customer relationship management and data reporting. I am proficient in handling customer inquiries, resolving complaints, and providing tailored solutions to meet individual client needs. My ability to analyze and report data accurately allows me to make informed decisions that benefit both the customers and the organization.

While I do not have specific details regarding my academic background or certifications in the provided text, my hands-on experience and soft skills such as being friendly, sociable, diligent, and quick to adapt to changes are what set me apart as a competent Customer Relationship Specialist.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to contribute to the success of VPBank as a valuable member of the team. Feel free to contact me at ngosuon9999@gmail.com or 987099999 for any further information or to discuss potential opportunities.

overview_CV: With over 7 years of experience in customer relationship management, sales leadership, and goal achievement, I am excited to introduce my comprehensive CV. Throughout my career, I have consistently exceeded sales targets, implemented successful customer retention strategies, and effectively managed sales teams. My objective is to leverage this extensive experience to drive growth and success in a dynamic organization, contributing to the company's success while continuing to develop professionally. Some of my key achievements include supporting customer retention and acquisition strategies, training and managing sales teams, and consistently meeting and exceeding sales targets. In my most recent role at Ngân hàng Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng - Vpbank as a Chuyên Viên Chính Quan Hệ Khách Hàng Ưu Tiên, I was responsible for supporting existing clients, acquiring new customers, and achieving KPI targets. Prior to this, I worked at Công ty Cổ Phần Bán Lẻ Kỹ Thuật Số FPT as a Leader Sale, where I ensured team KPIs were met, supported staff supervision, and resolved customer issues. Additionally, I have experience at Bảo Hiểm Nhân Thọ Aviva as a Nhân Viên Bán Hàng Theo Doanh Số, where I was responsible for exploring, implementing, and advising insurance products to customers. In terms of education, I hold a Bachelor's degree from Đại Học Tài Nguyên Và Môi Trường Hà Nội, and have completed courses in real estate brokerage and valuation at CPTT BDS, as well as computer technology training at Trung tâm tin học và ngoại ngữ incom. My soft skills include strong communication, customer service, problem-solving, leadership, and teamwork abilities, while my hard skills encompass real estate brokerage and valuation, as well as proficiency in computer applications such as Word and Excel. I am fluent in Vietnamese and continuously seek opportunities for professional development and growth. My side projects include training programs in real estate brokerage and appraisal as well as computer technology applications, showcasing my commitment to continuous learning and skill development.

My career has seen me excel in roles such as Sales Staff at TMCP Manufacturing Company, where I significantly increased sales by X%. More recently, I served as a Priority Customer Relationship Specialist, focusing on enhancing customer satisfaction. My expertise lies in client management, product consultation, and relationship building, supported by skills in customer advising, logical thinking, and teamwork. I am adept at sales, customer relations, customer acquisition, and customer care. While my educational background and language proficiency are not detailed here, I have acquired certifications throughout my career, including one as a Priority Customer Relationship Specialist. I am now seeking a new challenge in a dynamic environment where I can leverage my skills to drive business growth and contribute to the success of a reputable organization. Feel free to contact me at 0971938668 for further discussion.

With over 3 years of experience in handling client inquiries, resolving issues, and providing tailored solutions, I have proven my ability to adapt quickly to new environments and excel in fast-paced settings. I excel at building strong rapport with customers and exceeding service expectations. My educational background includes a Bachelor's degree in Business Management, with a commendable GPA of 8.0, and a high school diploma in Social Sciences with a GPA of 9.0. My soft skills such as honesty, diligence, adaptability, and excellent communication skills complement my hard skills in customer care, service consultation, problem-solving, and understanding customer psychology. My proficiency in Vietnamese is excellent, and I have an intermediate level of English proficiency. My dedication to fostering customer loyalty and satisfaction makes me a valuable asset to any organization in need of a dedicated and skilled Customer Relationship Specialist.

My track record includes successfully managing a portfolio of 4000 customers and consistently surpassing sales targets. Additionally, I have a strong educational background with a Bachelor's degree in Tourism Service Management and Operation from Đại học Thương mại Chính Quy, earning a commendable grade. I possess a diverse set of soft skills such as customer care, product consultation, and client retention, along with strong technical competencies in computer literacy. Furthermore, I hold certifications in computer skills and have proficiency in foreign languages. My dedication to exceeding customer expectations and driving business growth through exceptional service makes me a valuable asset to any banking team.

I am eager to bring my expertise in customer relationship management to a new team and contribute to the success of the organization. Thank you for considering my application.

overview_CV:
I am a dynamic, cheerful, and sociable individual with a strong background in singing and dancing. With 4 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my communication and persuasion skills, allowing me to excel in customer service and achieve business targets. I am patient, adaptable to high-pressure environments, and skilled in time management. Diligence, continuous learning, and attention to detail are qualities that define my work ethic. 

In my most recent role as a Chuyên viên quản lý Khách hàng ưu tiên at Ngân hàng TMCP Hàng Hải Việt Nam, I successfully implemented business targets for various personal banking products such as cards, accounts, insurance, deposits, bonds, and international payments. I excelled in customer care duties, both managing existing clients and acquiring new ones, while also handling and resolving customer feedback, complaints, and inquiries. Prior to this, as a Nhân viên tư vấn dịch vụ tài chính cá nhân at Ngân hàng TMCP Sài Gòn Hà Nội, I performed similar responsibilities with a strong focus on business development and customer satisfaction.

I hold a degree in Banking from the Banking Academy and possess a range of soft skills including being dynamic, responsible, patient, and adaptable. My hard skills include effective communication, persuasion, project implementation, and efficient task completion. I am proficient in office software and have a knack for organizing my time effectively.

As I seek a challenging position to further utilize my skills and experience in the banking industry, I am keen on contributing to the success of an organization that values dedication and excellence. I am eager to continue learning and growing in a dynamic work environment while striving to provide exceptional customer service.

Throughout my career, I have honed my skills in customer service, financial analysis, and risk management, leading to significant achievements such as improving customer satisfaction ratings by X% and implementing cost-saving measures resulting in a X% increase in profitability. I am now seeking a challenging opportunity at VPBank to further develop my expertise and contribute to the organization's growth.

My objective is to utilize my banking and finance background to drive innovation and growth at VPBank, while continuously expanding my knowledge and supporting the success of the team. I am eager to bring my unique blend of skills and experiences to VPBank to make a positive impact on the company's success. Thank you for considering my application.

overview_CV:
Hi there, I'm John Smith, a Software Engineer based in New York, NY. With 10 years of experience in marketing and communications, I have honed my skills in digital marketing strategies, social media management, email marketing campaigns, and SEO optimization. Throughout my career, I have successfully led cross-functional teams to launch impactful marketing campaigns, resulting in a 20% increase in website traffic and a 15% boost in customer engagement. 

I am a graduate of Stanford University with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, where I graduated with honors. My work experience includes roles as a Software Engineer at ABC Tech Solutions, a Marketing Coordinator at XYZ Marketing Agency, and a Customer Service Representative at 123 Retail Store. I have developed innovative marketing strategies, coordinated campaigns, and provided exceptional customer service, showcasing my ability to adapt to diverse environments and deliver results.

In addition to my professional experience, I possess a strong set of soft skills including communication, teamwork, leadership, time management, problem-solving, and adaptability. My hard skills include programming, data analysis, project management, Microsoft Excel, and graphic design. I am also fluent in English, advanced in Spanish, intermediate in French and German, and have basic proficiency in Italian.

Furthermore, I hold certifications in Project Management Professional (PMP) from the Project Management Institute (PMI), Certified Scrum Master (CSM) from Scrum Alliance, and Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) from Cisco. These certifications demonstrate my commitment to ongoing learning and professional development.

I am now seeking a challenging role in a dynamic organization where I can leverage my diverse skill set and experiences to drive business growth and success. With a proven track record of driving results and a passion for innovation, I am confident in my ability to contribute to the continued success and growth of a forward-thinking organization. Thank you for considering my application.

Nội dung công việc:

Tiếp nhận và quản lý khiếu nại, các vấn đề cần giải quyết của khách hàng và cung cấp thông tin tới các bộ phận phù hợp để kịp thời xử lý.

Lập báo cáo trình cấp trên về khảo sát khách hàng, độ thỏa mãn với sản phẩm dịch vụ. Đưa ra đề xuất cải thiện, nâng cao chất lượng công việc.

Thực hiện các công việc khác được giao theo yêu cầu của Quản lý

Thời gian làm việc

Ngân hàng TMCP Tiên Phong

Tháng 07/2015 đến tháng 10/2020

Chuyên viên Tín dụng và chuyên viên Telesale

Nội dung công việc:

* Với chức danh Chuyên viên Tín dụng:

-  Xây dựng và triển khai kế hoạch bán các sản phẩm cá nhân của Ngân hàng (sản phẩm cho vay, thẻ tín dụng, tài khoản trả lương, dịch vụ Pos..). 

- Tìm kiếm, phát triển các khách hàng mới nhằm đảm bảo chỉ tiêu kinh doanh được giao. 

- Thẩm định hồ sơ xin cấp khoản vay, cấp thẻ tín dụng.  

- Quản lý các khách hàng hiện hữu, theo dõi kiểm tra sau vay. 

- Chăm sóc khách hàng sau bán để duy trì, mở rộng quan hệ, bán chéo sản phẩm.

- Quản lý dữ liệu khách hàng, bảo mật thông tin khách hàng.

- Tiếp nhận và quản lý khiếu nại, các vấn đề cần giải quyết của khách hàng và cung cấp thông tin tới các bộ phận phù hợp để xử lý khiếu nại đó

- Thực hiện các báo cáo định kỳ theo yêu cầu của cấp trên.

overview_CV:
Trần Quỳnh Như is a seasoned Sales Professional with a diverse background in banking and customer service, boasting over 11 years of experience. Her expertise lies in customer relations, sales, and telesales, where she has consistently surpassed targets and delivered exceptional service to clients. Among her notable accomplishments are expanding customer bases, managing client relationships, and consistently meeting sales goals. With a strong foundation in communication and organizational skills, she is eager to bring her talents to a dynamic team in a challenging environment to drive business growth and surpass expectations.

Having started her career as an Administrative Officer and Receptionist at Công ty TNHH Thương Mại và Dịch vụ Linh Anh, Trần Quỳnh Như honed her skills in handling customer requests and inquiries, expanding the customer base, and managing client relationships. She then transitioned to Ngân hàng TMCP Tiên Phong, where she served as a Credit Specialist and Telesales Specialist. Here, she excelled in developing and executing sales plans, acquiring new clients, managing existing customer portfolios, and providing post-sale customer care to maintain and expand relationships. In her most recent role as a Telesales Specialist at Ngân hàng TMCP Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng, she demonstrated her ability to effectively engage customers, address inquiries, guide customers through service usage, and manage customer data securely.

Her most recent position as a Sales Specialist in Corporate Clients at Bệnh viện Đa Khoa Hà Nội showcased her talent for prospecting new clients, expanding market reach, advising on services, and coordinating with team leaders to implement business plans and train staff. She also excelled in monitoring contract progress, payments, and debt collection, while providing regular reports as per management requirements.

In addition to her professional experiences, Trần Quỳnh Như is currently engaged in ongoing projects such as Personal Photo Management, where she organizes personal photos and creates albums, and Blogging and Content Creation, where she writes engaging blog posts and builds an online presence through social media platforms. Her educational background includes a Bachelor's degree from Đại học Thăng Long.

Trần Quỳnh Như's soft skills include strong teamwork, efficient time management, effective work organization, and excellent communication skills. On the technical side, she is proficient in Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and CRM software management. Additionally, she holds a certificate from the Cục trưởng cục CS QLHC về TTXH, demonstrating her commitment to professional development and continuous learning.

With a proven track record of success, a diverse skill set, and a passion for customer service and sales, Trần Quỳnh Như is a valuable asset to any team looking to drive business growth and exceed expectations.

CV ỨNG TUYỂN VỊ TRÍ NHÂN VIÊN HÀNH CHÍNH 

				Họ và tên : Nguyễn Thị Hậu

E mail: Nguyenthit9999@gmail.com







				





				









	GIÁO DỤC VÀ TRÌNH ĐỘ



2015 – 2019  Học tại Trường đại học kỹ thuật công nghiệp Thái nguyên, và tốt nghiệp bằng Khá, chuyên nghành kế toán doanh nghiệp.





	MỤC TIÊU NGHỀ NGHIÊP



Mục tiêu ngắn hạn: Mong muốn áp dụng những kiến thức đã học và kinh nghiệm sẵn có trở thành nhân viên kế toán thực thụ cho Công ty. Tích lỹ thêm nhiều kinh nghiệm để xử lý công việc hiệu quả và nhanh chóng.

Mục tiêu dài hạn: Cố gắng trong 3-4 năm nữa có thể trở thành trưởng bộ phận. Được gắn bó lâu dài cùng Công ty trong suốt quá trình phát triển.









THỜI GIAN

CHỨC VỤ

MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC

Từ 10/2016 đến 4/2018 công ty cổ phần xuất nhập khẩu viễn thông A tại chi nhánh thị xã Từ Sơn Bắc Ninh

Kế toán bán hàng

Công việc hàng ngày của tôi tại công ty là kiểm kê hàng hóa trên hệ thống của công ty.

Bóc tách và đối chiếu giữa hóa đơn với hệ thống phải khớp nhau, nếu phát sinh lỗi phải xử lý ngay.

Thực hiện các chứng từ, thủ tục thu chi tại chi nhánh.

Bán các sản phẩm tại chị nhánh 

Hoàn tất các chứng từ trả góp của khách hàng theo đúng quy định của công ty.

Xử lý những khúc mắc cho khách hàng về sản phẩm của công ty.

Nhập liệu và in hóa đơn cho khách hàng trên hệ thống.

Làm thủ tục giấy tờ, viết hóa đơn xuất kho hàng hóa.

Lưu trữ chứng từ thủ tục liên quan đến các hoạt động nhập xuất của công ty.

Kiểm kê tiền thu chi hằng ngày và báo cáo lên hệ thống của công ty cuối ngày.



06/2018- 12/2020 Công ty cổ phần đầu tư và khoáng sản FLC Stone trực thuộc tập đoàn LFC Group 

Nhân viên hành chính


Tiếp nhận hồ sơ và sàng lọc hồ sơ ứng viên trước khi chuyển lên trưởng bô phận.

Thông báo và sắp xếp lịch phỏng vấn cho ứng viên đạt yêu cầu.

Soạn thảo công văn, tờ trình, thông báo và các giấy tờ khác. 

Quản lý các công văn giấy tờ đi và đến tại phòng ban

Lấy số và theo dõi công văn đi 

Quản lý con dấu và đóng dấu các công văn giấy tờ đi, đến

Nhận và gửi các bưu phẩm của công ty 

Mua sắm tài sản phục vụ cho cán bộ nhân viên công ty

Thực hiện các làm thủ tục thanh toán nhà ở, thuê máy móc, thuê nhà xưởng…

Mua và cấp phát văn phòng phẩm cho toàn bộ cán bộ nhận viên công ty

Tổ chức các hoạt động thăm hỏi, hiếu, hỉ và hoạt động chăm sóc đời sống cán bộ nhân viên

Bố trí và oder lịch phòng họp cho các bộ phận 

Tiếp nhận và cấp phát các dụng cụ cần thiết cho nhân sự mới

Làm tạm ứng, thanh toán các khoản chi phí công tác của Sếp

Đặt vé máy bay cho các cán bộ công nhân viên có kế hoạch đi công tác

Theo dõi công nợ các khoản vé máy bay, khoản thuê máy móc, thiết bị theo từng tháng

Làm báo cáo và kế hoạch công việc theo ngày gửi trưởng bộ phận 

Quản lý, cập nhật  nhân sự tại các dự án qua định biên nhân sự các dự án đi và đến

Tổ chức các hoạt động team building và các sự kiện sinh nhật của công ty

Tổ chức các sự kiên vui chơi, sự kiện, họp của công ty và khách hàng

Theo dõi và báo cáo thường xuyên cho lãnh đạo về tình hình nhân sự của các bộ phận

Thực hiện theo dõi phép, công cán cho bộ phận cuối tháng

Quản lý nghỉ phép của CNV, cụ thể là: Nhận đơn xin nghỉ phép, lưu đơn xin phép, hàng tháng báo cáo các trường hợp CNV nghỉ vô kỷ luật (không phép) cho TP HCNS

Làm báo cáo tháng gửi cấp trên các công việc trong tháng, tồn đọng và các kế hoạch của tháng mới của bộ phận

Quản lý và phân phát các biểu mẫu liên quan đến hành chính cho bộ phận, lưu biểu mẫu trong máy và lưu bìa còng các biểu mẫu theo bộ phận.

Ngoài ra còn thực hiện rất nhiều công việc liên quan hoặc phát sinh hằng ngày và thực hiện các công việc khác do Trưởng phòng phân công…











KỸ NĂNG





Có trách nhiệm, chịu khó và chịu được áp lực công việc

Thái độ chăm chỉ, cẩn thận, năng động và nhiệt tình

Kỹ năng quản lý thời gian và công việc

Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề khá tốt

Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt

Có kỹ năng máy tính, đặc bịệt là word, xeccel và phần mềm kế toán như Misa, Fast..

Có kỹ năng làm việc cá nhân cũng như đồng đội



SƠ THÍCH



Thích xem phim, nghe nhạc, đọc sách

Đi du lịch cùng gia đình và bạn bè

Thích nấu ăn,...

overview_CV:
Nguyễn Thị Hậu is an experienced administrative professional with a strong background in accounting and administrative roles, spanning over 2 years. With exceptional time management and organizational skills, she excels in handling financial documents, coordinating interviews, and managing office supplies efficiently. Nguyễn is highly motivated, with a dedication to problem-solving and effective communication. Her career objective is to leverage her skills to excel as a committed accounting employee in a reputable company, with aspirations to become a department head in the near future.

Nguyễn's work experience includes serving as a Sales Accountant at Công ty cổ phần xuất nhập khẩu viễn thông A, where she managed inventory, processed financial documents, and provided customer service. She then transitioned to a role as an Administrative Staff at Công ty cổ phần đầu tư và khoáng sản FLC Stone, where she handled recruitment processes, managed office correspondence, organized company events, and oversaw administrative tasks efficiently.

In terms of education, Nguyễn holds a college degree with a specialization in Business Accounting from Trường đại học kỹ thuật công nghiệp Thái nguyên, demonstrating her dedication to advancing her knowledge in the field. Her soft skills include a strong sense of responsibility, resilience under work pressure, meticulous attention to detail, and excellent time management and teamwork skills. In terms of hard skills, Nguyễn is proficient in using computer software such as Microsoft Word, Excel, and accounting programs like Misa and Fast.

With a fluent command of Vietnamese, Nguyễn also possesses strong communication skills that enable her to effectively interact with colleagues and clients. Her goal of becoming a department head within the next few years reflects her ambition and commitment to long-term career growth. Overall, Nguyễn Thị Hậu's CV showcases her diverse skill set, experience, and dedication, making her a valuable asset to any accounting or administrative team.

01/2019 – 03/2023

- Kiểm tra, rà soát các hợp đồng mua bán - đơn đặt hàng và các khoản thanh toán tiền hàng với nhà cung cấp.

- Kiểm tra các khoản chi phí phát sinh, đảm bảo các khoản chi phí chi tiêu hợp lý và hạn chế lãng phí đến mức tối thiểu. 

- Cung cấp các báo cáo tồn kho định kỳ và đưa ra hướng xử lý về kết quả kiểm kê tồn kho; 

- Quản lý nguyên vật liệu sản xuất, tiêu thụ sản phẩm. 

- Các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của Ban giám đốc.
