overview_CV: Hello, I am Lê Khắc Vũ Giang, a dedicated Sales employee based in Hương Trà, Thừa Thiên Huế. With a strong emphasis on responsibility and attention to detail, I excel in problem-solving and teamwork. I have experience in running the market and selling beverage products, as well as self-entrepreneurship in leather goods. My roles have included supporting sales at various retail points and responding to customer messages for efficient product delivery. I hold a Bachelor's Degree in Finance from Danang University of Economics, showcasing my commitment to personal growth and development. With proficiency in both English and computer skills, I am eager to contribute to a dynamic team in a challenging environment. My strong work ethic, honesty, and collaboration skills make me a valuable asset for any organization. Whether working independently or as part of a team, I am always open to learning and taking on new challenges to further expand my knowledge and skills in sales and marketing. Thank you for considering my application.

overview_CV:
With a diverse background spanning over 8 years in education, real estate, and banking, I bring a unique set of skills and experiences to the table. My expertise lies in customer service, sales, and communication, honed through successfully advising international clients in real estate and managing personal banking accounts. Proficient in Microsoft Office, I possess strong business planning and marketing skills, along with a knack for effective team collaboration. My career goal is to excel in the banking sector, utilizing my knowledge to contribute to the success of a financial institution. Seeking a role in banking that allows me to deliver exceptional customer service, drive sales, and support organizational growth, I aspire to grow from a personal banking specialist to a financial expert, expanding my expertise in the field.

In terms of work experience, I have served as a collaborator at IEMC Global, introducing the company to prospective study abroad candidates, organizing campus tours, and providing life advice to students studying abroad. At Kella English Center, I worked as an English teaching assistant, preparing lessons for foreign teachers, interpreting for both teachers and students, and handling various tasks related to English education. Additionally, my role as a real estate consulting specialist at Tập Đoàn Đất Xanh Miền Bắc involved working with international clients, sourcing new customers, and advising on property investments. Most recently, as a personal customer specialist at Ngân Hàng Sacombank – chi nhánh Hàng Bài, I focused on customer care, credit acquisition, and guiding clients on banking services.

In addition to my professional experiences, I have engaged in side projects like social media marketing for small businesses, where I create content, manage accounts, and run ad campaigns to boost online presence. I also run a personal finance blog offering advice on money management, budgeting, saving, and investing. My educational background includes degrees in commerce and an MBA from Deakin University, complemented by a range of soft skills such as communication, presentation, customer acquisition, advisory, persuasion, and teamwork, along with hard skills like IELTS certification at 6.5, proficiency in Microsoft Office, business planning, and marketing. With fluency in English and Vietnamese, I bring a global perspective and strong language skills to the table.

Overall, my CV reflects a well-rounded professional who is well-equipped to thrive in the banking industry, leveraging a diverse skill set, rich experience, and a passion for customer service and sales. I am eager to bring my expertise to a dynamic financial institution and contribute to its growth and success.

overview_CV: With over 6 years of experience in the financial industry, I am LÊ THỊ MAI NGỌC, skilled in developing market relationships, customer service, and credit assessment. Throughout my career, I have successfully expanded the market for various financial products and maintained strong customer relationships. My top skills include communication, teamwork, and proficiency in Microsoft Word. I have held various positions such as Customer Relationship Specialist at DAI-CHI Life Insurance, building relationships, developing the market in Vinh Phuc area, advising customers, and processing documents. I then moved on to become a Customer Relationship Specialist at FCCom.MSB, where I focused on developing the credit market for small traders in Vinh Phuc, collecting and processing loan documents, and supporting the loan recovery process. Currently, I am a Manager at AIA Life Insurance, building relationships, developing and supporting teams in Vinh Phuc, and caring for customers. I hold a degree in Economics and Banking and possess strong soft skills such as communication, teamwork, and organizational skills. I am seeking a dynamic and professional work environment where I can continue to enhance my skills and knowledge, with opportunities for long-term stability and career growth. My career objective is to contribute to the success of the organization, continue learning, and advance in my career with competitive compensation. I am adaptable, detail-oriented, and have a strong sense of responsibility, making me a valuable asset to any team.

overview_CV:
With over 7 years of experience in energy efficiency in construction projects, including 4 years in a managerial position as the Head of Energy Efficiency Consulting Department at Elithis Asia Company, I have developed strong skills in thermodynamic simulation, energy calculations, and acoustics according to French standards. My expertise lies in building energy-efficient models for sustainable and economically viable buildings, as well as effectively managing project teams. During my tenure, I excelled in tasks such as building work plans, assigning tasks, ensuring quality, supervising department activities, organizing specialized training programs, and participating in recruitment and reward processes.

In my previous role as an Energy Efficiency Consultant Engineer at Elithis Asia Company, I specialized in simulating building operations in terms of thermal-energy, calculating energy losses, energy consumption levels in buildings, and proposing optimal energy-saving solutions in materials and energy consumption systems within buildings. I also conducted research and recommended sound insulation solutions for construction projects, calculated carbon emissions levels of buildings, and proposed material usage options to achieve carbon neutrality goals. Furthermore, I have a strong academic background with a Bachelor's degree in International Business Administration from Foreign Trade University, a degree in polymer and composite material engineering from Mỏ Albi University, and a degree in Bridge Engineering from Hanoi University of Transport.

My soft skills include strong analytical and information synthesis abilities, along with project management expertise. In terms of hard skills, I am proficient in French and MS Office tools, particularly in creating internal tools in Excel. I am also skilled in thermal simulation software such as Climawin 2005, Climawin 2020, and IES VE, as well as familiar with thermal standards RT2005, RT2012, RE2020, and HQE standards. Additionally, I am experienced in using AutoCAD software.

I hold certifications as a Head of Energy Efficiency Consulting Department and Energy Efficiency Consultant Engineer from Elithis Asia Company, demonstrating my expertise and dedication to the field. I am now seeking a challenging role in energy efficiency and sustainable construction where I can leverage my knowledge and skills to contribute to innovative and environmentally friendly building solutions.

overview_CV: With over 10 years of diverse experience in teaching, sales, marketing, and administrative roles, I am excited to present my CV for your consideration. Throughout my career, I have developed strong communication, training, and customer service skills, with a track record of successfully managing sales teams and creating effective marketing strategies. I have a proven ability to handle various responsibilities such as staff training, contract negotiation, customer acquisition, and maintaining client relationships. My background includes teaching English to professionals and children, as well as financial analysis, loan processing, and legal proceedings in banking services. I hold a degree in Business Administration from Đại học Ngoại Ngữ Hà Nội with honors, showcasing my commitment to excellence in education. My fluency in English allows me to effectively communicate and write, providing me with an advantage in various work environments. I am eager to bring my hard skills in Microsoft Word, Power Point, Excel, teaching English, sales, and marketing, along with my soft skills in communication and teamwork, to contribute to the growth and success of your company. With a passion for learning and a drive to excel, I am seeking a dynamic and challenging work environment where I can continue to grow and make a meaningful impact.

Hoàng Thu Hằng

                                     0967 999999 | Hanghoa9999@gmail.com | HN | LinkedIn |  21/11/1992



GIỚI THIỆU

Gần 10 năm kinh nghiệm ở các công việc khác nhau như Kế toán, Bán hàng trong lĩnh vực Ngân hàng, bất động sản, văn phòng phẩm , thời trang  . Có đam mê trong việc kinh doanh, tỉ mỉ cẩn thận trong công việc giấy tờ .

KỸ NĂNG 

●Soạn thảo và theo dõi hợp đồng & thu chi 

●Tìm kiếm và phát triển khách hàng 

●Phối hợp với các phòng ban, đối tác

●Giải quyết hồ sơ, đơn từ

●Bán hàng và thuyết phục khách hàng

●Làm được phần mềm bravo , SAP

●Làm việc nhóm

●Thành thạo tin học văn phòng

KINH NGHIỆM LÀM VIỆC

2019 - hiện tại

Tài chính kế toán - CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN EUROWINDOW

●Cập nhật, theo dõi tình hình bán hàng của dự án 

●Theo dõi số lượng hợp đồng đã ký, hợp đồng mua bán, hợp đồng đặt cọc

●Lập báo cáo công nợ phục vụ yêu cầu quản trị hàng ngày, hàng tuần

●Tiếp nhận, kiểm tra, xử lý hồ sơ liên quan đến công nợ, thời hạn nợ (miễn giảm lãi, gia hạn nợ,…), hỗ trợ bồi thường, đền bù… theo phê duyệt

●Định kỳ lập bảng kê xuất hóa đơn thu tiền tiến độ của khách - Lưu trữ hợp đồng/ hồ sơ/ chứng từ bản cứng và bản mềm theo quy định

●Theo dõi đôn đốc thu hồi công nợ cho từng đối tượng khách hàng, phân bổ công nợ đã thu trên hệ thống phần mềm

●Theo dõi, kiểm tra và thu thập chứng từ cho các khoản cấn trừ công nợ từ khách hàng

●Đối chiếu công nợ định kì với khách hàng

●Giải thích thắc mắc về công nợ với khách hàng khi có yêu cầu

●Làm bảo lãnh ngân hàng 

● Theo dõi thanh quyết toán các dự án báo cáo Tổng Giám Đốc

●Quản lý các khoản thu chi dự án báo cáo Tổng Giám Đốc

07/2018- 07/2019:

    Phòng kinh doanh , Công  ty cổ phần Eurowindow

 ● Tìm kiếm khách hàng tiềm năng, xác định nhu cầu khách hàng và chào bán các sản phẩm của tập đoàn Eurowindow cho các công trình nhà riêng, các dự án xây dựng

 ●  Tư vấn cho khách hàng về các phương án cửa phù hợp với kiến trúc và trang trí nội thất.

 ● Tham gia tính giá sơ bộ để lên các phương án thiết kế và báo giá cho khách hàng.

 ●  Lập kế hoạch công việc và báo cáo kết quả kinh doanh hàng tuần, hàng tháng


01/2015 - 06/2018

Chuyên Viên Tư Vấn Vay Tiêu Dùng - Ngân Hàng Shinhan

●Tìm kiếm và phát triển khách hàng cá nhân, gặp gỡ khách hàng trực tiếp để trao đổi, tư vấn, giới thiệu cho Khách hàng sản phẩm cho vay Tín chấp và Thẻ tín dụng của Shinhan Bank.

06/2013 - 12/2014

Thực Tập Sinh giao dịch viên- Ngân hàng BIDV

 ●Hỗ trợ các giao dịch tiền mặt và phi tiền mặt cho các khách hàng (như: mở tài khoản, nhận tiền gửi…) theo đúng thủ tục của TCB. 

 ● Hỗ trợ cung cấp dịch vụ cho khách hàng cá nhân một cách nhanh nhất, tốt nhất .

  ●Hỗ trợ kiểm tra các giao dịch/chứng từ phát sinh trong ngày

● Hỗ trợ đối chiếu giao dịch và lượng tiền mặt, đảm bảo số dư tại quỹ tiền mặt về không sau khi hết giờ giao dịch

● Hỗ trợ chấm kiểm tra chứng từ đã hạch toán giao dịch của ngày hôm trước.





2016 - 2017

Thạc sĩ Quản lý xã hội, Học viện Báo chí Tuyên truyền

2010 - 2014

Cử nhân tài chính ngân hàng,Trường đại học Hòa Binh

overview_CV: With nearly 10 years of experience in Accounting, Sales, and Financial Advisory roles in diverse industries such as Banking, Real Estate, Office Supplies, and Fashion, I am Hoàng Thu Hằng, a passionate and detail-oriented professional. My expertise includes contract drafting, financial account management, customer prospecting and development, collaboration with departments and partners, and effective sales persuasion. I have successfully managed financial accounts and contracts at Eurowindow, effectively advised and sold products to customers, and contributed to the growth of organizations. Currently working as a Tài chính kế toán at CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN EUROWINDOW, I specialize in updating and monitoring sales progress, preparing debt reports, and managing customer invoices. In my previous roles at Eurowindow and Ngân Hàng Shinhan, I excelled in customer relations and financial advisory, demonstrating my strong skills in business and customer management. With a Master's degree in Social Management from Học viện Báo chí Tuyên truyền and a Bachelor's degree in Banking and Finance from Trường đại học Hòa Binh, I have developed a keen eye for detail, teamwork capabilities, logical thinking, and effective communication skills. I am proficient in financial management, report preparation, contract monitoring, customer development, and various software applications such as Bravo and SAP, showcasing my ability to adapt to different work environments and technologies. Additionally, my certifications in Social Management and Banking and Finance further validate my expertise in these fields. I am now seeking a challenging position where I can leverage my skills and experiences to contribute to the success and growth of the organization.

overview_CV: Hello, my name is Quách Công Thao, and I am a dedicated Small and Medium Enterprise Customer Specialist with a passion for customer service and business development. With 2 years of experience in the banking industry, I have honed my skills in relationship management, financial analysis, and sales strategies. Throughout my career, I have consistently exceeded sales targets and built strong relationships with clients. I am currently seeking a challenging position at VPBank, where I can utilize my skills to drive business growth and provide top-notch service to clients. My background in customer service and business development, coupled with my strong work ethic, make me a valuable asset to any team. I am fluent in Vietnamese and proficient in English, with a desire to continue learning and growing in my professional career. Thank you for considering my application.

overview_CV:
I am a recent graduate with a strong background in banking and sales roles, showcasing less than a year of experience. Skilled in customer service, sales, negotiation, teamwork, and independent work, I have successfully assisted clients with loan and credit card applications, as well as providing top-notch customer care. I am a proactive and adaptable professional, always eager to learn and excel in any new role I undertake.

Seeking a challenging position in a dynamic company, I aim to leverage my expertise in customer service, sales, and finance to contribute significantly to the organization's success. With a strong desire to further enhance my professional skills and progress within the company, I am driven to achieve excellence in every task assigned to me.

My work experience includes roles as a Business Development Officer at Shinhan Vietnam Financial Company and a Sales Representative at TPBank - Fico. In these positions, I excelled in tasks such as advising and supporting clients with loan and credit card applications, customer care, developing new customer sources, debt collection, and regular sales activities. With a solid educational foundation from the Banking Academy and a degree in Banking, I have also achieved a commendable academic ranking of 2.56.

Additionally, I possess a variety of soft skills such as being sociable, a quick learner, enjoying team activities, advisory skills, sales abilities, effective customer care, negotiation techniques, teamwork, independent work, eagerness to learn, and proactive work ethic. Complemented by hard skills including advising, sales, customer care, negotiation, teamwork, independent work, and computer proficiency, I am a well-rounded candidate poised to excel in any role.

Certified in various areas including IT standards from the Banking Academy and English language proficiency, I am committed to continuous learning and expanding my skill set. With a passion for engaging with people, being disciplined, seeking new experiences, and participating in team activities such as sports, travel, and additional work opportunities in advisory and sales roles, I am dedicated to honing my skills and serving the needs of any organization I work for.

In summary, I am a driven and dedicated professional with a blend of strong soft and hard skills, solid educational background, and a passion for continuous growth and development. I am confident that my experiences, achievements, and capabilities make me a valuable asset to any organization looking for a motivated and skilled individual to contribute to their success.

overview_CV: With over 6 months of experience in banking and financial services, I am an accomplished sales representative currently working for Ngân hàng TMCP Tiên Phong (TPBank - Fico) in Hanoi. My expertise lies in prospecting and attracting new customers through various online platforms such as Facebook ADS and Zalo, as well as conducting market analysis to identify potential leads. I excel in guiding customers through the loan application process and promoting digital payment solutions like QR code account openings. My role involves not only maintaining existing client relationships but also actively expanding our customer base. I possess strong soft skills in consultation, support, customer care, and new customer development. Certified by TPBank in June 2021, I am dedicated to continuous learning and growth in the field. I am seeking a challenging sales position in a dynamic organization to further enhance my skills and contribute to achieving company objectives.

overview_CV:
With over 5 years of experience in project management, team leadership, and a strong educational background in Business Administration, I am a skilled professional seeking a challenging role to drive success and growth. In my previous role as a Marketing Manager at ABC Marketing Agency, I successfully created and implemented marketing strategies, managed social media campaigns, and collaborated with clients to achieve their goals. Similarly, as a Sales Representative at XYZ Corporation, I excelled in prospecting new clients, negotiating contracts, and exceeding sales targets in my territory. 

I hold a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration from Boston University and a Master of Business Administration from Harvard University, showcasing my commitment to education and continuous learning. Additionally, I am certified as a Project Management Professional (PMP) by the Project Management Institute, a Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) by Scrum Alliance, a Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) by Cisco, and hold an ITIL Foundation certification by AXELOS.

My expertise lies in communication, organization, and problem-solving, as evidenced by my successful project management track record and my ability to lead teams to exceed targets and goals. I am now looking for a new opportunity to leverage these skills and experiences in a dynamic organization.

12.4. Anh/ Chị có thể đi công tác xa không?
ChọnCó
12.5. Nếu không trúng tuyển tại Đơn vị dự tuyển, Anh/Chị có thể làm việc tại đâu trong hệ thống VPBank
Theo phân công sắp xếp của đơn vị.
13. Tại sao Anh/Chị muốn làm việc tại VPBank
Qua tìm hiểu của bản thân em được biết thì VPBank là một trong số các Ngân hàng hàng đầu ở Việt Nam. Cùng với đó là chính sách về nhân
sự, chiến lược kinh doanh,... luôn nằm trong số những Ngân hàng dẫn đầu. Là một sinh viên mới ra trường, em nhận thấy VPBank là một môi
trường đầy năng động và thân thiện để em có thể gắn bó, cống hiến và tạo ra những giá trị nhất định để khẳng định bản thân. Ngoài việc có
một môi trường tốt để gắn bó và cống hiến thì VPBank còn là nơi để cho em có thể tham gia các khóa đào tạo để nâng cao chuyên môn của
bản thân. Bên cạnh môi trường làm việc và chính sách đào tạo thì tại VPBank chế độ dành cho nhân viên cũng thực sự sứng đáng với những giá
trị công việc, điều này là động lực không nhỏ để em quyết định ứng tuyển vào VPBank.14. Anh/chị từng được khen thưởng hoặc bị kỷ luật chưa? Anh/chị vui lòng chia sẻ chi tiết về thông tin khen thưởng/kỷ luật(nếu có)
Tôi xin cam đoan những thông tin cung cấp trên đây là hoàn toàn đúng sự thật và đầy đủ. Tôi đồng ý để Ngân hàng thẩm tra những điều mà
tôi đã khai. Tôi xin hoàn toàn chịu trách nhiệm nếu những thông tin trên sai lệch. Tôi tự nguyện và cam kết công khai minh bạch khi tham gia
các bước trong quy trình tuyển dụng của VPBank.
Anh/chị vui lòng ghi đúng ngày anh/chị khai thông tin, ký và ghi rõ họ tên đầy đủ

With a strong background in banking and finance, I have over 2 years of experience in the industry. My top skills include financial analysis, risk management, and customer service. Some of my biggest achievements include successfully implementing cost-saving measures and increasing revenue for my previous employer. I am now seeking a challenging role at VPBank where I can further develop my skills and contribute to the growth of the organization.

Career Objective:
To secure a position at VPBank where I can leverage my expertise in banking and finance to drive business success. I am eager to contribute my knowledge and skills to a dynamic and friendly work environment, while also taking advantage of the training opportunities available to further enhance my professional development. My goal is to make a meaningful impact within VPBank and continue to grow as a valuable asset to the team.

overview_CV:
With a solid background in banking and finance, I have accrued over 2 years of experience in the industry, specializing in financial analysis, risk management, and customer service. I have a proven track record of implementing cost-saving measures and driving revenue growth in my previous role. I am now seeking a challenging position at VPBank where I can continue to hone my skills and contribute to the organization's success. My career objective is to leverage my expertise in banking and finance to drive business success at VPBank, while also taking advantage of training opportunities to further enhance my professional development. My goal is to make a meaningful impact and continue to grow as a valuable asset to the team.

In terms of education, I hold a [Earned Degree] from [Name of College], where I honed my skills and knowledge in banking and finance. I also received honors and achievements during my time at [Name of High School], showcasing my commitment to academic excellence. Additionally, my tertiary education at [Name of Tertiary Institution] further solidified my expertise in the field.

My soft skills include strong communication abilities, effective teamwork, adaptability, problem-solving skills, and exceptional time management. On the other hand, my hard skills encompass a deep understanding of banking principles, expertise in developing business strategies, experience in training, and a commitment to professional development.

I am also proficient in Vietnamese, enabling me to effectively communicate and engage with Vietnamese-speaking clients and colleagues. I hold a certification in an undisclosed field from an unknown issuing organization, demonstrating my commitment to continuous learning and skill development. Overall, my diverse skill set, combined with my passion for banking and finance, make me a valuable asset to any organization, especially VPBank where I hope to contribute to its growth and success.
